name: keith flannery
title: 8000 minutes to set up. Would actually be easier to set up in a bank
content: 8 minutes to set up. What a false claim. Let's go with the average first time and not an absurd time based on what is most likely a second or third run. Wouldn't accept my id on 3 occasions. Then I tried to call for a video call as advised.First call hung up because it won't allow blue tooth headphones. Second time I got through but she immediately and quite unfriendly said I had to get out of my car to make the call for "security'.I done this on my lunch and the van is the quietest place for me. She came across so abrupt, no hello or explanation. If the service is this poor before they have any of my money I can only imagine how bad it'll get if they had my money. Could be a great product, but poorly executed. A Michelin star meal, served on a bin lid.#update 1.  I called again.  The operator only speaks German and asked me to call again.  Almost a week later.Guess what,  I didn't love another failed attempt.#update 2. Called again, this time just a black screen, no operator.  When the call hung up, the app started to refresh itself and 30 minutes later is still refreshing. THE FUTURE! Don't worry N26. I like the challenge now and will continue until my account is set up to see how long it takes. Then I'll see how long it takes to delete . I've actually joined revolut since.  It's very good.
reply: Hey, thanks for your feedback.We are sorry to learn about your experience with N26, especially about our verification process.The verification process is a very delicate moment and it needs to be executed with specific criterias, i.e. you should be in a room with good lights and where we can hear you clearly.We would love if you tried back again to perform the verification process with us, we're sure you're going to love it this time.Have a nice day.

name: J
title: Either pray or get a lawyer
content: If you use this bank, be prepared to get yourself a good lawyer. I tried  to access my account for 2 weeks after I opened it. Luckily I never put in any money, because I never did manage to access my account. Every person I talked to in customer service said I needed something more. Multiple re-verifications, waiting for phone calls, etc. No one was ever able to give me a straight answer or help me in any way. Sometimes when they could not provide a good answer they either ignored a question completely or just stopped talking altogether. It was clear the customer service representatives are talking with multiple clients at once, as they often forget what information you have given them. I feel sorry for what these poor people must be going though, because they are clearly being told nothing of use from their superiors and just stall or make up time estimates. I feel bad for all the people who have lost their money to those terrible institution. I cannot see them lasting much longer if they keep this up.

title: Always perfect and I'm loving it.
content: Always perfect and I'm loving it.In Germany, most of the banks charge monthly fee and you need to have Anmeldung (Residence Registration). Even if you have this, it'll take some time just to book an appointment to meet an advisor to open a bank account. However, with N26, I opened my bank account while I was in Japan via video chat (Appointment NOT required!!) and received the card in Germany. That was a spectacular experience within the app.Of course, there's no maintenance fee per month or year. You can use Apple Pay which I always use at supermarkets. Google pay is also available.

name: Sara Hoy
title: Horrific Customer Service/Card declines
content: I have had the absolute worst experience with N26 since getting my debit card 2 months ago. My gym membership, spin class membership, venmo transfers, and ATM transactions all get declined and for various reasons. One came back that my zip was wrong (false, I triple checked it, made sure it was accurate on the site), the ATM said my card was expired (doesn't expire until 2024), another said my card was marked as lost or stolen...etc. When I contacted customer support, they researched it, then said that there were "no declined ATM transactions", basically insinuating that I made the whole thing up. Yeah, OBVIOUSLY if it spits my card out saying it's expired, there's not going to be a transaction to decline. They basically said I was entering my information wrong and offered no solutions. I've now racked up late fees with my gym membership and spin class membership, can't transfer any money out of my account, and have no help. Needless to say, I'm closing my account based on customer service alone.
reply: Hey Sara,we're sorry to learn about your experience with us.Of course we did not want to imply that you made everything up, our agent was trying to help you.We are sorry to see you go away, we would love to learn more about your situation, but we need more information.Feel free to write us at support@n26.com.Have a nice day!

name: John Samuels
title: I'm a new N26 client
content: I'm a new N26 client. Account setup was challenging, perhaps because I'm an American living in Italy. Using the app, it asked for a photo of my identity card or passport. I used my Italian identify card and received a message that it didn't match my selected form of identification. This took two weeks before I was informed of the problem and my account was reset so I could try again. Again, my Italian identify card was rejected without explanation. I tried to send a photo of my permesso di soggiorno but the app wouldn't accept it. finally, after a total of more than a month, I tried again using my US passport. Success in less than 15 minutes. It would be helpful if N26 provided reasons for when an application is not initially accepted. Now that the account is set up it seems to be a very good service. I've had one issue with the debit card being declined but that was resolved via chat.

name: J
title: Beware of N26
content: Beware of N26, the other bad reviews have it right. When it works it's great: modern, in english, fast. But when you have an issue you better prepare yourself for the worst, most stressful situation ever. They are simply not prepared to deal with the issues regulations and app woes present them with. They have a terrible Customer Support setup that makes it difficult for you to get a fast solution to any issue. Furthermore, while you are trying to sort things out you're blocked out of your account and you don't have access to bank statements, balances, or anything. That means you're in the dark as I have been for a month in a half. They ask for "patience" and "trust" and I'm pretty sure they're braking banking rules all the time with these practices. They tell you "you can still use your card"...sure, but what about transfers, 2 step verification, knowing if no fraudulent transactions have happened...Silence. They cannot deal with real world problems in a professional manner. This is a startup playing to be a grown-up bank.So if you like to live dangerously, go ahead, but please don't make it your main bank. It is not simply there yet, might never be since they actually were better in the beginning.

name: Thomas Campbell
title: I've never had such a nightmarish‚Ä¶
content: I've never had such a nightmarish experience with a bank before. Right now, for example, I have to "pair" my brand-new smartphone with my account because for certain transactions, such as payments to another bank account, you cannot use only the web app, as is the case with every other bank where I have account, but you also have to go on N26's smartphone app and "confirm" the transaction. The problem? Although I've done everything I'm supposed to do, the N26 Android app REFUSES to "pair" my smartphone with my account. I have an important payment of nearly 800 euros I need to send no later than today, but I'm blocked from "confirming" it. I could tell more horror stories, as my wife also has struggled mightily with N26 and their obviously deeply flawed smartphone app, but I'll leave it at that... The worse part, however, is N26's clear inability and unwillingness to address and fix these issues. Every time I've gone on their customer chat line I've been made to feel that I'm the one causing the problem, not their ridiculous complicated system of "verification," exacerbated by their faulty software and customer service support system.
reply: Hello Thomas, Even though we are very sorry to learn about your experience we would like to thank you for your feedback.As you probably already know we have adopted a double factor verification to maximise the safety of our customers.Some banks adopt a verification code sent via SMS, other banks use a physical code generator, we send a notification directly on your mobile app in order to confirm a payment.We would like to help you understand what didn't quite work in your verification process, but of course we need further information.Please contact us at support@n26.com , and feel free to report anything you feel like, we will do everything in our power to solve your situation and to improve our service.Of course we do not believe it is your fault if something didn't quite go as intended, we are sorry if we made you feel that way.Thanks again for the time you put for writing this feedback and we are looking forward to have the chance to support you again.Regards,Your N26 Team.

title: Exceptionally awaful at everything
content: There are so many things wrong with this bank. The app and online banking are missing numerous basic functions - such as saving regular payees or managing direct debits.But the worst thing about them is their customer service. I had my phone stolen so I couldn't access my account. It took hours and hours waiting to get through to someone. Then I had to go through re-verification - sending my ID and selfies - and wait until they got back to me. The process takes 10 days! 10 days without access to your bank account! And they really couldn't care less. Their attitude is 'this is the way it is, live with it.'I've taken my banking elsewhere.03/10 Response to N26:No, my card isn't working. Being able to receive money is no good if I can't send payments or use my card. Same boiler-plate response, no help or support. They think it's OK to lock people out for 10 days. Ridiculous.07/10Still locked out. Borrowed all I can from friends and family. Literally eating beans on toast twice a day with the little I have left. Late bills are piling up. N26 is ruining me and they don't care.

name: JWN
title: Read. DO NOT open an Account. Here's why....
content: Do Not. No matter what you may have heard or what you may read. Do not open an "account" with N26.A bank- or any consumer business- should be judged by how it performs in its worst moments and not its best. N26 is a perfect example. This innovative start-up has gained customers and market penetration but has done so at the expense of its customers: its' tech platform is unstable and its customer service is non-existent. Truly- you'll get five answers for a question but NEVER get a person on the telephone. Though N26 promotes itself as an online bank, that's a ruse. When problems arise its ability to solve them requires the sort of traditional intervention of staff to solve problems that can't be solved by an algorithm. And its investment in staff is abysmally low. I've been locked out of my account- while traveling overseas- for three weeks now. Despite assurances that my debit card would continue to work it does not (see below). I've had to make costly compromises to how I bank myself abroad that have wiped out any advantage that N26 promotes- and has cost me hundreds of dollars. Prior to this debacle I had bad consistently bad experiences over the past 18 months: five terminated / dropped online conversations and a wait as long as 90 minutes for an ONLINE chat. No kidding- an online chat. I'm told by insiders that N26 spends 10,000x more money on customer acquisition than it does on customer service. N26 is focused on building a paying customer base but fails miserably in terms of customer service. When I received a response a week or so after my account was locked it came from the "Complaints Department" (not a Customer Service Department as you would expect.) To wit, I'm not a complain I'm a customer- a distinction that's lost on this tone-deaf company.  Its founders are worth over $100 million while customers' needs are ignored. This is why banking gets a bad name and tech founders a reputation as entitled predators.
reply: Hey, thank you for reaching out.We sincerely apologise for this situation.Please be aware that we‚Äôre currently experiencing a high volume of enquiries. As a result, the wait times to connect to a customer service agent may be a bit longer than usual. Concerning your N26 account, please note that during the re-verification, you can still use your card, your direct debits are collected and you can still receive incoming transfers. We just need you to upload your ID into the app so we can re-verify   your identity.Thank you for your understanding.Regards,Your N26 team.

name: Lily
title: DO NOT USE
content: I wish I had read reviews of this bank before I made the mistake of signing up for it. I got an account, transfered money into it, and immediately learned that I would never be able to log into the app or the website because I had an American number and the two-factor authentication cannot go through. Infuriating! I didn't close my account, and I used the card once to withdraw cash from an ATM successfully. Then, my card was stolen and I was unable to log into my account but somehow figured out a way to 'block' my card temporarily. The next day, I got a notification that a purchase had been authorized - so it was NOT blocked? I called the US support number, who had no record of my account existing since I opened it abroad, and didn't even have the support number that I was supposed to call. There IS no support number. I had to open a chat and it took five different chats and several hours to even get someone to block my account. They said someone will call me "within 24 hours" to pair my phone to my account and let me in. He wouldn't even let me see which purchases were attempted. I am withdrawing all of my money and canceling this account immediately. I have never been more stressed out from a banking experience! Unbelievable that I cannot access my own account while some stranger is off spending my money!
reply: Hey Lily,we are sorry to learn about your experience.The two factor authentication is obviously intended for security reasons. As a bank with an official license from the ECB we are compelled to do anything in our power to maximise our customer's security, that's why we asked you to provide us with a phone number.Have you contacted us right after you realised that you couldn't go through the authentication process with your American phone number?We believe we could have helped you figuring out a way to log into your account.Without our customer being authenticated within the app we cannot provide personal information, let alone transaction information because it would not be safe.We encourage you to contact us again in the future, we will do everything in our power to help you out.Regards,Your N26 Team

name: Deepal Jayasekara
title: Extremely buggy app, and the app is all they have
content: Withdrawal - We tried to withdraw some money from the ATM, We got a notification that the transaction was successfully authorized, and the amount was deducted from the account. But the ATM didn't give any cash. Later we found out an explanation on their website saying "It happens". Why don't you fix the issues you have, rather than writing articles to decorate the bug as a feature???Foreign transfer - I wanted to perform a foreign currency transfer. I tried two times, and both failed giving an "Unexpected Error Occurred" red banner and a forever spinning "Processing" banner. Then we contacted support to see what's wrong. And we got the most stupid and hilarious response ever. He said that they use Transferwise as a service to do foreign transfers which THEY HAVE NO CONTROL OF. Then they asked me to contact Transferwise DIRECTLY to get my problem sorted. I myself is a software engineer who has years of experience in the Payments industry, so I know how things work. Why would you ask your customer to contact YOUR 3rd party service which the customer has ABSOLUTELY NO CONTRACT with????? That's the most stupid and ridiculous answer ever. Getting a bank statement - Getting a full bank statement for official purposes is a nightmare. Support told us they don't issue certified bank statement including the history of transactions. You can only get a statement verifying your current balance (which is ridiculous)
reply: Hey, thank you for taking the time to write this review.We are sorry that you feel that way. Regards,Your N26 Team.

reply: Ciao, Maria Teresa, hai fatto benissimo a scrivere questo commento perch√© ci permette di parlare di un argomento importantissimo.Se non sei cliente N26 e ricevi delle mail che ti invitano ad "aggiornare i tuoi dati" devi prestare la massima attenzione, non trasmettere nessun dato e cestinare la mail: si tratta di mail phishing.Il phishing √® una pratica attuata da mailntenzionati per estorcere i tuoi dati per fini illeciti.Scrivici sui messaggi privati della nostra pagina Facebook oppure alla mail support@n26.com per segnalarci qual √® l'indirizzo email da cui hai ricevuto questi messaggi, ti assicuriamo che prenderemo delle contromisure.Grazie ancora della tua segnalazione.Buona giornata.

reply: Hey Erika, thank you for your message. When verification of your ID is complete, you‚Äôll have full access to your account features and app.We thank you for your understanding.Regards,Your N26 Team.

Si vous avez contact√© notre Service Client, notez que vous √™tes rappel√© sous 48 heures maximum. Salutations,Votre √©quipe N26.

name: Andy
title: Say Nooooo to N26
content: I've been using N26 now ever since it launched in the UK and I'm not really impressed.What I like about N26 the most is the signup process is extremely quick and simple. Gone are the days that banks should be sending out forms to fill in, or having to take your ID into a branch. I think the whole signup process took just a few minutes which is fantastic.The debit card wasn't exactly quick to arrive, from memory I believe it was around 2 weeks, which is pretty slow even by UK bank standards.The app is quite buggy, the most annoying bug for me is that when I login, quite often I get logged out straight away. Although it's not a bug, rather an annoying feature, is if you use fingerprint logins, you have to login with the password every 30 days and re-enable fingerprint logins.The bank doesn't support debit debits, which make it impossible to use for your day-to-day banking. Also when sending payments to other banks, you have to type the sort code, account number, and reference every time you make a payment. N26 is the only bank to my knowledge which doesn't remember recent payments or payees. That is very annoying!One of the biggest problems for me using N26 is the double charging problem, which doesn't appear to happen with any other UK bank. Typically when making a payment with your debit card, the merchant will first perform a check with the bank to make sure you have enough money in your account, and if so, the bank reserve that money (which you see as a pending transaction). Later, the merchant actually debit your account, and the original "reserved" amount is then released. I've seen it quite a lot with N26 where the merchant takes the amount from my account, but the original "reserved" amount is still pending. This means you can actually be double charged for purchases, until the pending transaction is released which can take up to 30 days. Meanwhile you have less money in your account which can be used.You'll find you also have to re-confirm your ID every so often. N26 is the only bank I know to do this, but it is the way they do it which is a problem. When they want to re-formed your ID, you'll be notified by the app at a seconds notice, at which point your banking app stops working and you can't make full use of the app such as making payments. Unless you are carrying your ID, and can get it re-confirmed quickly, you could end up with no access to your money (in certain circumstances).Finally I just want to wrap up with the N26 customer services. I've spoken to N26 support for two different issues now, firstly my debit card not working, and the above double charging problem. The impression I got from both customer service agents, was they couldn't be bothered. They showed very little interest in the problems and were arrogant in places.Overall, I like that N26 is trying to be modern and high-tech, but the execution and quality of service is pretty poor. If you are looking for a modern bank which offers good service and support, I would recommend Monzo or Starling over N26.

name: Anna Upeniece
title: Identity re-verification - poor support - IDnow
content: Have enjoyed using N26 for nearly 3 years until a week ago when I asked to re-verify my identity. I‚Äôm following the process 10-15 times a day but no luck. IDnow Identification Expert is never available. In the meantime I cannot withdraw money or make any payments including bills and rent!Unable to reach N26 on a phone. Chat support are of no help.
reply: Hey Andy, thank you very much for taking the time to write this review.We sincerely apologise concerning the malfunctions you've had with the app. We are always looking to improve the quality of our services and the new app updates should solve any existing issues. If you wish to give feedback or have any ideas that could improve your experience (concerning app improvements, ideas for new features, quality of Customer Service...), you can send an email to : ideas@n26.com and we'll make sure to forward it to the relevant teams. Concerning your transactions, note that your N26 card is a MasterCard debit. This means that two kind of transactions can take place : - Authorizations. A blocked or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. At that point, a few things can happen to your authorization : it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires (and automatically returns to your account up to 12 days at the latest). - Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Regarding the re-verification, please note that as a licensed bank, we‚Äôre legally obligated to request customers to verify their identity at regular intervals. Once you start the process to verify your identity again, you are still be able to use your card to make purchases, receive money, have full benefits of any overdraft & credit, and direct debits are still collected. When verification of your ID is complete, you‚Äôll have full access to your account features and app.We hope this answer was useful to you and thank you again for your honest feedback !Regards, Your N26 Team.

name: Linn
title: Stay away from this bank
content: Stay away from this bank! There are no other options in Germany for non-German speakers, but save yourself some time, effort and stress and don't sign up with N26.Every single step has been a hassle. I signed up two months ago and I've still not been able to use it. The startup video process took an hour, many assistants just hung up when I didn't speak German.I tried transferring money from my EU home country but it wasn't accepted. Upon trying to figure out why, they had no information to give me, and my bank of 15 years in my home country told me that this was N26's problem, not theirs. I've repeatedly tried to fix this, but they refuse to help me further.They've recently updated their login process to ask for phone verification, and they didn't tell me before implementing this. I've had trouble with sim cards here as well, and my phone number changes all the time. I tried changing this through the customer chat and they asked me if I could go to an ATM to make a transaction in order to verify myself. Just to change my phone number! Up until recently, all they've asked for a login has been an email and a password.The principle to have to go verify myself like that is just wrong. I've complained about that and they don't listen. I've asked for a different way of verifying myself (my bank in my country have many means of verification) and they asked me about my 5th transaction in my bank. I haven't even had 1 transaction! I answered that, and apparently the answer was wrong and the assistant closed the chat. I've asked the customer service 4 times now, having waited several hours on and on, and they just transfer me to other assistants or the internet connection is abrupted on their side.Highly unprofessional.

name: Patrick
title: Very Amateurish
content: After using N26 for several months without complaint, they suddenly updated their app.  It was a mandatory update, and they disabled older versions.  This new update had the feature of a cryptographic signature requiring a direct download from the Google Play Store.  This is a problem for me because I don't agree with Google's terms and conditions or privacy policy.  I download my apps elsewhere.Other banks use a cryptographic signature to verify the integrity of the app, not that I have agreed to Google's t&c.  This is like the old days when companies required you to have a Windows computer to use their services.Anyway, this app upgrade abruptly made my account unusable and blocked most of my payment options.  It was days before I was able to get through to customer service on their chat window, and was obviously not the only one with a problem.  I asked them to close my account and transfer the balance, and they are unable to give me a time frame for completing this.
reply: Hey Linn, thank you for taking the time to write this review.We are sorry for the trouble you've experienced concerning your verification. Note that you can change the langage of contact by clicking on Account > Settings > App Settings > Language. If your incoming transfer is outside of the estimated time frames, please contact the sender (bank) for a payment investigation. We can't investigate incoming transfers, but we've collected a few reasons why your SEPA or foreign currency transfer could have failed : https://support.n26.com/en-fr/fixing-an-issue/payments-and-transfers/why-did-my-sepa-transfer-failRegarding re-verification, please note that as a licensed bank, we‚Äôre legally obligated to request customers to verify their identity at regular intervals. Once you start the process to verify your identity again, you‚Äôll still be able to use your card to make purchases, receive money, have full benefits of any overdraft & credit, and direct debits will still be collected. When verification of your ID is complete, you‚Äôll have full access to your account features and app.Finally, if you have any ideas on how to improve your experience and our services, you can send an email to : ideas@n26.com and we'll forward your suggestions to the relevant teams.We thank you for your understanding.Regards,Your N26 Team.

title: I withdraw ‚Ç¨100 on saturday
content: I withdraw ‚Ç¨100 on saturday! And they charged me 3 √ó ‚Ç¨100 on my account! Had to fight to get a refund! Only  got 100‚Ç¨ back...still waiting for my other 100‚Ç¨!It takes them 2 sec to steal our money and 12 days to give it back!No solutions givenVery poor customer service  very dissapointed and donc know if I will ever see my 100‚Ç¨ again
reply: Hey Luc, we sincerely apologise for this situation.Your N26 Mastercard is a debit card, which means banking in real-time. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:- Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. At that point, a few things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires (and automatically returns to your account up to 12 days at the latest).- Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Sometimes you‚Äôll see both the authorization and the presentment if they become disconnected or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire. If it doesn‚Äôt, please reach out to Customer Service (Account > Help > LiveChat).We thank you for your understanding and hope this answer was useful.Best regards,Your N26 Team.

content: I have used N26 for almost 2 years and in that time they have turned into a joke!! There customer service is now nonexistent as they have got rid of all their telephone numbers. They are an online remote bank that you can't contact. Their chat feature is a deception so new customers think that their is a way to contact them.I am waiting for a new debit card as my old one cracked into pieces. You are required to pay and it still takes them 2 weeks to get the card to you. In the meantime the latest version of the app has unpaired my account from my mobile so I cannot transfer my money to a usuable account. Verifikation genommen hast.Solltest du in dieser Zeit einen neuen erhalten haben, liegt es in deiner Verantwortung diesen bei uns in der Datenbank aktualisieren zu lassen, sodass wir ihn f√ºr die Video-Verifikation erneut nutzen k√∂nnen.Dazu kannst du eine Email von deiner hinterlegten Email Adresse an Support@n26.com senden, mit deinem neuen Ausweis, welcher bei uns gespeichert wird, sodass der erneuten Verifikation nichts im Wege steht.Gr√º√üe, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Ovidiu Marian
title: All is fine and works..
content: All is fine and works... but there is a big minus, the direct debits. Direct debits will end up to be forced upon your account even if you do not have any money to cover the bill in the account and also even if you do not have any overdraft. So they will bounce the first time but in about 2 months time you can expect that this direct debits will be forced upon your account even if you don't have the money to pay them or have 0 money in your account. So you will be forced into minus and the next time money flows in your account it will be taken away. So be careful, especially if you are getting Hartz IV or if you are having a bad financial time.Update: NO, you have NO control over direct debits in this situation, it happened to me so it will happen to everybody, or am I a special case?
reply: Hi there, thanks for taking the time to let us know. Our mobile app is designed for you to stay up to  date on the amount you have in your account to avoid going into a negative balance. You are always in complete control of this. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Brilix
title: Nel complesso bene, considerati l'uso e il costo zero
content: Procedura di richiesta facile e rapida. Mi hanno aperto il conto dopo mezzora, la carta √® arrivata in 7 giorni lavorativi e ha un aspetto talmente minimalista e povero da risultare simpatica. Gli accrediti da bonifico sono lenti, ma il fatto che possano impiegare anche 2 o 3 giorni √® scritto chiaro. Il conto ha alcuni limiti, parimenti ben evidenti nelle condizioni contrattuali che sono scritte in modo chiaro, con l'unico dubbio relativamente al fatto che il contratto √® regolato dalla legge tedesca ( e dubito che chi non sia un avvocato internazionalista sia in grado di comprendere le conseguenze di ci√≤ sul piano pratico). Per acquisti su internet e le spese da bancomat mi pare funzioni e nessuna banca "fisica", che io sappia,  fornisce tali servizi  a costo zero. La app e il sito, come tutte le cose, richiedono un minimo di esperienza e orientamento, ma a me sembrano chiari e ben fatti. La chat nella mia esperienza risponde subito, le risposte in effetti sono un po' stereotipate, con una tendenza a ripetere quello che sta scritto nelle FAQ, ma con un po' di pazienza si arriva al risultato. Salvo un caso isolato di uno che mi ha chiuso la comunicazione mentre scrivevo la domanda, sono stati tutti gentili.  Usandolo nel modo giusto per quello che offre, e salvo sorprese, il giudizio del conto √® positivo. A maggior ragione considerando i costi delle banche con una sede fisica, che hanno molto ridotto il personale e tendono comunque a far fare autonomamente al cliente tutte le operazioni.

name: Pamela Ya√±ez Castillo
title: AWFUL BANK AND CONTACT SERVICE
content: This bank has been a nightmare. The re-verification process didn't work out because I'm not living in Germany anymore, I opened my account with my Chilean passport but now is no supported, so they just freeze my account and now I can't get access to my money. They sent me an email so they can close my account and send the remaining funds as soon as I give a new IBAN. I did that 2 weeks ago! This electronic bank is a JOKE. Contact support is not helpful at all they just ask for your email and after a few security questions they just say, "sorry the cancelations departments work independently from us, we don't have access to the info". I'm so angry, I just want my money back. But no one gives a solution.
reply: Hey Pamela, we are very sorry to read about your experience with us. As a licenced bank, we‚Äôre legally obligated to request customers to verify their identity at regular intervals. If you sent your cancellation request, it will be taken into account by the relevant department and you will receive a reply once your account has been closed and your funds sent to your IBAN. There is indeed no way for our customer service agents to make this process quicker. We are sorry about this.We thank you for your understanding.Regards,Your N26 Team.

content: Do not bother about this bank if you have an american mobile phone number. name: Tomas
title: Stolen card
content: Stolen card. It's the only bank which charges you for issuing a new card in case of robbery. I cannot understand that. Strongly will recommend you to choose other electronic banks.
reply: Hey Tomas, we are very sorry to read about your experience with us.The fee will be charged for the replacement of cards which were lost, stolen or misappropriated or in case of other unauthorised use of the card. This does not apply, where the circumstances that haveled to the replacement are imputable to the Bank or where the Bank is responsible for these circumstances. name: Leah Williams
title: Nightmare Bank
content: I admit that I was pretty naive when I signed up for n26.  As an American expat living in Europe I found the traditional banks slow, bureaucratic, and difficult to work with.  N26 seemed like the perfect answer.  I was interested primarily in the convenience it offers.What I should have been more concerned about was accountability.  With n26, there is none.  There isn't anyone you can go to if something goes wrong.Something went very wrong, in my case.  And because n26 support is such a black hole I still can't really even say what it was.Essentially, I was frozen out of my app and then the web account went too.  I'm not some nefarious character and don't have any financial irregularities: I get a regular paycheck and pay rent and utilities every month, go to the same grocery stores, etc.  I have a US passport and a German Blue Card.  I'm not sure how my account was flagged but it was.And every interaction with support has ranged from frustrating to miserable as I explain again and again how I need to access my account.  After two weeks of this--contacting support every single day--I was told that my account needed to be closed and to send an email to support to transfer the funds.  This was over a week ago and still I have not received any of my money back or any kind of update.  It took another two hours and four separate support chats this morning just to verify that my email was received.  But the agent STILL could not say when I would receive my funds.In the meantime, I am unable to receive my paycheck, pay my rent or bills - life has ground to a halt.  I've never been in this position before.  So please, before you sign up for n26, consider the worst case scenario.  And if convenience really means that much to you, ensure you've got a backup account somewhere else.
reply: Hey Leah, thank you for taking the time to write this review.We are sorry to read about your experience with us. We apologise for your situation, but as a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users and we never close an account without warning you and always have a reason to do so.If your account is closed, you'll be contacted by email. Please note that from this point, our Customer Service agents will not be able to give you any informations as your case will be handled by our Backoffice department. You won't encounter issues when using your bank account if you don't breach our terms and conditions. Thank you for your understanding.Best,Your N26 team

name: Karsten Esser
title: Unseri√∂ser Umgang mit Kunden
content: 1. Kontoer√∂ffnung - alles problemlos, schnellend unkompliziert.2. Banking - per app einfache Handhabung aber fehleranf√§llig2. KundenserviceHier muss ich leider mehr schreiben. In den Monaten April bis August diesen Jahres habe ich einige Betr√§ge, die meinem Girokonto belastet wurden zur√ºckbuchen lassen.Soweit so gut. Am 12.09. wurden genau diese Betr√§ge wieder dem Konto belastet. Leider konnte ich sie nun aber nicht zur√ºckbuchen, da sich die Referenzbuchungen auf Ein Datum √§lter als 8 Wochen beziehen. Also habe ich den Chat mit einem Mitarbeiter gestartet um alles zu kl√§ren. Man verwies mich auf den n√§chsten Monat, da hier wohl ein technischer Fehler vorl√§ge, der nur von der entsprechenden Abteilung gekl√§rt werden kann. Man sagte mir aber auch einen R√ºckruf auf Kulanz zu (pers√∂nliche Gespr√§che sind nicht Leistungen au√üerhalb der teuren Mitgliedschaft (16 EUR monatlich). Also wartete ich. Es tat sich nichts. Weder Erledigung noch R√ºckruf. Also startete ich immer wieder einen Chat um eine Kl√§rung herbei zu f√ºhren. Doch ich erhielt immer nur die gleichen Antworten (teilweise mit den gleichen Rechtschreibfehlern). Ich wurde immer nur vertr√∂stet. Am Donnerstag schrieb ich per Fax die Gesch√§ftsf√ºhrung an (ist ja eine GmbH). Und siehe da, am Freitag erhielt ich um 11.30 einen R√ºckruf. Man entschuldigte sich bei mir und meinte, dass man eine L√∂sung gefunden h√§tte und ich bek√§me innerhalb von 24 Stunden die ca.1.000 EUR wieder gutgeschrieben.Auch dieses Versprechen wurde nicht eingehalten. Bei einem erneuten Versuch, heute eine Antwort per Chat zu bekommen, musste ich mich wider mit Textbausteinen zufrieden geben. Von einem Dienstleister erwarte ich, dass gerade bei nachweislichen Fehlern sofort gehandelt wird und vor allem, dass offen kommuniziert wird. Ich erwarte aber nicht, dass man Geld einzieht und sich danach auf "Tauchstation" begibt. Diese Vorgehensweise kenne ich nur von Personen, die schlicht das Geld zur R√ºckzahlung nicht haben und nicht den Respekt haben, dies auch zuzugeben.Ich kann nach diesen Erfahrungen nur abraten, hier ein Konto zu er√∂ffnen. Nach meiner Recherche h√§ufen sich solche Erfahrungen in der letzten Zeit und zeigen auf, dass N26 einfach noch nicht so weit ist, wie sie sagen.

content: Finger weg von den Betr√ºgern.Ich bin mittlerweile jetzt schon fast 2 Jahre bei N26.Anfang hatten die echt ein gutes Konzept. Banking nur mit dem Handy. Perfekt f√ºr mich als Student. Und der absolut schlechte Kundenservice antworter ebenfalls nicht. Lastschriften kann man in der App auch nicht zur√ºck geben. Wurde also einfach bestohlen. Wahrscheinlich pleite? Finger weg von den Betr√ºgern!!

reply: Hey Stephan, danke f√ºr dein Feedback.Bei allen R√ºcklastschriften, besonders jene, welche schon l√§nger als 8 Wochen alt sind, m√ºssen die Kollegen nat√ºrlich die kompletten Transaktionen durchgehen um sicher zu gehen, dass das Geld nicht bereits von dir selbst zur√ºckgebucht worden ist durch den Button in der App.Inzwischen wurde alles behoben, sodass dies nicht wieder vorkommen wird und alles mit den H√§ndlern besprochen wird, welche noch offene Lastschriften forderten.Gr√º√üe, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Rinske Zijsling
title: Reality check
content: What they'll sell you:Business You account, THE account for traveling working freelancers! 1 business card and one card for your personal expanses! So convenient! And an insurance too! And yes, after you explained your personal situation as a digital nomad I still totally recommend this account for you! You want this, you need this look at all these fancy colored cards!Reality:- The personal card for personal expanses is a Maestro card. You can‚Äôt pay abroad with a Maestro for your daily coffe, shoppings, hotel stays or anything else. You can order things online. Or withdrawl money. So you can walk the streets with a lot of cash money in your pockets. Feeling unsafe. Oh and of course you have to pay an exchange rate everytime you withdraw. Yes, you will pay hundreds of extra euro‚Äôs a year for that.- This is Online banking but you, dear traveling working freelancer, need a mobile cellphone number in every country you will travel to. You can‚Äôt log in or use support chat if you don‚Äôt have one. Even better, we‚Äôll freeze your account. And no we will not get back to you about your complaint about that in de chat. Nor help you with that. You can ofcourse use your expensive phone contract from your home country. Problem solved right?- The ensurance is just for 3 months at a time max. Good luck with that full time remote worker.- Oh and if you buy something, let‚Äôs say a camera in Japan. We‚Äôll take that money from your account twice. And return that 2nd payment 10 days later. And yes we do that every time. You don‚Äôt mind do you?  - And you didn‚Äôt really think we would actually help you with ANYTHING in the chat did you‚Ä¶.
reply: Hi Rinske, Thanks for taking the time to leave your feedback.It is possible to use your N26 You Business Mastercard for personal expenses if you so wish. We recommend using the Maestro should you want to distinguish purchases between the two cards, but you are free to use your Mastercard as you see fit. The withdrawal fee of 1.7% in a foreign currency is waived if you are a You account holder, however the Mastercard currency conversion rate will still apply. We accept international phone numbers, so there is no need to change between numbers if you are travelling. It is not necessary to be logged in to use the support chat, as you can access the live chat from directly within the N26 support center. You can also use live chat from our webapp on a desktop: https://app.n26.com/loginIf you find yourself being double charged in a certain country and this puts you in any sort of financial difficulty, please reach out to us immediately on live chat so that we can ensure these funds are returned to you as soon as possible.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Team

content: First app ever seen !Since the update of the app everything is going wrong. My phone wasn't recognize as a paired device anymore, only solution is to receive an sms code. Same problem go on again, phone not paired anymore, doesnt receive the SMS.I'm actually trying to get someone on the support chat.Don't go to this bank you would only regret it !!I'm gonna send the email to close my account !!
reply: Hey Florian, we are very sorry about this situation.If you do not have access to your N26 app, you can always start a LiveChat with us by clicking on "Open a chat" at the bottom of the following page : https://support.n26.com/en-de/fixing-an-issue/other/how-to-contact-n26Our agents can help you everyday (including Sundays and bank holidays) from 07:00 to 23:00.We thank you for your understanding and hope this answer was useful.Best,Your N26 Team.

name: Stranded  in NYC
title: No security or support form n26
content: Recently was scammed online.  The scammers used the n26 payment portal.  Two chat agents have ignored my explanation and closed chats on me without answering my questions.  They got back to me days later saying there was nothing they could do.  No explanation or details have been provided.  I've been a customer for years and the one time I really need help they're not there for me.  Still waiting for some kind of explanation. . . .PS the agent said there was no way to reach them by phone.  A quick google will show you that that's not the case.
reply: Hi,We're sorry to learn of this situation.If you have made a card payment to someone else and you do not receive your goods, or they are not as advertised, it is possible to dispute this via a Chargeback. This is a relatively simple process where we dispute the card charge with Mastercard to claim your funds back. The chargeback process also applies if your card has been stolen or used where you did not authorise it. If you have sent funds via a bank transfer, the necessary step would be to initiate a Payment Investigation to track the funds. As you have to confirm a bank transfer yourself from within your own mobile app, and enter your unique PIN, it can be more difficult to retrieve the funds, but a Payment Investigation can be started.It is possible to contact us via phone from directly within your mobile app if you are an N26 Metal customer. You can contact us 24/7 in English via live chat from your mobile app, web app, or through the N26 Support Center.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Audrey Bouvier
title: Stay away
content: Stay away! Terrible customer service. You cannot talk to anyone beside by chat after waiting for an hour and trying 3 times to resolve an issue and they always find a new step to delay the procedure. They use an unsecured method to verify your identity. Like going to a ATM and type a wrong PIN. Well, duh anyone can do that if they steal my card and purse with passport. Then they can't verify what you did because they don't think about ATM fees or exchange fees added. So you stay 1h waiting each time for nothing and you are stuck out of your account, everything is based on your phone app.The agent shut me off at the end because I was telling her how insecure their method was. I still can't access my funds and worrying to have provided all my personal information to chat people thru internet connections now and still not have access to my money. My husband also can't access his own account as the new app is not compatible with his phone so they asked him to buy a new phone. Unbelievable. The day we can access our accounts again, we move everything out!
reply: Hi Audrey, we do apologise for the experience you had. Sounds like there was some miscommunication here. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. We would be happy to help you if you contact us via our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out.Best,Your N26 Support Team

content: By a mistake my friend helped me open a N26 you account. I found out that it is a wrong account when I saw a negativ balance. I didn't understood why it is negative. So for months I haven‚Äôt been able to access my account, let alone my money! In the support chat they said I had to email them which I did. When I asked to check in my records on my issues (another request I had sent months earlier was to send me a letter via post where it would show my address for registration purposes in my new home) he said that there was nothing showing and I just had to wait for them to email me. I‚Äôve never experienced such bad customer service and little knowledge. I‚Äôve spoken to at least 10 different people in the last year and nothing has happened so far! All I want now is my money and to close the account! I can not recommend this bank AT ALL!!!

name: Kateryna
title: Keinen Zugang zum eigenem Konto
content: Seit Mitte August habe ich keinen Zugang zu meinem Geld... Ich habe N26 Girokonto seit November 2017 und war eigentlich zufrieden... bis einen bestimmten Zeitpunkt. Ich habe die E-Mail von N26 erhalten wo steht dass ich re-verification machen soll. Ich habe das in meinem App durchgef√ºhrt.. und wurde sofort von dem App rausgeschmissen - mit der Information dass mein Land (ich komme aus der Ukraine) bei N26 nicht mehr akzeptiert ist. Was ist das f√ºr eine Diskriminierung? Ich habe online Support kontaktiert und Aussage bekommen dass es leider so ist und ich muss mein Konto schlie√üen. Nat√ºrlich habe ich sofort ein neues Konto in ‚Äûnormalem‚Äú Bank ge√∂ffnet. Es hat aber nat√ºrlich gedauert. In der Zeit hatte ich keinen Zugang zu meinem Geld und konnte sogar meine Wohnung nicht bezahlen obwohl ich eigentlich genug Geld auf dem Konto habe! Nach der Anfrage mein N26 Konto zu schlie√üen und das Geld zum neuen Konto zu √ºberweisen, hat es auch lange gedauert bis jemanden von N26 auf meine E-Mail reagiert. Jetzt warte ich auf mein Geld seit 2,5 Wochen und habe immer weniger Hoffnung dass ich es wieder bekomme... Keiner antwortet mehr entweder im Chat oder per E-Mail...Es ist echt traurig, dass in so einen sicheren Land wie Deutschland so eine unsichere Finanzinstitute existieren - h√§tte ich niemals gedacht, dass sowas passieren konnte, dass man sein 2 Jahren gesammeltes Geld einfach nicht zugreifen kann! Ich kann leider dieses Bank nicht weiterempfehlen. Habe bereits einen Termin bei Verbraucherzentrale gemacht...
reply: Hey Kateryna, danke f√ºr dein Feedback.Aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden oder Bearbeitungsgr√ºnden k√∂nnen wir nicht alle Dokumente akzeptieren.Wenn neue Dokumente eines Landes herausgebracht werden, m√ºssen wir diese erstmal in unserem System einspeichern, die Sicherheit gew√§hrleisten, dass unser System die Dokumente akzeptieren kann.Wenn es diesbez√ºglich √Ñnderungen gibt, nehmen wir alle Ver√§nderungen vor, weshalb diese in dieser Zeit nicht genutzt werden k√∂nnen, bis wir diese in unserer Datenbank gespeichert haben und f√ºr die Kunden zur Nutzung der Verifizierung genutzt werden k√∂nnen.Sobald die Ukrainischen Dokumente wieder akzeptiert werden k√∂nnen, findest du diese hier: https://support.n26.com/de-de/erste-schritte/persoenliche-daten/wie-kann-ich-mich-ausweisenGr√º√üe, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Bill
title: No access to account
content: Before I start complaining and explaining my current situation, I want to start off by saying that I was initially very happy with N26: A mobile bank! This was great for my, since I frequently travel abroad. A Debit card that I can use around the world and connect to all kinds of apps (my usual bank doesn't have this option). For about half a year, this worked great for me and would recommend N26 to people in need of something similar.Then came the moment when I suddenly had to verify my account using the 2-step authentication. Usually, that shouldn't be a problem, but I'm using a different phone number now (old phone got stolen). After chatting a few times (since there is no phone number available), they called me back with a lot of questions to confirm my identity. So far, everything made sense and my number was changed to the correct number. All was good again :)Or so I thought. Then It was time to verify my login by inserting the SMS code I would receive by SMS. You might have guessed it at this point, but no code would ever be sent to my phone. I did receive some kind of error and tried to have the SMS message resent a couple of times, but with no positive result. The number must be correct, since they also managed to call me back.It's 5 days later now and I still do not have access to my bank account. If have no idea how much money is still on that account and have no way to transfer it to another. The only way for me to know for sure if there is enough money on that account for anything, is by getting cash out of the ATM and pay for everything in cash (which means I also pay the ‚Ç¨2,00 fee every time I get money out of an ATM). So since last Friday i've been contacting customer service by using the 'live chat'. The service agents keep telling me they will be in contact 'today' or 'tomorrow'. Today marks day 5 after first contact. Today I spoke with a service agent who told me it could take a 'few weeks'. At this point I didn't know what I was reading. A few weeks being unable to check my own balance, let alone transfer funds to pay bills! He did not seem to appreciate it very much when I told him waiting for weeks wasn't really an option for me.Now, I work in customer service myself and have seen some crazy things, but never as crazy as having to wait a few weeks before I can access my account. I understand (and appreciate) that there are security protocols. But when I give all my personal details and tell them the exact amounts and locations of my last transactions to confirm my identity, they still can't help me at all and the only thing for me to do is wait.Moral to the story: Great app when everything works, but customer service has a lot to learn. Make sure you change all your personal details in your account as soon as they change. Otherwise, you might end up like me feeling like being locked out of your car on a abandoned road with 150km to the nearest sign of civilization.I will update the review as soon as the situation changes.When it comes to customer service: - not easy to reach on live channels.  - Not a very personal approach (although there were some friendlyl ones)Lots of templates that didn't really fit into the conversation, not feeling like agents are reading the situation actively. More like scanning for keywords. - chats get closed fast by agents if you don't respond fast enough. - follow-ups (call-backs, e-mails) didn't happen when promised.
reply: Hi Bill,Thanks for taking the time in leaving us your review. Firstly we regret that you were put in such situation. We arrange callbacks within the next 24 hours, we apologise as you were not called within that timeframe. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers‚Äô issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. Your concern was not handled properly, and we are going to take steps to ensure that this situation does not repeat itself. We will also pass on your feedback regarding the chats current ending time due to inactivity. We really appreciate your feedback as it will allow us to improve our services and operations. If you are unable to reach our live chat within the app, alternatively you can contact us via our support center. At the bottom of the page there's a button "open a chat", here is the link: https://support.n26.com/en-fr/getting-started/account/how-to-prove-my-identitySCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account. We apologise that you encountered issues receiving the SMS. We value our customers and understand how important it is to offer exceptional service. If you have any concerns or suggestions please do not hesitate to contact us at support@n26.com. Best,Your N26 support team

Ohne Grund, einfach so, obwohl Geld drauf ist. reply: Hey Jennifer, danke f√ºr dein Feedback.Mastercard ist ein amerikanisches Unternehmen, dort gibt es sowas wie P-Konten nicht, daher kommt es zu Schwierigkeiten mit dem Freibetrag.Mastercard versteht die Zur√ºcksetzung am 1. des Monats nicht, da es nicht √ºberall P-Konten gibt, somit wird das von Mastercard nicht erkannt.N26 passt das dann gerne f√ºr betroffene Kunden an, daher ist es ja so wichtig und empfehlenswert, dass man den Support seiner Bank kontaktiert, sollte dies nicht automatisch zur√ºck gesetzt werden.An einer automatischen Zur√ºcksetzung arbeiten wir nat√ºrlich bereits und bitten um ein wenig Geduld f√ºr diesen Prozess.Gr√º√üe, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Johannes Hunger
title: EU-Richtlinie zur 2-Faktor-Authentifizierung st√ºrzt N26 ins Chaos
content: App ohne Ank√ºndigung auf Android 6.0 upgegradet. Somit alle Kunden mit Android 4.0/5.0 etc konkret handlungsunf√§hig. Ohne App sind keine √úberweisungen m√∂glich, da die Transaktion via Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung best√§tigt werden muss. Kundenchat wei√ü keinen Rat. Rasselt nur die techn. Bedingungen durch, obwohl kein Bot, sondern Mitarbeiter. Durch die zus√§tzliche St√∂rung, die seit 13.09.19 andauert, auch am 16.09.19 kein Abheben an Bankautomaten m√∂glich. Keine Zahlung an Supermarkt-Kassen, oder auch Apotheken m√∂glich.Aktuell auch keine Nutzung der App "Numbrs" m√∂glich. Konto kann nicht verbunden werden. Kunden mit einem Android, √§lter als 6.0 kommen also definitiv nicht an ihre Einlage. Sie k√∂nnen, weder das Geld zu anderen externen Konten transferieren, noch das Konto am Automaten leeren. Am 16.09.19 auch Zugang zum Onlinebanking via Desktop PC nicht m√∂glich.
reply: Hey, danke f√ºr dein Feedback. Dieses Upgrade ist aufgrund der EU-Vorschriften zur Sicherheit f√ºr PSD2, die N26 erf√ºllen muss, erforderlich. Im Juli 2019 haben wir angefangen unsere Kunden dar√ºber zu informieren, dass sie aufgrund regulatorischer Ver√§nderungen der EU bez√ºglich PSD2 ihre App aktualisieren m√ºssen, um den Sicherheitsanforderungen zu entsprechen. Danke f√ºr dein Verst√§ndnis und bitte entschuldige die Unannehmlichkeiten. Gru√ü, dein N26 Team.

name: Nick
title: Just tried setting up a UK account
content: Just tried setting up a UK account.  5 minutes later I get an email:"Let‚Äôs try your ID verification again.Hey Nicholas,It appears that there was an issue with some of the data or documents you submitted and we were unable to complete the identity verification procedure. No worries, you‚Äôre able to try again!To help you complete the process we‚Äôll send you a follow-up email shortly with some additional tips on how to successfully complete verification.If you‚Äôre unable to retry your verification in the app, reach out to our customer support and they‚Äôll be able to give you more specific details on what went wrong and help you resolve the issue."So I try to contact chat support three times because there was nothing wrong with my i/d and each time chat shuts down quickly with the message:"There is a connection issueSorry that we are not able to chat with you. name: Erik Vansaren
title: General view of the service
content: Customer Support:- There is no phone number. It existed because I called it because of a technical problem and the impossibility of solving it due to the absence of the internet.To date it means that if you find yourself without internet due to a technical breakdown of your phone or a local network problem, you will not have access to your account nor to customer support. Not really very well.- Providing customer support exclusively through a chat, on a 7cmx12cm screen is not exactly the top of UX, especially when it comes to serious problems and not simple questions.- Providing customer support via desktop PC chat offers several problems, such as authentication.The authentication consists of the request for 3 questions, of which the third asks you to communicate the fifth charge to your account or the names of at least two companies with recurring charge and relative amount.The problem is that the agents in question do not always offer you the possibility to say which are the recurring charges and if you cannot have access to the account to tell them the fifth charge received, they simply close the chat.In addition to the agents that sometimes close the chat even without explanation, you can also add any connection problems, both on the phone and on the desktop.In short, a truly painful experience. There is a lot of talk about making life simpler but a company with millions of euros in financing can't even get a phone line which could simply authenticate the call from the app itself like airbnb does.- Bank Transfer ProcessSince performing mobile operations does not represent maximum comfort, there is a desktop version that becomes useless, as instead of sending a text message with confirmation code for the bank transfer which could be easily read on screen without open the sms itself, N26 app sends a push notification that requires the manual confirmation of the transfer, unlocking the mobile phone screen and logging into the app.How to make life complicated.- Double authenticationRecently N26 has adapted to the European double authentication standard, obviously here too, it did it in the most complicated way possible.1. I go to log into the bank account via my computer, I can't, the bank says I have to confirm the access on my mobile.2. Meanwhile, via the bank's app, I receive a push notification asking me to confirm the access, but I can't do it at the first "tap", I must first unlock the screen, while the notification has disappeared from the screen.3. To confirm, in any case, I have to log in to my account on the app installed in the mobile, to which you ask yourself what sense to log into the account on the mobile to confirm access to the account from the desktop, and you also wonder why not have sent a simple text message with a code, which, among other things, can be read on the screen without unlocking the cell and logging into the account.4. I find out that you can actually request a text message, but to do so, in the pop-up that says "confirm access to your account" I have to click on "help", at the point a new pop-up opens, explaining that by clicking on "send" you will receive a text message with a confirmation code.I do it, but then the bank's website tells me "sorry it's been too long"Considering that there are more chances that they will steal my phone than they have of accessing my PC or discovering user and password and accessing it from another PC, I would say that we are doing very well.It is worth noting that between sending the SMS as the main solution and then eventually the push notification of the app, the banks had complete discretion on how to manage the token.- TransparencyN26 is exactly like any other bank, if they can lie or deceive you for an advantage, they will do it without problems.In principle, the monthly withdrawals were free and unlimited, the bank used a lot of leverage on this in their advertisements.Then the free withdrawals were reduced to 5 monthly after which you pay to withdraw.Even the bank account had to be free, but then they changed that too and now a questionable credit check is performed, if you don't get a certain score, they offer you a paid bank account. Arguable because it happened to a friend of mine who has absolutely no problems.In essence, if you can avoid it, you avoid it.
reply: Hi Erik, thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. Outlining where you think we can improve helps us to prioritise where we need to improve, so we appreciate this. Best,Your N26 support team.

name: RickyW
title: N26 Service - Absolutely Abysmal Customer Service at N26 Bank
content: I have to say this N26 bank service is absolutely absymal and appalling. Your N26 account gets blocked for any number of "reasons" meaning a whole load of ridiculous "ID re-verification" palaver each time in order to unblock it.N26 Customer service is practically impossible to reach. There is no phone service to reach N26 Bank, and if you can't get into your N26 account, then it can be nigh on impossible to reach their text "chat" service. N26 have now messed up my account again with some app update, which means yet again I can't get into my account - neither by the N26 website nor via the N26 app on mobile phone. Great. Now I have to spend hours chasing around trying to get into contact with the practically non-existent N26 "support". I am also very concerned about the risks of my N26 account suddenly being "frozen" for any of their numerous spurious reasons, which causes innocent people real problems. Plenty of examples of this kind of treatment from N26 can be found both here at the Trustpilot as well as elsewhere online.N26's marketing promotions and general tone is also glib and irritating. Emails from N26 that address you with "hey", and pictures of happy smiling "support" people that you never can reach (they  probably don't even exist in reality, maybe they are just standard image library pictures)  N26 are a heap of dung with what must be the worst customer service of any bank. Avoid.

name: JJ.Nortyperson
title: Avoid them like the plague
content: Avoid them like the plague. They opened my account, and just as I closed my UK business and would rely on N26 until my new bank account could be opened, they decided that my documents weren't right, demanded I re-submit them by camera and phone. I tried over and over to get the documents to them, the instructions given were ridiculous. They rejected my documents over and over despite the documents being genuine and accepted elsewhere,  and have left me with a blocked account and several months money not reaching me, leaving me unable to proceed with the house move and opening of my new bank account. Their response has been appalling and my situation is dire now. They have wrecked my new life. Thanks N26, I hope this review is part repayment. I am disabled and if anyone disabled or vulnerable wants a good bank, avoid this one, the stress is intolerable.This dreadful bank have tried to leave a reply to defend themselves, how pitiful, they have time to do that but not to REFER MY CASE to their regulators as requested by me. Hilariously, their response is signed 'Your N26' or similar. What a laugh, they forced my account closed as I said they would, when asked to refer my case to the ombudsman. Do avoid N26, they are crooks, they are callous, they are from a few centuries ago, before customer services were invented, and although they forced the closure of my account after accusing me of fraud, they still have to refer my case to the regulator, so they need to get busy with that instead of writing silly replies to my review. I got a proper bank account so what the point of N26's petty and archaic behaviour was, I do not know.  Avoid them like the plague, don't suffer as I did.

name: Jan
title: Be careful
content: Was waiting for them that they come to Switzerland. Now I received a mail that I can create my account. Trying to do so, I receive an error message `There is a problem with your personal information, contact support‚Äô. The button ‚Äòcontact support‚Äô in the mail opens the N26 app on my phone and nothing more. No support here. The App support link on the App Store opens a ‚Äòpage not found‚Äô. After searching any support on their website, I found a chat support. A person named ‚ÄòJoao‚Äô asked me for a few details and decided that the mail address I gave him was not ok. So he closed the chat with the comment ‚ÄòI appreciate the effort, but the information you have provided is not matching the one in our system (...) I will now have to close this chat. Have a great day!‚Äô. The information I gave them was fine, I triple checked it and they used it to send me information mails. Seems there is a huge support problem with N26, beside this, it is the first time a chat agent refuses to help and hangs up on me. I contacted them on their Facebook site, they replied and asked for two questions. I answered. Then no more reply. I reminded them and receive the same initial two questions seems to be a chat robot. I still can‚Äôt open an account since 2 weeks.What a silly waste of time.
reply: Hi Jan,Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. We apologise that your sign-up did not go as anticipated.When you receive a notification to contact support when signing up, this means that you have already registered your details with us in the past, and they are currently on our system. It can also indicate that you already have another active account with us. As you can only have one N26 account,  the system will block another application - at that point, you can either continue with your old sign-up attempt, or you can contact us on live chat so that we can remove the old application so that you can start again. You can also email us at support@n26.com from the email address you used on your application, so that we can wipe your old data.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Teamm

name: Macky
title: Hugely disappointing
content: Hugely disappointing! If something seems too good to be true, it usually is.  Summary of my issues with N26:- In-app verification process failed (many, many times)- In-app video chat/ verification failed (and took many, many attempts to connect to a verificaiton agent)- When answered, the in-app video chat/ verification agents did not speak English and abruptly terminated my video calls without reason (four times)- My requests to close my N26 account and delete my data were met with emailed auto-responses from N26 to "try again"- Since closing my N26 account (finally), I am still reciving unsolicited email from N26 addressed to another person (not me) i.e. my data have not been deleted.Past support case id numbers:- 06287057- 06356171- 06356172  I can't review my actual use of N26 because the verification process failed over and over again. I initiated the verification process multiple times, via the N26 app, but the app failed to upload my verification documents every time (I made many, many attempts). I am certain that my smartphone, camera and N26 app were up-to-date and fully functioning, as were my documents and wi-fi connection. Despite this, the verification process failed many, many times.  The next day I was invited, by email, to verify my identity using video chat inside the N26 app. On four different occasions each German speaking verification agent who answered my video call hung up abruptly, without reason, when I politely requested to communicate in English. Actually connecting to an agent via video call on each of these occasions took a very, very long time and I had to endure many failed attempts (this took several hours).  The emails I got from N26 to resolve these issues merely provided: (a) links to existing N26 public support documentation online, (b) further invites to re-try video verification using the N26 app again, (c) suggestions that I use the N26 app to make more video calls to N26 support, which cannot be accessed until the account is verified btw, (d) requests that I contact N26 support via a button in my web browser, but the button is inactive and does not function and (e) on my phone, the button redirects me back to the verification page, inside the N26 app, in an endless, time-consuming, frustrating loop.I had to search the internet to locate an email address for N26 support, as it is not shown on the N26 web site clearly. I have since made a number of email requests for N26 to close my account and delete my data. Initially these requests were met with more of the same 'try again' automatic email responses that I mentioned previously i.e. (a), (b), (c), (d) and (e) above. After some stern insistence, I'm now told (by email) that my N26 account is to be closed (finally)! Nonetheless, N26 thought it appropriate that the account closure email should also include a link to a feedback form, so that I could explain why I want to close my N26 account! My reasons should be very clear. I'm not sure when I can expect my N26 data to be deleted though. I am now receiving unsolicited email from N26 that are addressed to a person named "Sgquadhyaeao". MY NAME IS NOT "Sgquadhyaeao" and (according to N26) I NO LONGER HOLD AN ACCOUNT WITH N26.I was never able to access my N26 account because the verification process failed. This means that I have not used N26 to conduct any financial transactions. As a result, any data retention requirements governed by financial regulations that may supersede the European Union's General Data Protection Regulations (EU GDPR) do not apply. Consequently, my 'right to erasure' or ‚Äòright to be forgotten‚Äô, under the EU GDPR, Chapter 3, Article 17, Section 1 (a), takes legal precedence. According to the EU GDPR, I have the right to obtain from N26 the erasure of personal data concerning me without undue delay. N26 are legally obligated to erase my personal data, without undue delay, on the grounds that my 'personal data are no longer necessary in relation to the purposes for which they were collected or otherwise processed'.  I have nothing further to say to N26 other than: I insist that N26 DELETE MY DATA with immediate effect. Please REFRAIN FROM COMMUNICATING WITH ME further, unless it is to confirm that my data have been deleted successfully. Most of all, DO NOT SEND ME REQUESTS to re-try video verification or to fill out feedback surveys (especially if the requests are address to another person)!  I do not recommend signing up with N26 until major improvements happen, with particular regard to improving the poor quality N26 in-app customer support. Customer satisfaction is paramount to the success of any public-facing business. I am not confident that N26 can take care of my money securely! It's a real shame that I couldn't get to use my N26 account. The N26 service seemed like a perfect fit for my banking needs and my budget. I hope that N26 improves their service so that other customers don't have to share my experiences.

name: Cayla Harvey
title: Overall I endorse N26
content: Overall I endorse N26. I am an American who studied abroad, in Germany, then Switzerland a year later. My experience: I was able to start my account in the U.S.A. but I needed a European phone number to verify, which I got when I was in Germany. A year later in Switzerland I was able to  change my phone number, after a long call to the N26 help line. But I love they have no atm withdrawal fees in Europe (for some amount per month). Also, it is much cheaper for me to transfer money to my N26 account than to use my American credit card. So overall, I have had a good experience with N26 as a U.S. citizen who is living in Europe for a few months.

name: Sanan
title: The worst online banking
content: Very bad support, misinformation on their app and never protect customer rights. 1. I got charged from the ATM without any information and N26 showed me this ATM on their app. When I asked them to investigate on it they said sorry we can not do something. We can just check our app. Sorry but if you show me that I have free withdrawals and show me some list of ATMs and then I got charged more you have to at least investigate on it and give me detailed information instead of saying sorry. 2. Once I bought a flight ticket and in the last step when they asked me to approve the payment through 3D security I just declined because I found others. I cancelled it but it got charged. When I asked to investigate that they said they can not. If you can not protect my account with 3D security why you have it? If you give permission to the other system to charge me even if I decline it?3. Every time when I write something to them I disconnect automatically and connect the new person and they ask to explain everything again and again. They always try to prove that the problem is on my connection which I tried mobile, wi-fi and ethernet. And this problem occurred in all of them.
reply: Hi Sanan,Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback.We do offer an ATM map within the app, however this is simply a guide which indicates which ATMs around you can accept your N26 Mastercard. This does not mean that some of these ATMs may not charge you a private fee for availing of their service, however it should be displayed onscreen before withdrawing that a fee may be charged. We have no influence over private ATM fees, and therefore cannot refund them. In the event you are charged by N26 for a withdrawal once you have passed your free withdrawal limit, the maximum amount would be 2 EUR.It seems that the authorisation to debit the funds from your account had happened with your attempted ticket purchase. This would reserve the amount for the merchant to collect for your purchase. As it was not completed, the funds will simply bounce back to your account without need for further action.Please note that it is also possible to access live chat via desktop from within the web app in the event you are having issues with mobile. You just need to login to the following link to do so: https://app.n26.com/loginYou can also open a chat from within the N26 Support Center.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Filip
title: bank went wrong
content: I was using N26 for 8 months until I received email that I need to re-verify my identity. It came as a surprise to me that I am not able to do that anymore because N26 thinks that people from North Macedonia should not be able to use their services. This is a discriminatory politics of the bank especially to me as an already existing customer with regular income. I trusted the bank to keep all my incomes for 8 months and as a result I was asked to move to other bank. They advised me to open new bank account where they will transfer all my money. There was nothing to worry about they said. From this point I was not able to use the account as before. I was not able to check my bank statement on the application, was not able to do direct debit or receive money on the account. On the email I was informed that I will be able to do all of the above, but because of some unexplained reason I was not able. I ended without receiving my August salary on the account and not being able to transfer money for rent or electricity and at the same time I started to receive letters in my mailbox to pay all outstanding bills. I am risking to loss my apartment or have a bad SCHUFA score just because N26 changed its mind who can use their services and is taking so long to do the final step and transfer the money to the new account. I had already more then 10 conversations with chat support, through email and phone calls and everyone was ensuring me that it will be done soon. From last Wednesday I am not able to use the account at all. My money are trapped by N26 and I feel helpless and really worried.I am sure that my case is not unique and other people are experiencing the same issue. I already advised a lot of Macedonians to start the process of closing the N26 account before N26 ask for that and end up in a loop without any sign of end.
reply: Hey Filip,We apologise that you found yourself in this situation. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers‚Äô issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. Were you able to get further assistance regarding your transfer? You can contact us on Twitter or send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Best,Your N26 Support Team
