title: Just love my N26 Black card
content: Just love my N26 Black card. It was SO fantastic to have while in Australia. Purchases and cash withdrawals without the extra charges one usually incurs. Love the fact that I can see my purchases immediately that I've used my card. Topping up is easy and putting limits on max spend is very easy to do. title: Great and simple to use
content: I have been using N26 account for everyday spending and so far it has been great. App is very easy to use and I love the idea Of using spaces to save money for holidays and etc. As they are simple to set up and to transfer money into them, also once I pay money into them, they are not affected by transaction in the main section, even if there isnt enough money to cover a payment which is great as it prevents me from spending it until I have reached a goal.The process Of setting the account up was simple and quick, card came fairly fast, considering it came from germany to UK. It would be better if delivery could be tracked as it requires a signature.I had to contact customer service once and it was simple and my issue has been resolved really fast.However it would be really useful if I was able to set up a list Of recipients instead Of having to manually Enter account number and sortcode every time.

content: Solange es sich um "business as usual" handelt, ist das vorherrschende Gesch√§ftskonzept von ganz guter Qualit√§t. ABER! Meine Kreditkarte - Mastercard von N26 und meinem Handy, wurde vor zwei Monaten in Griechenland gestohlen. Es ist erst ein paar Wochen her, dass ich eine E-Mail-Adresse f√ºr den N26-Support gefunden habe (ohne Mobiltelefon ist die N26-App fast unbrauchbar). Ich habe eine E-Mail an den N26-Support geschrieben, und meine Situation beschrieben, wird von einer neuen E-Mail-Adresse gesend werden, weil ich keinen Zugriff auf meine icloud und damit auch keinen Zugriff auf meine Apple-Mail hatte (aufgrund der zweistufigen Best√§tigun, durch Apple beim Senden eines Codes an mein gestohlenes Mobiltelefon) Nach einer Weile bekomme ich eine Antwort vom N26-Support, from Carlos ( wenn der Name erfunden ist, steht darin ein Teil der Verantwortung des betreffenden Mitarbeiters, aber auch ein Teil der unternehmensverantwortungsbewussten Gesch√§ftspolitik) Er kan nichts helfe, weil ich shreiben von nicht registreret - bei N26, e-mail adresse. Ich bekom Zugrif zu meine apple mail, und habe sendt zwei e-mail, uchne anvort! Jetzt lebe ich in Athen, auf der Stra√üe, und nur mit der hilfe einiger s√º√üer menschen, und meiner sch√∂nen gro√üen schwester, konnte ich in den strassen von Athens ohne kreditkarten und ohne geld √ºberleben. reply: Hi Khalid,We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience this has caused you. In accordance with European banking processes, N26 is legally obligated to verify our customers at regular intervals.  We regret that the re-verification process did not go smoothly for you.As we no longer offer the option to verify via Post Office, it is now necessary to complete the video verification process as is required with all N26 German accounts. Regrettably, our verification partner cannot accept all documents. We would never want our customers to believe we are discriminating them in relation to their nationality. The reason that a document cannot be accepted is usually due to the lack of security features on said document. Our current list of accepted documents can be found here, and we are constantly trying to add more to the list: https://docs.n26.com/cs/Support%20Center/Verification/201804-supporteddocs-DE-EN.pdfWe hope that a resolution for this issue has been reached, but we encourage you to reach out to us via support@n26.com or our Twitter Support channel if you require any further assistance.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Customer
title: Perfect bank
content: It is perfect solution for foreigners in Germany, especially if you don't speak German. I have been a customer almost for 2 years now and I should say online banking has never been so easy. Customer support is very helpful(in the rare cases that you need to use it) and the mobile app allows you to operate with your money extremely easy. I definitely recommend N26!!

name: Paul SA
title: It is a nice concept, but...
content: It is a nice concept, but I have had many issues with them, and it is never easy:1st, the card wasn't being delivered - sure, it is not entirely their fault, but from my UX perspective, it was freaking frustrating 2nd, I can't transfer money to a different currency - aside from a (IMO) huge flow issue, every time I tried, I received a system.error message like "could not establish connection with the server". I talked several times with customer support, and each time it was the same: reinstall APP, prey to God it works  - it didn't,  still doesn't 3rd - I  was asked to revalidate my ID, and for some reason they could not do it (although it is the same ID I used while creating the account - my passport), and now I am locked out of the APP, which means no money transfers, no online payments, no nothing - just card payments (on POS) and ATM withdrawals, but that does not help me pay bills or rent - so I don't have full access to my money (and I am still waiting for a solution from their end, and it has been 3 days already).If they fix their APP, and put in place the necessary processes to offer speedy solutions for critical issues (like mine), than it is wort it - if not, then maybe it's better if you go to a "normal" bank...L.E. I decided to cancel my collaboration with them, and as they were sending an email of good-bye, with this in it:"While this process is being completed you can use your card normally, make purchases and withdraw from ATMs, receive transfers, use overdraft services, insurance and credit services."...in parallel they were also blocking my account, so, in fact, now I can't even use the card at a POS or ATM, so, I am totally blocked from reaching or using my money. Good thing I have a back-up, cause otherwise I would be totally screwed. I believe it is total chaos there, they do not have clear processes or user flows, it is A MESS.My rating was 3/5, now I downgraded to 1/5, because it turned from bad to "oh my God, is this real life?! Is this a prank? Are there hidden cameras?"

The markup price when you use your MasterCard in other currencies is pretty decent compared to the money exchange outlets. Most of all everything is available in English even if you hold account in non-English speaking country which makes it all the while better than the rest. I would recommend N26 bank; been a customer since 2 years and I am very much satisfied with it.

reply: Hi Damian,We're sorry to hear that this has happened to you. In these situations, we recommend that you contact the sending bank so that they can initiate an official Payment Investigation to track and trace the funds, and recall them if necessary. This differs from a transfer confirmation, which simply states the funds were sent. You can email a copy of the results of the investigation to support@n26.com so that we can have a look into it, also.I hope that this has been resolved for you, but please feel free to reach out again if not.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team.

name: Sebastian S.
title: Was verstehen die denn unter P-Konto?
content: Ich habe ein P-Konto, bei N26. Jetzt laufe ich den DRITTEN Monat in Folge meinen Freibetrag nach. Ersten Monat wurde einfach nix gemacht, bis ich mich gemeldet habe und gebettelt habe, dass ich Miete, Strom und Sprit zu zahlen habe und sie doch bitte meinen Freibetrag freischalten sollen. Im zweiten haben sie zumindest den Grundfreibetrag freigeben, aber ich musste trotzdem zwei Wochen lang jeden Tag nachfragen was denn jetzt los sei.Heute, der dritte Monat, wieder das gleich. Grundbetrag freigegeben das wars.Also hocke ich mich wieder in den Chat frage die erste Mitarbeiterin, was denn los sei. Warum man es immer noch nicht hinbekommt. Mir wurde dann gesagt, dass das System noch am arbeiten sei und ich einfach warten soll und fertig. Nachdem ich gefragt habe wie lang ich warten darf wurde mir nur ein sch√∂ner Sonntag gew√ºnscht und der Chat wurde beendet.Ich verstehe nicht warum man es einfach nicht hinbekommt, Konto XY hat einen Freibetrag XXXX, dieser ist ab 0.00 Uhr jeden 01. des Monats verf√ºgbar. Nein anscheinend schaltet ein System erstmal alle Grundfreibetr√§ge frei und anschlie√üend macht dann ein Mitarbeiter den erh√∂hten Freibetrag .... sofern sie Lust und evtl. mal Zeit haben ....Man wird nur verdr√∂stet, dass man warten soll und Geduld haben soll ... Mal schauen ob meine Verbindlichkeiten, die ich habe sich auch so einfach abspeisen lassen ... so wie ich es muss ... ZUM K****!Letzten zwei Monate schon Mahngeb√ºhren noch und n√∂cher zahlen m√ºssen und diesen Monat schaut es auch nicht besser aus... Denn beteiligen tun die sich √ºberhaupt nicht .. Gott sei Dank ist mein Vermieter nachsichtig und l√§sst mir ein wenig Zeit mit der Miete. Denn dreimal nicht p√ºnkntlich Miete zahlen kann ja zum Rauswurf f√ºhren ....Kein Mitdenken, keine Empathie ... nichts ...
reply: Hey Sebastian, danke f√ºr dein ausf√ºhrliche Feedback.Mastercard ist ein amerikanisches Unternehmen, dort gibt es sowas wie P-Konten nicht, daher kommt es zu Schwierigkeiten mit dem Freibetrag. Mastercard versteht die Zur√ºcksetzung am 1. des Monats nicht, da es nicht √ºberall P-Konten gibt, somit wird das von Mastercard nicht erkannt.N26 passt das dann gerne f√ºr betroffene Kunden an, daher ist es ja so wichtig und empfehlenswert, dass man den Support seiner Bank kontaktiert, sollte dies nicht automatisch zur√ºck gesetzt werden.An einer automatischen Zur√ºcksetzung arbeiten wir nat√ºrlich bereits und bitten um ein wenig Geduld f√ºr diesen Prozess.Gr√º√üe, dein N26 Support.

name: Lucas Lima
title: Transfer of remaining funds / account closure / re verification process
content: I was asked to re-verify my account, tried to do it but it was unsuccessfully because of my residence permit (They asked for 1 year and I only have for 4 months left). I requested the account closure on 21.08. Got the answer that it was starting on 22.08. Since then I've been waiting for N26 to transfer my remaining funds (around 1.100‚Ç¨), after speaking uncountable times with customer support by email, twitter and etc; n26 did transfer 37,06‚Ç¨ yesterday (29.08), but as said before, I had 1.100‚Ç¨, mostly in the "spaces" area, so I have no access to the money, as I haven't had access to the app in a week, since I started the re-verification process.Now I'm almost going crazy because I need my money to pay my bills, my rent payment will be in 3 days and other things, and also to survive! I do hope I will see my money, which was gained with countless hours of hard work, back. I get responses by the customer support by email, but all of them just asking me to wait, but I sincerely can not wait anymore. I need the money urgently. I just want this to be over.

name: Sven
title: Bank k√ºndigt wahllos Konten ohne Aufkl√§rung von Betrug
content: Kreditkartenbetr√ºger benutzten meine Kreditkartennummer, obwohl diese von mir immer gesperrt wurde und nur kurz frei geschaltet, wenn ich damit bezahlen wollte. Trotz Nachweise an die Bank, dass mein Geld durch Betrug geraubt wurde, bekam ich das Geld nicht zur√ºck erstattet, ausser vertr√∂stungen und Ank√ºndigungen auf erstattung. Wohlgleich, dass die alte Kreditkarte dauerhaft gesperrt war (ich habe eine neue bekommen, die ich auch selbst bezahlen musste) wurden weitere Abbuchungen vorgenommen, die nicht von mir get√§tigt wurden, bis mein Konto im Minus stand. Zahlungen gingen alle an eine Autovermietung. Ich habe mit dieser Telefoniert und diese erstatten mir mein Geld von einigen Tausend Euro zur√ºck. Fragt sich jetzt nur noch, ob die N26 das Geld nicht einfach einbehalten m√∂chte, da diese Bank mir mehr den je als unseri√∂s erscheint.Der Support half mir nicht, man muss sich um alles selbst k√ºmmern und N26 k√ºndigte sofort mein dortiges konto, da es nicht gedeckt war (ungeachtet dessen, dass es nicht in den Minus gehen kann, laut Vertrag und AGB). Jetzt bekommt diese Bank von mir eine Anzeige "falls m√∂glich" (Betrug trotz Nachweise meiner seits geduldet, denn Unwissenheit sch√ºtzt vor Strafe nicht?!), meinen Anwalt und die BaFin ins Haus.Update 02.09.19:Wie ich es bef√ºrchtet habe. Ein Teil des Geldes wurde von der Autovermietung schnellstens erstattet. Leider ist die N26 nicht in der Lage das Geld meinem Konto auch gut zu schreiben. Ich habe das Konto selbst mit meinem ersparten ausgeglichen, statt aber eine Gutschift, wurde mein Konto erneut mit dieser Gutschrift in den Minus gebracht. Minus und Plus zu unterscheiden, sollte man schon k√∂nnen, wenn man mit dem Geld anderer umgeht!Update 18.10.2019Ich habe gedacht, man hat Ruhe von dieser Bank, da die Bank mich ja gek√ºndigt hat. Nun wurde von dieser Bank N26 noch eine Strafanzeige gegen mich erstellt, wegen Betruges. Ich glaube ich habe da irgend etwas verpasst, denn nicht ich bin der Betr√ºger, sondern die Bank selbst. Da ich alles Belegen kann, was die N26 mir an Geld unberechtigter Weise von der Kreditkkarte abbuchte und bis heute selbst nicht auf die Idee kam, es mir zu erstatten, geschweige das selbst irgend wie aufzukl√§ren, wird es schwer f√ºr die N26 sein, diese Strafanzeige bei der Staatanwaltschaft geltend zu machen. Im Gegenzug bekommt dann die N26 von mir eine Anzeige, wegen falscher Verd√§chtigung/Beschuldigung und selbst eine Stafanzeige wegen Betruges, wo die N26 es dann schwer haben wird da gegen anzuk√§mpfen. Leider wird f√ºr solche Prozesse auch wieder Geld der Kunden benutzt.Vielleicht kommt noch ein Update, da es sich wohl um eine "never ending story" handelt.
reply: Hey Sven, danke f√ºr dein Feedback.Als vollwertige Bank muss sich N26 den geltenden Bankvorschriften unterwerfen. Diese Regelung zielt darauf ab, unsere Nutzer zu sch√ºtzen.Bei der Verwendung deines Bankkontos treten keine Probleme auf, wenn du nicht gegen unsere Allgemeinen Gesch√§ftsbedingungen verst√∂√üt.Sollte dies geschehen sein, behalten wir  uns alle  Rechtlichen Schritte vor.Bis dahin bitten wir um Geduld. Gru√ü, dein N26 Support-Team.

Consideramos que nuestro proceso de registro es bastante sencillo en comparaci√≥n con otros bancos, sin embargo cualquier sugerencia para ayudarnos a mejorarlo siempre es bien recibida. Si no est√°s satisfecho con la atenci√≥n que has recibido o consideras que no ha estado a la altura de tus expectativas, te pedimos por favor que nos env√≠es un email a support@n26.com con m√°s informaci√≥n acerca de tu caso, para que podamos investigarlo y comprobar si se ajusta a nuestros est√°ndares de calidad.Un saludo.

name: Luciana T
title: Simply stay away - BEWARE
content: Simply stay away. All goes well, until it doesn't, until they randomly decide to block your account and access to your own funds.Since August 21, 2019 my account is unlawfully blocked. Numerous attempts to contact N26's customer service, gain further insight and solve this issue remained unsuccessful. I am meanwhile seven days without any access to my account. I have to assume that payments I initiated are not processed either. I urged them to take immediate steps and, yet, the only thing their customer agents on their chat are able to say is that my query is being handled, they have no visibility on anything else, and I shall receive an email soon (no ETA). Then, they close the chat. Summary:19.08.2019 ‚Äì I received an email requesting to re-verify my identity as a routine procedure that all banks have to follow, which I did straight away. In this email it stated that during the re-verification process I would be able to use my N26 card to make purchases or withdrawals, receive money, just would not be able to access my N26 app.21.08.2019 ‚Äì Whilst I was trying to pay for my taxi fare, my card was declined and a message on my screen appeared: ‚ÄúWe couldn‚Äôt process your transaction because your account has been blocked. We‚Äôll email you with details.‚Äù I contacted your support team via chat and I was told there was nothing that could be done, my ‚Äúaccount was seized‚Äù and they couldn‚Äôt give me more information apart from the fact that I‚Äôd be contacted soon by email. Several agents closed the chat on me without giving me any further information and refusing to escalate this issue. My funds were seized and I didn‚Äôt have access to it nor did I have any estimation of when N26 would provide an explanation or transfer my funds to another account. I promptly provided another account number for my money to be transferred.23.08.2019 ‚Äì I received an email stating that I haven‚Äôt followed the request to verify my identity, resulting in my N26 account being terminated. This is probably from an incorrect template, as I had re-verified my identity on the same date as I received the 1st email (which also stated that I had until the 09.09.2019 to do so. In the same email, there was a request to provide my new account details AGAIN (3rd time) for N26 to transfer my funds.Between 21.08 and 26.08, several direct debits have been declined and as I haven‚Äôt had access to my funds, I have been unable to settle them yet. As of now, I haven‚Äôt received my funds in the alternative account number I provided.I am elsewise forced to engage legal support and file for injunctive relieve ‚Äì demanding coverage of any potential costs or damage that will be caused by the unjustified seizure of my account.It's now the 28th of August and this issue is still pending.
reply: Hey Luciana,We apologise if you were not provided with a follow up regarding your case. Were you able to get your funds transferred to your alternative account? We advise you to reply directly to the email you received regarding this for further assistance. We apologise for the inconvenience this has caused you. You can contact us on Twitter or send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Best,Your N26 Support Team

content: Ein Stern ist leider noch immer zu viel...Normalerweise ist mir meine Zeit zu schade, um Bewertungen dieser Art zu schreiben, aber vor dieser Bank muss gewarnt werden. Den Hype um dieses Unternehmen betrachte ich mittlerweile als v√∂llig unberechtigt und Eigenschaften wie agil, flexibel und jung kann ich auch mit viel Phantasie nicht sehen.Nachdem ich mich vor einiger Zeit dort registriert hatte, den Legitimierungsprozess allerdings noch nicht abgeschlossen hatte, wollte ich dies vor einiger Zeit nachholen. In der Zwischenzeit hatte sich jedoch meine Handynummer ge√§ndert, was dazu f√ºhrte, dass der Legitimierungsprozess nicht wie gewohnt vollzogen werden konnte (irgendein Code wird an die Handynummer geschickt, setzt nat√ºrlich deren Aktualit√§t voraus). Nun denn, ich wurde w√§hrend der FaceTime Sitzung freundlich darauf hingewiesen, dass ich eine L√∂schung meiner Daten per Mail beantragen m√ºsse, um mich daraufhin wieder neu anmelden zu k√∂nnen. Die Dame sagte mir es w√ºrde maximal bis zum n√§chsten Tag dauern. Seitdem sind mehr als 2 Wochen vergangen. Nach mehrmaliger R√ºckmeldung meinerseits auf automatisch generierter E-Mails kam auch heute wieder eine. Die L√∂schung w√ºrde nun in Auftrag gegeben werden und ab Montag k√∂nne ich mich wieder neu anmelden. (Heute ist Dienstag) Ich habe daf√ºr keine Worte mehr. Doch, "danke" f√§llt mir ein. Danke daf√ºr, dass ich durch diesen absolut unversch√§mten und inkompetenten Prozess davor bewahrt wurde Kunde zu werden. Ich m√∂chte gar nicht wissen wie dort mit bestehenden Kunden umgegangen wird, wenn potentielle Neukunden schon so behandelt werden. Und dabei verstehe ich durchaus das Prinzip einer Online-Bank und das in Sachen Kundenservice (leider) h√§ufig ein paar Abstriche gemacht werden m√ºssen, aber dass es nun scheinbar gar keine Betreuung mehr gibt? Das ist mir ein R√§tsel. Somit: Vorsicht bei der Kontowahl. Hier darf kein Service erwartet werden.

Wenn du uns eine private Nachricht an unseren N26_Support Twitter Account: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09 oder √ºber unseren Facebook Account: https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/ schickst, w√ºrden wir uns freuen dir bei dem Problem helfen zu k√∂nnen.Gru√ü, dein N26 Team.

title: Fast and easy customer service
content: Fast and easy customer service, knew exactly what they were talking about and my problem was solved in matter of seconds. Highly suggest these lot.

name: Brent
title: Beware
content: Beware! This bank seems great. So easy to sign up, fast and efficient but this is only half the story. Behind it is a ruthless, uncaring, inefficient, and incompetent banking service. I am 61 years old and never encountered service like this in my life. They are currently holding my money, have closed my account without any good reason, blocked my card and refusing to respond to emails and help requests. I threatened the Police and they suddenly become interested, momentarily, and then reverted to nonsensical responses and now silence. I have no access to money and they refuse to tell me why saying this is 'an internal matter' and they can't tell me. How can closing my account and refusing me access to my money be an internal matter? This is absurd. It is tantamount to theft and they are behaving appallingly. This is a serious German Bank yet it feels like I am in the middle of a Nigerian scam. I am wasting days of precious time and getting nowhere. And still I have no access to my money.Next day. Great. My review has prompted a reply from N26. To N26... you have my email address, you have a bank account to transfer my money to, what is stopping you doing this now? This is absurd to be communicating with you through Trust Pilot. I have given up wanting to know why you have closed my account and blocked my access. You have established multiple times my authenticity. Now, could you please just transfer my money to me and let me know through an email when you have done this.
reply: Hi Brent,We sincerely apologise if this situation has inconvenienced you in any way. In accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. We follow these processes to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure. In the event your account is blocked, we will make contact with you via email. For this reason, our customer support team are unable to advise further on these situations via alternative communication channels.We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We hope that this can be resolved for you in a timely manner, and we will continue this correspondence via email.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: sophistic
title: Terrible customer support.
content: Eurice from customer support is giving misleading information about how your own business works. No polite at all, wasn't able to help on a serious situtation about abnormal charges and negative(!) balance on a debit card(!) while daily transaction limit was 0. Highlight of the conversation was:-"And we can be here checking all the transactions but your negative balance will not change" that was at least very helpful from a customer support agent when you are asking for help and trying to find out whats is going on.I also asked for case number and a copy of the conversation and I never got them.

We'd be happy to have another look into this for you again, but would require that you contact us via live chat once more. You can also then request your case number and transcript, and the agent can reach out to a senior in the event they require any assistance with your case.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Niklas G√∂tz
title: Almost perfect.
content: Almost perfect.I've been with N26 as my main bank account since November or December of 2018 and I've been very pleased with my experience so far. Design:The transparent card is amazing, let's be honest. Also the new card designs for the subscription models look really nice. The only downside I see is that my credit card number already faded away, maybe try a different paint? App:Everything you need is in the app, which was well programmed and easy to use. Personally I love to use the 'spaces' feature for budgeting.Also using 'Cash26' (available in Germany) to deposit cash has been a great experience. By the time I'm out of the store the money has already been put into my bank account.N26 is one of the few mobile banks I know of that also has a standard web interface you can use from the PC. To me this is very important.The downsides:- only 3 (or 5 if you're under 25 or use N26 as your primary bank) free withdrawals per month- The Maestro card is NOT compatible with Apple Pay / GooglePay even though those systems can work with Maestro (please add this feature, I use my Maestro card a lot)- Customer support is really busy in peak times or when there's a problem affecting multiple users, please hire more people. But even in those hard times the support team tries resolve your problems as fast as possible.

name: Matthew Beckett
title: Tech is good but customer service is horrendous.
content: Like many others here I've had bad experiences with N26's customer service. The first time while verifying my ID the woman just hung up on me when I kindly asked her to repeat what she had just said, so I had to start a new session and do everything over again. There was no way for me to know her name or report her after, so the customer service representatives aren't held accountable for their actions.The second time, I had a Metal card which comes with "Premium" customer service, but when I needed to change my phone number, I started a support session on my phone, but had to wait about 30 minutes. During that time my screen turned off and I lost the session, so I started over again but on my computer this time. I waited for an hour, and I was 3rd in place, but it was too late in the day so they just shut down their customer service completely and I had to try again the following day. Also note for those who use Spaces and Overdraft. You will be charged for Overdraft even if you have more than enough money to cover the overdraft in your Spaces. I had more than 1k‚Ç¨ in spaces but got charged for my main balance going negative. That's a scam if I ever saw one. Overall the app and tech is great, but N26 still falls short in a few too many places.
reply: Hi Matthew, thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. Outlining where you think we can improve helps us to prioritise where we need to improve, so we appreciate this. For any charges that were incurred,  we can get this sorted for you.  Please come on the chat so we can do this for you. This is available in:- Your N26 App: in the Service section within your control center - support - Live Chat- The N26 Web App: https://my.n26.com/, after you logged in- ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚ÄãThe N26 Support Center. Scroll to the bottom of the page and you will see "Open a chat" in a green box: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/other/how-do-i-contact-n26Best,Your N26 support team.

title: BEWARE N26......

BEWARE OF N26

name: Pertti Kovero
title: The mere fact that almost 20% of‚Ä¶
content: Strong avoid!The mere fact that almost 20% of reviews here are 1-star should raise alarms in every rationally thinking person. They have millions of customers but on the other hand they block tens of thousands of accounts daily - due to their faulty algorithms which flag transactions for no reason. Furthermore, because of the high volume of blocks and complaints relating to them the customer service is paralyzed. My experience is as follows: opened an account, transferred money into it, started using the app and card, used it for three weeks, nothing suspicious nothing illegal. Then one day when I had been using VPN to access television app from my home country, and had forgotten VPN "on" on my phone I opened the N26 app. It instantly asked to verify my Face-ID again, which I did. I also closed my VPN and logged successfully in again. Three hours from that I received an email that my account is going to be closed based on the very same terms which have been covered here in almost every review. My assumption is that N26 algorithms flagged my account because based on the IP-addresses it seemed that my account was accessed from two different countries within one minute. This would most likely also explain why a lot of N26 customers have been stranded at airports when all of the sudden their accounts are not working. In my case I was lucky. N26 gave me 14 days to empty my account and kept my app and card working. Not everyone is so lucky though. There seems to be three kinds of scenarios. Mine already mentioned, second where all transactions are blocked but the person is paradoxically being asked to empty the account, and third where the account is entirely blocked on the spot.Good luck with N26 account. I wouldn't trust them. I'm back using old fashioned banks where there's customer service who know what they're talking about and are able to provide a lot more than an apologetic spam letter which is soon sent out as an answer to this review, too.
reply: Hey,As a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users. You won't encounter issues when using your bank account if you don't breach our terms and conditions. If you have any concerns we advise you to reply directly to the email you received regarding this matter. Best,Your N26 support team

On occasion this takes longer, as we may have to reach out to you for some necessary information.We apologise for the experience you had with our customer service. We hope to offer the most efficient customer experience on every occasion, and we regret that this has not happened for you, and would like to learn from this. Please feel free to send an email to support@n26.com if you have any further feedback or require any assistance.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Denis Grahl
title: N26 L√ºgt und betr√ºgt!
content: Neues Update 3.09.2019Ihr k√∂nnt alle die Antwort lesen von N26!Die Bank ist nur am l√ºgen, es ist seit deren Antwort das Geld ist am n√§chsten Tag drauf, bereits 14 Tage vergangen und mein Geld ist immer noch nicht auf meinem Konto.Die Bank erz√§hlt eine Geschichte nach der anderen. Erst schreiben sie mir es dauert 12 Tage, bis das Geld wieder auf meinem Konto gutgeschrieben wird. Hier bei Trustpilot schreiben sie es ist bereits einen Tag sp√§ter auf meinem Konto.Jetzt zur Wahrheit, ich habe mein Geld was mir von der N26 geklaut worden ist immer noch nicht zur√ºck erhalten. Ich gehe jetzt nur noch zur Polizei und zur Verbraucherzentrale. Ich wei√ü einfach nicht mehr weiter.Antwort von N26 hier ist gelogen und ist so nicht passiert, dass Geld ist immer noch nicht auf meinem Konto eingetroffen.So wie es so hilfreich, hier von der N26 beantwortet wird! Ich erhalte einfach keine Hilfe von der Bank.Seit Monaten hat mir die Bank einfach Geld geklaut. Es wurde ein Betrag von einem Kauf zur√ºck erstattet und nein der Verk√§ufer hat den Betrag nicht eine Woche sp√§ter nochmal abgebucht sonder die Bank N26, die es sogar selbst best√§tigt hat. Es war angeblich ein technischer Fehler.Ich sollte dann daraufhin mehrer Dokumente ausf√ºllen und einreichen, alles getan.  Dann nach vier Wochen erhalte ich eine Antwort es war ein Kreuz Zuviel angegeben und habe es sofort neu eingereicht. Wieder vier Wochen am warten keine Antwort erhalten. √úber den Chat Support will ich garnicht erst anfangen jeder gibt eine andere Antwort und jeder redet bzw. Schreibt andere tatschen die nicht stimmen und absolut gelogen sind. Die Nachweise habe ich alle und es ist wirklich mehr als unversch√§mt, ich bin jetzt √ºber die Verbraucherzentrale gegangen und √ºber die √ñffentlichkeit. Die Bank gibt mir keine Antwort ich verdiene im Monat 1250‚Ç¨ und die haben mir 120‚Ç¨ einfach weggenommen was f√ºr mich wirklich lebensnotwendig war und ist. Ich hab privat dadurch nur Probleme gehabt.
reply: Hey Denis, danke f√ºr deine Mitteilung.Bei einem Chargeback kann es vorkommen, dass der H√§ndler auf ein 2nd PT zur√ºckgreift, wenn dieser die R√ºckauszahlung anfechten m√∂chte.In Zusammenarbeit mit Mastercard vermitteln wir an den H√§ndler und sammeln alle Dokumente mit dem H√§ndler, um herauszufinden, ob der Kunde oder der H√§ndler im Recht ist.In deinem Fall wurde bereits gestern herausgefunden, dass der H√§ndler im Unrecht ist und dein Geld bereits gestern an dich √ºberwiesen wurde.Dies sollte bis sp√§testens morgen auf deinem Konto ersichtlich sein.Wir senden dir diesbez√ºglich ebenfalls nochmal eine Email als Best√§tigung.Dein N26 Support-Team.

content: To add insult to injury N26 have now blocked my account, with my money in it, because of the damaging review I previously wrote!This unprofessional and vindictive bank asked me to re verify my identity, a very strange thing indeed, but I proceeded to do so.The process was not simple, their system is flawed, and I was locked out of the app before re submitting my ID. I then had to delete and re install the app. After submitting my ID I got an email saying N26 could not open a NEW account for me, obviously I was not applying for a new account, just trying to re submit my ID! I was informed, at the start of the inefficient and flawed process, that my card would be working and I could receive money into my account and spend it, but the app would not be working during the re verification process. The app stopped working before that and I wrote a damaging review of my terrible experience. After that N26 blocked my account and now I can not access my own money!This is a terrible, unprofessional, flawed and incompetent bank.AVOID COMPLETELY!!!

name: Jessica Burns
title: I CURRENTLY HAVE NO ACCESS TO MY MONEY
content: I CURRENTLY HAVE NO ACCESS TO MY MONEY This is the most appalling customer service I have ever experience. I have spent over 3+ hours today contacting customer support. I can currently not log into the app on my phone because I need to change my phone. I have contacted customer support 3 times about this, which is only a chat - there is no other option.The same thing happens each time. They verify my identity - ask for number on card, number of personal identity card and details of 5th last transaction. They then ask me for my new number and provide me with a code and inform me that I will recieve a phone call within 1 hr.So I don't get a call, I contact customer service AGAIN. I do the same identity verification AGAIN. I am told that they did infact try to call me 3 times. I had not 1 missed call!!! They tried to contact me on my old number(which I do not have) and then my new number,... but odly enough I did not have any notification of a missed call.The employee offers no explanation. Everything is clearly written from a book, unpersonalised and unable to thing for himself. He then GUARANTEES me 100 PER CENT. That all information is now correct and I will receive a phone call within 1 hour.I RECEIVE NO PHONE CALL.So as you can imagine by this stage I am fairly frustrated, after hearing lots of bad stories about N26 Customer support I recently decided to take a leap of faith and make N26 my main account.SO I CURRENTLY HAVE NO ACCESS TO MY MONEY SO I contact customer service again. Chat window ops up. SAME VERIFICATION PROCESS. Only to then be informed that "no sorry this phone number is being used with a different account you cannot use it"after I assured the employe that, that was in fact my telephone number....it turns out she 'had made a small mistake'.Then much to my frustration she completely disconnects the chat without further support. THIS IS DISGUSTING!!After this issue is resolved, I am leaving N26 and encouraging any friend or contact to do the same. This is about 12hr now since I have had no access to my account.SO I try a 4th attemptSAME PROCESSSAME VERIFICATIONI ask if I could possibly chat with someone higher up as obviously something with the callback process not working and it is quite important I gain access to my account as I need to pay a few urgent bills. The only response I receive is that It will work this time, without doubt!When I try to express my concern again the employeeFOR THE 4TH TIME DISCONNECTS THE CHAT!!!!!!!!!!!I AM COMPLETELY AT MY WITS END. WHAT A JOKE FOR A COMPANY. WHAT A JOKE FOR CUSTOMER SERVICEPLEASE LEARN FROM MY MISTAKE AND DO NOT TRUST THIS INCOMPETENT COMPANY WITH YOUR MONEY!during this whole process, I did as for a case or reference number. i was informed there was not one. I also asked for email confirmation that they did in fact call me. I was also informed that they could not provide me with this information either!!!!!!!

reply: Hi Julian,We're sorry to learn of the issues you have had receiving a transfer. We are unable to view incoming transfers into your account, as we are the recipient bank, but we can investigate with the result of this investigation.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

reply: Hi Max, N26 is legally obligated to verify our customers at regular intervals. Rest assured that this is a routine procedure that all banks have to follow. You can receive money, use your N26 debit card for purchases and withdrawals, receive transfers, perform direct debits and avail of any benefits you may have with the account, such as insurance or overdraft. Whilst the re-verification is taking place, you will be unable to initiate a debit transfer, but this will be reinstated as soon as you have been re-verified. We apologise for any inconvenience this has caused.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Team

reply: Hey Victoria, We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG ¬ß 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. As a result, we may ask you to verify the origin or source of your funds. If you receive such a request, just send the requested documents via email. There are no exceptions or bypasses for such checks. And in cases of non-compliance, your account may be seized and cancelled.Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. This practice ensures the safety of our customers and their transactions. The sooner we received the required documentation the faster the checks are done. Here are some tips to speed up the process:You can provide any receipt, bill, invoice, contract, or similar document that makes it possible for us to clearly identify the transaction in question and its origin and purpose. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots (as long as the original content of the document is easily readable).Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. If your documents don't clearly support your statements or you miss details, we may have to ask you again. Reply as soon as possible but within 14 days at the latest. Use the email you received from N26 to reply and send attachments. Our Customer Support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject. All the best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Andrei
title: It is really easy get account in N26
content: It is really easy get account in N26. Application has a really nice looking UI and you also have access to desktop version of the site. You also get Apple Pay integration and can use your phone/watch for purchases.Everything works fine until you suddenly get email stating you have "substantial violation", while the only purchases you did were in groceries and several times online. You feel sad that this happened and decide to get in contact with customer support. And then you understand the full headache of having N26 account. Customer support does not give you any explanation on what you did wrong instead they close chat. You get angry and decide to fully close your account and delete your personal data. However, it turns out that customer support does not even allow you to close your account earlier. And you end with account you cannot use and support that cannot answer you anything.Maybe someone will have better experience that me, but personally I will never recommend N26 to no-one.[UPDATED] Unfortunately I cannot answer anything to N26 reply. Both email and online chat did not want to give any explanation, this is understandable. Though still after dozens of emails I cannot request my account to be closed earlier without any proper reason. All questions asking why this cannot be done lead to no email reply or online chat closes. Overall customer support experience is really bad.

name: David Lee-Warner
title: Nobody should want to repeat our‚Ä¶
content: Nobody will want to repeat our experience with N26, 2018-2019N26 closed account unilaterally within 90 days!Pre-paid N26 Black account opened online in early August 2018.Account unilaterally closed by N26 Bank, with fourteen days email advance notice to account-holder, in early November 2018.Account credit balance on date of forced closure was ‚Ç¨4,125.52N26 gave no reply nor refund despite all contact attempts from Nov. 2018 to Feb. 2019 by the account-holder to secure refund of his balance until he, a UK citizen resident in Spain, complained to the ombudsman‚Äôs office of Deutsche Bundesbank (German central bank in Frankfurt) with a log of this banking relationship until April 2019.On May 24, 2019, N26 repaid the exact balance amount following a brief apology for their six-month delay.This fast, free, straightforward service by the German central bank for legitimate complaints is outstanding.I strongly recommend any N26 Bank customer suffering a similar clear-cut case of non-existent or unhelpful customer service from N26 Bank to document their complaint ‚Äì in meticulous chronological detail ‚Äì by email to the ombudsman‚Äôs office at:schlichtung@bundesbank dot deSchlichtungsstelle bei der Deutschen Bundesbank Gesch√§ftsstelleMY PUBLIC DISCLOSUREThe above facts transpired from August 2018 to May 2019 between N26 Bank GmbH, Klosterstra√üe 62, D-10179 Berlin, and a close relative of mine following my personal recommendation to try N26 Bank August 2018.I no longer recommend N26 Bank to anyone, anywhere.August 9, 2019 ‚Äì UPDATEThe German central bank, Deutsche Bundesbank, kindly sent my close relative ‚Äì by mail ‚Äì a copy of the N26 Bank letter signed by a new N26 managing director on May 27, 2019, explaining N26‚Äôs handling of this balance refund. I was stunned to discover a blatant untruth in the N26 response.N26 stated they telephoned the customer on May 23, 2019, for his bank account because they received no response to their May 15 email requesting his bank details when my relative had responded May 16, 2019, with full Spanish bank documentation ‚Äì May 15 is a bank holiday in Spain. Email server logs May 15 & 16, 2019, at backoffice.support@n26 dot com bear witness to this fact.ConclusionIf N26 Bank is capable of making inaccurate statements to Germany‚Äôs central bank then what level of service can any customer expect from upstart N26 Bank?This adds credibility to Trustpilot‚Äôs 18% bad reviews.
reply: Hi Andrei,We apologise for the inconvenience this has caused you. In accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. In cases of violation, these checks may indicate that our business relationship must be terminated. This is enacted by a dedicated internal department, and for this reason, customer support cannot advise further.We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We kindly ask that you respond to the email you would have received from us with any queries you may have.

title: I have been using N26 for several‚Ä¶
content: I have been using N26 for several years, from an early onset when the app first appeared. I was at first, and for quite some time, satisfied with their services.They have, however, changed a lot since then. Firstly, client service disappeared and it is now not possible to talk to any assitant - a service now sold in their "Metal" package!The App shows weaknesses when it comes to synchronising and transactions, on many occasions, remain 'hung' or pending in the app, practically 'freezing' funds for a minimum of 1 week. (The app's livechat support asked me to wait this long).International transactions now have to be done from Transferwise from a computer... not much of a tech feat...

reply: Hi Daniel, thank you very much for your review. We are sorry to hear you had some difficulties to reach out to us, we understand this can be frustrating.Our customer service is available on phone for all metal account owners, however all our customers can still contact us via live chat 24/7 in English. You can find more options on how to contact us in the following link: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/other/how-to-contact-n26.About synchronizing the app, the issue you mentioned seems to be a technical one. Usually in order to fix it you can follow this procedure: -unpair you device-uninstall the app -switch it off for a couple of minutes -install the app-repair the phoneAt this point you should be able to cancel the pending transactions.We are working to improve Transferwise experience and we are aware that at the moment it might take more time to send a transfer than it does in the App.We thank you for your understanding and collaboration. Your N26 Support team

name: Alexandra RC
title: Worst Bank I have ever banked with,Ive‚Ä¶
content: Worst Bank I have ever banked with,Ive had to take them to court stay clear ! Over ¬£800 missing I‚Äôve sent them the reciepts the transaction ID the APR number everything they need to trace a payment yet they are telling me they are unable to trace money.So basically you can send money to your own bank account and they can keep it because ‚Äúthey cannot trace funds‚Äù you pay ¬£15.00 a month for what exactly? The staff are rude,and laugh at your expense,they are also based in Germany so any issues with your money you have to contact a cross border claims court which is ridiculous and takes weeks ! Any Normal bank would trace the funds and open a payment investigation yet N26 refuse to do this,I‚Äôve been in tears and had staff laugh at me and have cracked jokes which I have kept proof of,I am mortified at the ordeal I have been through just to get my own money back.I‚Äôve involved lawyers and contacted the financial Ombudsman Service who have also told me the same,the money has been sent to my account therefore it‚Äôs N26s responsibility to find where this is.Transfers take weeks,refunds also can take upto a month,there is no contact number to phone them if any problem (as they are based in Germany) which costs you 60p a minute calling from the U.K.I have asked numerous times to speak to a manager or some kind of point of help and I‚Äôve been point blank refused.All I want is my money,I feel mentally and physically drained after trying my very hardest to resolve this and I‚Äôve never in my life experienced anything so disgusting from a bank you are supposed to trust with your money.It‚Äôs one big scam beware ... there are other banks like think money and monzo who I have banked with who are amazing.

If you need any further assistance you can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. reply: Hey,As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG ¬ß 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. Unfortunately, these obligations may also prevent us from disclosing any detail around such checks. Rest assured, once the review on your account is complete, an agent will contact you. We‚Äôre sorry that this is causing an inconvenience on your side and aim to complete this review as soon as possible.Best,Your N26 Support Team.

content: Literally the worst experience I've ever had with anything. I opened my account almost two months ago and still haven't received my card. A lot of N26 is tied to their mobile app which you can't access without having received the card. The first card was 'undeliverable' (?), and so I opened up a support chat and was told that they would order me a new one. I paid to have the card sent express as I have over 4000 euros in my account and need to pay rent! Turns out the absolute imbecile I talked to never actually ordered my card, so I was told another one would be ordered and express shipped free of charge. The next day I was yet to receive any confirmation (which I was told I should expect to receive) so I went to the support chat for (literally) the 10th time to find out more. I was assured that it had been ordered, but they offered to help me transfer money out of my n26 account into an account I hold with a REAL bank. An hour later, after taking photos of my passport and entering details upon details about anything and everything, I got to the final step:"Enter the ten digits on the back of your n26 card"I'm absolutely livid. The customer service rep simply apologised saying he 'was so focused on the problem at hand that [he]'d forgotten that [I] hadn't received a card yet'. If I could give n26 negative stars I would. A bunch of complete imbeciles trying to convince people they know what they're doing with a pretty website. STAY AWAY!!!!

name: Marcos III Perez
title: Amazing no-nonsense Bank that is Customer-Friendly
content: Amazing bank. I had my doubts at first because everyone was saying it is better to have a physical branch. What I immediately noticed is that they communicate well in English and the account was easy to set up. The mastercard came in only a few days later as well.No appointments and lining up at the bank needed. I opened my account at the office kitchen, during lunch break. That's how easy it is. Customer service representative was great.Of course, the app is very user-friendly and you get notifications per transaction, without fail so far. I also like the concept of "spaces" so you can set aside and lock money from your urge to spend it. Customer support is also easy to reach and they are very polite. All in all, amazing banking experience. Keep it up!

name: Alan Walker
title: Excellent simple bank account
content: Excellent simple bank account. It's even easier to load the card onto the ApplePay wallet using the N26 app than Apple's own wallet app. OutApples Apple.It doesn't have all the bells n whistles but it does what it does and does it well. Spaces, for example, is a super-easy way to ring-fence money for certain things so that you cannot spend that money on something else with your card. I created spaces for my holiday, one for the hotel, one for spending. I can then drag the money back to the main space when I need to.

name: Kerri

content: I‚Äôve had a very positive experience with N26 so far. The account was set up very fast and I received my card in a few days. However, I have had no issues with the bank, so I‚Äôm not sure what their customer help services are like. The app is so fuss-free, you can set and change your PIN on the app and, best of all, you get push notifications exactly as and when money has entered or left your account, I personally love it at this moment in time.

name: Nicole Keir
title: Rude. Took my money. Closing my account for no reason!
content: Absolute nightmare! Whilst on holiday I tried to withdraw some money using my N26 card from an atm then decided to cancel the transaction as the withdrawal charge was ridiculous so I decided to try a different atm to see that my card was rejected to insufficient funds and I thought that was odd I have money on the card so tried again again rejected to checked the app to find that the money had been taken off my account! Called the atm company and was told to contact my bank. I gave the atm company all the details I had from the withdrawal and contacted N26. My goodness what an absolute nightmare it‚Äôs been! Being told I have to do this and that which I did several times and it didn‚Äôt work. Got to the point where I had to fill in a form for a cash back refund or whatever. I was told once the form was sent off they would keep me updated with what was happening and they didn‚Äôt have a specific time frame for this. A couple of weeks had passed and hadn‚Äôt heard anything so gave them a quick email asking if there were any updates and I got the most blunt and rude reply. Telling me to be patient and they will update when they see any info and there‚Äôs no time frame for this. Couple more weeks passed.... nothing. Emailed again saying I was sorry for the bother and asked on the progress and was told that they will get in contact when they can and that it could take up to 36 days from when they send the form off to get the money back. Finally got an email saying that I would receive the credit in my account within the next 12 days. This was 4 days ago. Woke up to an email from them today saying they were closing my account for no apparent reason. I emailed asking why and waiting to hear back. Honestly such a bloody joke!
reply: Hey,We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers‚Äô needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers‚Äô issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with.If you do not receive your funds from the ATM this does not necessarily mean the money has been taken from your account. It is ''blocked'' and not taken from your account, it takes up to 12 days for the money to get back to the account. If after 12 days the money does no return to your account you will need to send an email with the charge back form filled. Please note that we need a hand written signature. You can send it to support@n26.comVia this link you will find our charge back form: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/fixing-an-issue/cards/how-to-get-my-money-back-in-case-of-fraud Here is some additional info:https://docs.n26.com/cs/Support+Center/chargeback_required_docs_EN.pdfWe would be more than happy to look into this with you. You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Regarding your account closure we kindly ask you to reply to the email you received for any further assistance. Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Christopher Klix (Ceekae)
title: N26 is a very innovative and modern banking solution
content: N26 is a very innovative and modern banking solution. If you are interested in having that kind of a bank to your side, then this is definitely the bank to go. Mobile payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay, direct feedback via a very well designed mobile app and web-app and a super advanced chatbot that can pretty much answer and solve half of your concerns without even needing to talk to a real human. But if you need to, all agents I work with so far have been very competent, polite and super helpful.But let me say that you really should want to support and ride the train of digital banking to be content with N26. It is not the best bank in the world, at least for now. It is on a very good path towards becoming it. But based on the fact that the basic account costs you literally 0$, so it's FREE, I can't tell you a reason not to create an account there and just give it a try yourself. And their Mastercards are looking pretty cool. I am very happy with my decision to use N26 as my primary bank account but it's not my one and only. Maybe in the near future.

reply: Hey,As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG ¬ß 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. reply: Hey Adriano,Thanks for taking the time to leave your review, and we're sorry to learn that you haven't enjoyed your experience with us thus far.All of our customer service agents are trained in the same manner and to the highest quality. Our agents are also offered follow-up training and support to ensure they are always knowledgeable and up to date with all new processes and topics that they will need to assist our customers with. In the event an agent is unsure on a topic they are assisting a customer with, they can reach out to senior support for help. You can also refer to our useful support center, which answers a lot of Frequently Asked Questions: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-startedIt is correct that our Black account has a contract of one year which is stated upon signing up. It is possible to cancel the account without a fee within the legal 14 day revocation period, but once this time has passed, the agreed upon fees must be paid for the remainder of the contract. You can cancel the auto renewal of the Black account in your mobile app by going to My Account > N26 Black > N26 Black ID > Cancel Membership. This must be done at least 30 days before the end of the current contract, and will cancel the subscription for the next year - not the current contract.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Team.

name: Adedeji
title: Very shocking service
content: Very shocking service . They froze my account over a month ago , shortly after I received a transfer of ¬£1050 from a sender who has sent me money multiple times over the last few months . They asked me for all sorts of documentation , including 3 months of the sender‚Äôs bank details . As well as asking about a transfer I made from another personal account of mine . I provided information about the transfers , only for them to ask about further transactions from months ago , again asking for bank statements . What happens when I provide those ? They ask about more transactions ? If they have issues with the money coming in I have asked them to contact Barclays . Customer service is unhelpful and they take days to reply to emails . They just sit on your money and gain interest . I wish I read the negative reviews before opening . I plan on taking this up with financial ombudsman .
reply: Hey Adedeji,We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG ¬ß 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems.As a result, we may ask you to verify the origin or source of your funds. If you receive such a request, just send the requested documents via email. There are no exceptions or bypasses for such checks. And in cases of non-compliance, your account may be seized and cancelled.Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. This practice ensures the safety of our customers and their transactions. The sooner we received the required documentation the faster the checks are done. Best,Your N26 Team

name: William Ellingham
title: An outstanding modern banking alternative
content: N26 as it stands is most of what a contemporary bank should be, and its innovations and usefulness are expanding daily.As an American expatriate living in Italy, I enjoy the alternative of maintaining a German account for its efficiency and international usefulness. It was also acceptably simple to open, which is hardly the case with traditional banks here.Big pluses are the lack of fees for maintaining the account and universal ATM use. I travel alot and this is considerably useful to me. I have also found my funds immediately accessibile upon transfer from TransferWise. The dynamic of this blows any conventional banking relationship away.Customer service is good but could be improved beyond the current navigation for support and their preferred online chat. That has been my single frustration to date though on the two occasions I had problems to resolve they were ultimately satisfied properly.I highly recommend N26.I am quite happy I discovered them.

name: Nikhil B
title: The services that they offer are‚Ä¶
content: The services that they offer are fantastic, but like many reviewers here, I had a terrible experience with their customer service. After that, I kept the card because the customer service got better so I gave them a second chance. Now, it has been 19 days since there has been a fraudulent transaction on my account. Cherry on the cake: I am temporarily abroad. They told me to wait for 12 days and explained why. I complied. I send them the dispute forms with the police complaint after the said 12 days. It has been more than a week now and still no response. I want to give them another chance, but how many times am I going to keep doing that? A great innovative banking idea, but very poor execution. Sadly, I will not recommend this bank just based on the fact that they do not take the unauthorized transactions seriously and are not able to reassure the client. I hope my unauthorized transaction will be re-credited back soon. Still waiting...Update: I was reimbursed 3.5 weeks after the initial unauthorised payment, so changed my rating from a one-star. So it took a while but they came through.

reply: Hey Nikhil,We apologise for keeping you waiting. If you don‚Äôt recognize a transaction or you‚Äôre sure you didn‚Äôt authorize it, blocking your card won‚Äôt be enough. In these cases you should immediately:Order a new card and mark your current one as stolen. Destroy your card by cutting it with scissors or a shredder. The chip, NFC antenna, and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately. Complete a dispute form (EU or UK). We‚Äôll take it from there and do our best to get your money back.Could you please reach out to our live chat support so we can take a closer look and provide you with an update? Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Matthieu
title: MEFIEZ VOUS DE N26
content: Si vous ouvrez un compte chez N26, sachez que vous prenez le risque de voir votre compte bloqu√© sans aucune raison valable ou compr√©hensible. Mais au-del√† de ce blocage inadmissible, ils vont encore plus loin ! ils converseront vos fonds durant des mois, pour certains cela fait 1 an qu‚Äôils n‚Äôont pas pu les r√©cup√©rer ! Et bien s√ªr, si l‚Äôon poste ici un message, ils vont r√©pondre avec leurs habituels refrain en mettant un lien concernant un article qu‚Äôils ont fait pour soit disant expliquer pourquoi des comptes sont ferm√©s et bloqu√©s chez eux, alors que cet article n‚Äôexplique rien de concret.De plus, m√™me si certains comptes sont bloqu√©s car des personnes n'avaient pas encore renseign√© leurs num√©ros fiscal (Et je re pr√©cise que ce n'est pas l'unique MOTIF de compte bloqu√©s !! ), la logique serait d'envoyer aux clients un mail leurs expliquant qu'ils ont 1 mois pour mettre cela √† jour ; plut√¥t que bloquer subitement le client en le laissant dans une grande probl√©matique sachant que pour certains N26 √©tait devenu le compte principal. Votre fa√ßon de proc√©der est scandaleuse, c'est une honte de voir un tel √©tablissement continuer avec de telles pratiques dans un pays comme l'Allemagne.
reply: Bonjour,Nous sommes d√©sol√©s pour cette mauvaise exp√©rience que vous avez connu avec nos services.N26 est soumis √† la r√©glementation bancaire en vigueur qui a notamment pour objectif d‚Äôassurer la protection des clients et de leurs √©conomies. En cas d'activit√© inhabituelle, le compte peut se retrouver suspendu le temps que notre service d√©di√© analyse et regularise la situation. En tant que banque disposant d'une licence Europ√©enne, nous ne pouvons en aucun cas fermer les comptes de nos clients sans raison valable.Concernant le num√©ro fiscal, nous envoyons un email pr√©ventif dans le cas ou vous ne l'auriez pas entr√© dans l'application afin de vous rappeler que cela est imp√©ratif.Par ailleurs nous avertissons automatiquement nos clients par email lorsqu'une mise √† jour est effectu√©e sur le compte. Nous sommes conscients que cette situation n‚Äôest pas √©vidente, mais nous pouvons vous assurer que N26 suit la l√©gislation √† la lettre et travaille pour r√©gler chaque situation au plus vite.Salutations,Votre √©quipe N26

name: Florian Russell
title: Wenn ein Mitarbeiter von N26 mit einem‚Ä¶
content: Wenn ein Mitarbeiter von N26 mit einem neuen Kunden (bei der Pass und Gesichtskontrolle) wie ein Wasserfall spricht, der Angestellte spricht zwar deutsch, aber mit einem pr√§gnanten ausl√§ndischen Accent, der Kunde auch Ausl√§nder war, was kann er von dem rapiden bla, bla bla verstehen?  Unh√∂flich, ohne koh√§renter Argumentation, der Angestellte von N26 nennt dem neuen Kunden irgend ein Gesetz, und nerv√∂s erinnert den Sprechpartner, ich kann nicht weiter, andere Kunden warten auf mich! Punkt! Wir sind Aussiedler, mein Mann spricht perfekt deutsch, ich dagegen habe oft Schwierigkeiten etwas offizielles zu formulieren, Die dunkel Heutige Frau, den Namen habe ich nicht verstanden, sprach schnell  wie ein Automat - ich nichts verstanden, war pl√∂tzlich in Eile weil ich bei Ihre Revolver Frage, nicht reagieren konnte und auf die Konfirmation von mein Mann gewartet habe was ich antworten musste. Wir haben satt st√§ndig nur von Rassismus oder Intoleranz zu h√∂ren, wir erwarten in Deutschland auch einmal geh√∂ret zu werden. Es ist ganz menschlich eine Frau aus Afrika zu einzustellen, sie soll doch zu erst auch menschlich mit den unbeholfenen Kunden umgehen! Nachdem wir fast 20 Minuten gewartet haben, darf sie nicht uns nach nicht einmal zwei Minuten sagen, es warten anderen Kunden, dann ein Gesetz Zahl nennen, was ihr wahrscheinlich das Recht gab, den Kunden mit den F√ºssen zu treten, Schliesslich ist die Card von N26 eine Debit-Card, ich arbeite als Schriftstellerin, also brauchte ich ein Card mit einer begrenzten Summe f√ºr meine Zahlungen in Ausland. Leider sind die Bedienung in Deutschland bald schlimmer als in Afrika L√§nder. Lernen Sie besser ihren Angestellte mit Menschen menschlich zu sprechen. Roboter haben wir genug! Diana Russell

The PIN may not be kept together with the Card, noted on the Card or written down, nor may it be made possible for third parties to obtain the PIN through similar deliberate acts on the part of the Cardholder."- point 11.1 (The Cardholder‚Äòs Liability up Until Receipt of the Card-Blocking Notice): "The Cardholder must pay for the loss caused by any unauthorized use prior to the Card-Blocking Notice in full if the Cardholder has intentionally or grossly negligently breached his/her duties of care under these terms and conditions or has acted with fraudulent intent. name: martijn turksema
title: n26 illegally holding my funds
content: Started with a N26 because of low costs to withdrawal money in exterior (I had the black paid card). In less then 6 weeks N26 froze the account (I did receive crypto payments on it). I got an email saying: we cannot continue offering you an account, your account will be closed in 2 weeks. In those 2 weeks you have time to withdrawal your remaining funds. Not true, I was not able to make any payment/transfer nor to withdrawal in cash. Endlessly contacted support and chat but no response (chat actually mentioned all time the same: we refer to the mail we have send you, I will close the chat now). Received the mail they will close my account on the 13th of may. 27th of May will be day that the account is officially closed. Now, on June 15 I‚Äôm still waiting for N26 to send me the funds that are still in my account (several hundreds of euros). They promote with service, technology etc etc but to be honest it is just a scam... holding illegally some persons money for over a month now. I send them one last mail (as a holy Mary) begging to send me the money (provided them with alternative Iban account on my name) but still no response. If they don‚Äôt solve it the next week, I feel forced to go to court, I‚Äôm sure there are more people out there with the same experience (reading different fora) so feel free to join me.

I now it's true because I tried with another bank and.. it worked !I need now to reuse my old classic bank credit card and pay extra fee for foreign currency... That's precisely the reason I chose N26 at the first place.I contacted N26 via livechat 2 times and they told me they will look into it. Never heard from them, it's been like 2 mounths now.Following N26 official staff answer > it has never been about transfering, it was a credit card payment , it worked with my N26 card at the begining and then not anymore.. N26 should work with every currency for credit card, isn't that right ?

title: Terrible Experience Not Just For Myself
content: There's plenty of people that have had their accounts locked away from them, whilst it hasn't happened to me yet I've now deleted the app and no longer use this bank. So that means I am unable close my account! Now I've received an email saying that I have a negative balance (which is the monthlymmembership) and that the email they sent to me would cost ¬£3 which is ridiculous! They'll also suspend my account within 2 months if I don't pay it off. Go ahead! I won't be using you thiefs again.AVOID THEM AT ALL COSTS!!

Your N26 Black contract lasts 12 months, with a revocation period of 14 days.In order to close your account, you must pay the remaining monthly fees. Once this is done, we'll be happy to proceed with your cancellation. You can find all these informations in your legal documents : https://n26.com/en-eu/legal-documents/blackWe hope this message was useful for you.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: Jean
title: Run away is a cardboard bank.
content: Run away is a cardboard bank.Your money is not safe and they're bullshitting you.They remove bad comments on facebook.SOS, I contacted the bundesbank and associations we are hundreds with our money blocked.And no customer service except a poor email that never answers...I have been a client with them since June 2017, account opened as a Frenchman but having its tax residence in Morocco.I declared these elements when I opened the account on the first day.And since then I haven't had any problems and I've been using my account regularly for 2 years.Except last night I received an email like hundreds of other people"Subject: Cancellation of your accountWe have recently identified a material breach of our terms and conditions of use on your account. Therefore, we are obliged to close your N26 account, in accordance with Article 19 (3) of our General Terms and Conditions of Use on an extraordinary basis.The closure of your account will take effect on:21.06.2019Your account remains operational until the date indicated. After termination, the use of the account, the application and the accompanying card will no longer be possible."Example of the bank's customers who received the same email:Search on Google : 60 Millions de consomateurs N26 comptes ferm√©I can understand that a bank wants to close its bank relationship, but I do not understand that it does not respect the notice they gave me in their emails, since they told me that I have until June 21 and that my account remains functional.Currently my account and card are not functional.24416.01‚Ç¨ are totaly block without any delay ...I find myself on the eve of a long weekend with:- A non-existent customer service that systematically refers us to the email and explains that it is two different services that manage the situation.- My account is blocked and my assets are frozen.- I can no longer use my card to pay online, make withdrawals or transfer money.I am stuck  with no money, no customer service and no one to turn to.And the bank is unreachable and can't actually answer me when they give me back my money.Customer service by chat, tells us to see the service by email and cuts the conversation.Great experience with a cardboard bank.Even in North Korea, I'm sure we'd have someone answering our phones after blocking our money...And this is a German bank????I wonder how Germany, which is so rigorous, can give banking licenses to people like that.SOS we're in a nightmareMessage for the community manager, no need to give us your copy/paste liest: As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG ¬ß 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. Rest assured, once the review on your account is complete, an agent will contact you.Already it is necessary to answer the customer by the customer service.I haven't received a message from you in two years.No phone calls, no emails, no text messages.And the BANG 24'416.01‚Ç¨ of blocked.And the worst thing is that you write to me in black and white that my account, my card and my application will remain functional until June 21.Except that's not true, everything's already blocked and I don't have access to my money anymore.I have tuition fees to pay to AEFE next week for my son. How do I do that?????I have to renew health insurance and I had planned to go on holiday in July.How do I do it?????I begged customer service to let me at least get ‚Ç¨500 out of the ‚Ç¨24,416.01Answer we can make no exception.But that's my money right there. But of course you don't care, it's a routine thing and you hide behind conditions that mean everything and nothing.I have already answered your email, I have already provided my bank details.An urgent SWIFT transfer is done within the same day.So there is a problem in your cardboard bank or should I say in your paper bank?Unless you're a shadow bank????????Hundreds of people complain on the French forums about having money blocked for weeks and months.You play with our money on trading programs?What exactly do you do with the money from your piegons?I don't even dare to write customer anymore, we are piegons.And I think the good comments are written by a community manager with fakes profiles.##### UPDATE 12 JUNE 2019 ####In any case, my message here has had an effect.I have finally been contacted and I hope to receive my transfer soon.The only downside is that they force me to receive my funds on my French account, but it's okay, fortunately I didn't close it.As soon as I receive my funds, I will delete this post.
reply: Hi Jean,As a licensed bank, we are obliged to abide by European banking processes. We are therefore evolving in a strictly regulated environment. Our teams are obliged to follow the same procedures as all other European banks. This includes carrying out routine checks on user accounts and transactions. We don't close accounts without reason, and we do our best to prevent bad situations for the people affected. We endeavour to contact you as soon as possible to inform you of our decision and advise you on the next steps.We understand the concern you have for the status of your account and the remaining funds, but we are unable to discuss sensitive information relating to your N26 account via this platform. We will continue this correspondence via email. We hope this can be resolved for you in a timely manner.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

I am frustrated to tell this thing to every customer care executive and in the end i get a message that the isue is escalated and nothing happens after even 2 weeks. Now the money would be blocked as i cant transfer any money without my phone number linked to my phone. You can not even talk verbally to any customer care executive unless you have their paid account of Black card. You cant even chat to them 24x7. To be honest my friend uses a DKB and its just way way beyond N26. In my experience if you want an example where you should not have an account is N26. Avoid it the best you can. content: Excellent! Quick and easy Banking. Easy account set up. Set up my account on my phone, in less than 10 mins I had a new bank account. I'm still amazed how quick transactions are, I always know how much is in my account, No waiting days for Irish banks to update transactions, I get notifications as I walk out of shops for purchases I've just made. I recently paid a bill online and got a notification form N26 before the companies website confirmation page came up, its that quick. Customer service is very German quick and efficient, can't complain about that.I'm still finding new stuff to try but so far I'm delighted with them.

name: Keeyan Nejad
title: Doesn't support the most basic functions
content: I really wanted to like N26 and to be able to use it as my primary account but it's just not possible.It doesn't support the most basic banking functions which I would expect on any bank account (this is all for UK accounts as of 2019-06-03):* Direct debit is not supported* No overdraft* No standing orders* Cannot save recipient details: This shocked me. It's such an easy feature to add. When I send money to a friend I expect it to be able to remember the contact details so I can use them again in the future.Finally the big selling point for me was that they supposedly had a fully functional website which I could use to send money and view my transaction history (most challenger banks for some reason don't have this). It turns out this isn't completely true. To send a transaction you still need to confirm on your phone which makes it quite pointless since the reason I want a website is for when I don't have access to my phone.To end on a positive note: The set up was fast and easy and the support is good. Their app looks pretty as well (although feature wise it could also use quite a bit of improvement).I will look at N26 again next year and I hope they have fixed all of these issues. If they have then I will gladly give them another try. Oh well, back to a traditional bank for now it seems :(EDIT: Reply to N26When I contacted your support I was told that direct debit was not supported (about a month ago). Well I guess that's one less thing stopping me from using N26.As for the security of paired devices; a phone is not necessary more secure than a computer. Most banks are fine with using a computer without the phone, I see no reason why N26 should be any different. Also if you want extra security you could use a standard like OTP (e.g. with Google Authenticator) that way it is up to the customers if they want to have the app installed on their phone and if they want to have the OTP credentials on other devices like their computers.
