name: Pol Smith
title: Money blocked for crypto, they won't give money back
content: Hi,This is a warning for people wanting to open an account with N26.I am Pol Smith. My N26 Credit Card ID is XXXMy IBAN is XXXMy date of birth XXX (information removed due to N26 security issues)My account has been cancelled in an extremely unfair way. I don't know exactly why N26 decided my account to be cancelled, but I think it must be due to having transferred funds to Coinbase (cryptocurrencies exchange), which was the last wire transfer I tried to do. This transfer was intended to do on 15.05.2019 for the amount of 1,366.27 EUR, and it bounced back the same day. 2 days later, on 17.05.2019, my N26 bank account was blocked and I haven't had access to my money since then.N26 says they run a "routine check" on accounts to "keep accounts secure". However, they never end the "investigation" while they keeping the money unaccessible on the account.In any case - according to this Cancellation Email, my account will remain functional up until 31.05.2019, so I should move my full balance before that. Here is an extract from this email:---This termination is effective as of: 31.05.2019 Your account remains functional until the stated date. After termination, usage of the account, the app, as well as the card issued with it, is no longer possible. We would like to make sure your remaining funds get transfered to you. Please transfer your funds to an alternative bank account before the date of termination. ---Contrary to what the Cancellation Email says, my N26 account and my N26 credit card have not been functional since then, and therefore I haven't been able to withdraw nor use or transfer my money out of the N26 account.After having told this issue to N26 several times by email, live chat, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram, now N26 are not doing anything in order to give me my money back. They don't let me transfer my money out, the credit card and the account are totally blocked (note it's note 31.05.2019 yet) and N26 email support is not transferring my funds to an alternative bank account even though I sent them the IBAN, BIC and an official proof for my alternative bank account to be mine. I sent these document 7 days ago and about 5 times since then, and still no reply.Live chat has told me my account is "under investigation" and "being worked on by the appropriate department". However, there is no estimated date, days pass by and there is no estimated day, not even an email or update.I followed the steps mentioned on the page "How to file a Complaint" from N26 website, but that doesn't seem to make N26 really work on my case or resolve the case either.N26 say "we must close an account after these checks have been completed". In reality, what N26 does is not answering any emails and keep saying they are "investigating my case". Seems this "investigation process" will never end.N26 say they are "regulated and licensed bank, we are obliged to adhere to European banking processes. We don't close accounts without a good reason". However, real and non-fraudulent banks don't cancel accounts for trying to make a transfer to a cryptocurrency exchange like Coinbase, like it happened to me. N26: is trying to make a transfer to Coinbase a really good reason for which a bank should cancel and block all access to the money from a user, not letting the customer transfer it out?N26 says "We endeavour to contact you as soon as possible to inform you of our decision". However, in reality they have no phone number to contact, they don't reply emails and by live chat they just say to have "no further information" and just close the chat. Whenever I messaged N26 that this was very urgent as I needed my full balance (2,366.27 EUR) in my account as soon as possible, they either didn't reply or said I should wait to get an email (which never arrives).I think the only way to make N26 reply to me might be writing this review (at least, I might get an automated reply as they do with all Trustpilot reviews). Or better, maybe the only and "real" solution to get money back might be contacting Ombudsmand, Bafin, etc.EDIT #1: N26 did reply to this review. According to their reply, I removed sensitive information (Credit card Id,  IBAN and date of birth) of my N26 account in this review. They also mentioned they cant provide further information in here. However, they are not providing information on any channel either,  since I am not being answered by email either.EDIT #2: (27.05.2019) I just received an email from N26 with the following text:---Hey Pol,Thanks for getting in touch!I can confirm that we have received your document with your bank details and we already have a dedicated Team handling it now. We will contact you as soon as we have completed this process.We will try to be as brief as possible, we appreciate your patience.---EDIT #3 (28.05.2019) I just received an email from N26 with the following text:---Dear Pol, Thank you for your emails. Please be assured we continue to work on your case. As this is a complicated and complex process, it will take time for us to resolve. Nevertheless, we have requested this case to be prioritised and will update you as soon as we have more information. I sincerely appreciate your continued patience. We will be in touch again soon. name: Sandeep Golechha

content: I like to solution to banking. They have a simple to use app and most things can be solved by customer service who do want to listen to you. There are a few things which they need to add to the service to get a higher rating and make them easier, which I have ben told baby customer service are coming:1) Saving the payment data and the reference - for regular payments it is a problem to keep putting in bank info. You want to be able to save it and then make the payment. Especially if this is a regular payment, such as a credit card or rent payment, which are typically larger value payments. I often send a small amount and then a larger amount once I know the funds have been received. It can be quite scary not being able to do this.2) Payments to large corporates - It would be good when making a transfer if the large corporate information could be searched so you don't have to go and put it in yourself. some banks have this info and I'm sure N26 could get that as well.3) Statements - a facility to get monthly statements emailed would be helpful as again I cant see how that can be done. This is important as bank statements become a proof of address as well.I believe this service is still new but the banking is very good and easy to setup and use. I recommend this to everyone but believe it will be much better once the above are done.

content: I've been using N26 since 2016, and I have to say... It's one of the best banks for Euro accounts. The instant transaction history and balance is the top feature. I would recommand to anyone that is comfortable not having a physical location or does not need someone to talk to about finances. For me it's perfect. I hate having to deal with people telling me how to (not) spend my money, and N26 doesn't care at all about what I'm buying.

name: Francois
title: Great bank if you value speed and simplicity
content: Great bank if you value the philosophy that secure banking does not have to mean annoying-to-use  and slow banking. The web interface, as well as the app are clean, simple and easy to use. No ridiculously annoying procedures with little extra calculators you have to carry around. Biometrics is enough! No intervention of the bank needed for every little thing. International transfers are done and handled the same as local transfers and take 24h at the most within the SEPA domain.Support staff is easy and fast to reach through the chat function, but they can be a bit impatient sometimes and don't let you finish your question. Better type up your question before and then cut& past it in the chat window.I would recommend this bank to anybody living somewhere in the European Union and moves around a lot. No permanent residence address needed, just a valid passport or EU ID card.

name: Abdul Rohim
title: Modern Day Con Artists
content: I have been with N26 when they first were established in Germany, and have been with them since the beginning, they are a great bank when things are going okay. Great App and security features, however when you travel abroad and have issues with foreign exchange transactions e.g. duplicate transactions and contact there customer service team. You are met by some of the rudest inconsiderate members off staff one has ever in countered. So if you would like to see a fancy app which looks great on the outside but is rotten at its core I suggest N26 is the bank to be with.
reply: Hey Abdul,Thanks for your feedback! We regret to hear that you were provided such a poor customer experience.	Most transactions are authorizations made by the merchant. They are there to test whether your card data is valid and whether the transaction can go through. The amount is simply blocked and should be automatically credited back onto your account within ten working days.You can read more about this by heading over to this article from our Support Center: https://support.n26.com/en-de/fixing-an-issue/payments-and-transfer/why-was-i-charged-twiceBest regards,Your N26 Support Team

title: Very satisfied
content: When I was trying to withdraw the cash from an ATM, the transaction was suddenly cancelled and I did not received the cash. However I noticed that the amount of cash I wanted to withdraw was destructed from my account. I quickly contacted to the support team via robot chat. It gave me good and easy instructions to solve the problem. As they instructed, I waited my statements to be updated, and then as soon as it was done I filled up the form and sent it to the support team. Now everything is fine. The most amazed parts were about that the problematic transaction was not written on the statements and that the statements are updated quite fast so that I can check them time to time. Perhaps it is normal for this kind of business. However, in this situation, I was so relieved because it was an actual proof for the case. Thank you for your works everyone.

name: Dennis
title: N26 - Die Moderne Steinzeitbank
content: Der Support ist absolut unterirdisch. Er kommt fast an den Klarna Support ran, aber so schlimm ist er dann doch nicht. Einen Freund geworben und nach 2 Jahren noch keine Pr√§mie erhalten. Support wollte die Angelegenheit vor einem Jahr kl√§ren und mir eine E-Mail zukommen lassen. (Nat√ºrlich kam nichts.) Das war mir aber auch klar. Das kenne ich ja schon vom Klarna Support. Die gute alte "Wir schicken dir bald mehr Infos per E-Mail" Taktik um den Kunden schnellstm√∂glich los zu werden und dann drauf hoffen, dass der Kunde die Angelegenheit vergisst. Einzahlungsm√∂glichkeiten SEHR begrenzt. Bei schnellen F√§llen z.B anstehenden Lastschriften muss man sofort handeln, da N26 einem erst Tagesgleich bekannt gibt, dass eine Lastschrift ansteht. (Nat√ºrlich nur, da es Gesetzlich vorgeschrieben ist, ansonsten w√ºrde N26 einen voll in die R√ºcklastschrift laufen lassen.) Nun kriegt man also um 10 Uhr morgens eine sch√∂ne E-mail, dass man bis 18 Uhr Zeit hat das Konto aufzuladen und man muss sich von seinem Hauptkonto Geld abheben und zu Rewe fahren um es (mit Geb√ºhren) einzuzahlen. Instant √úberweisungen, Paypal, Kreditkarten einzahlung, Sofort √úberweisung, unterst√ºtzt N26, die modernste Bank Deutschlands nat√ºrlich nicht und so sind √úberweisungen tagesgleich nat√ºrlich auch nicht m√∂glich. Wieso auch, der Barzahlen Service, der schon 3 mal  Offline war und Geb√ºhren zieht ist nat√ºrlich die bessere Variante.Auf einen Telefon Support wurde aus Kostengr√ºnden nat√ºrlich sofort verzichtet, wenn man sich keinen Premium Rang kauft.
reply: Hey Dennis, danke f√ºr dein Feedback.Wir entschuldigen uns f√ºr diese Unannehmlichkeiten.Wir sind hier um dir zu helfen und um deine versprochene Belohnung f√ºr das einladen von anderen N26 Kunden zu erhalten. Sende uns doch bitte eine private Nachricht an unseren Twitter N26 Support Account oder eine direkte Nachricht an unseren Facebook N26DE Account.Wir w√§ren Gl√ºcklich dir helfen zu k√∂nnen.Gr√º√üe, dein N26 Support Team.

name: ZDL
title: Good until I had an issue with a transaction
content: Had so far a great experience with them; very easy and fast account opening process. The MasterCard arrived two days later. Account and card do what they are meant to do and their App design and functionality are fab. Sadly, I ran into a spot of trouble with them, when I asked for a direct debit to be reversed. The original message was, that I should see the funds back, ‚Äúshortly‚Äù, then four days later it was within ‚Äúthe next 48 hours‚Äù. This did not happen either, and now the communication around the re-credit has become rather elusive. ‚ÄúReal soon‚Äù is the best I get. Given that I was so happy with them, this is rather disappointing: As a bank and financial institution their communicated timelines need to be dependable, as I am making representations on the back of those. As always in finance there are repercussions, if I need to backtrack on my promises.Checking the news, though, it appears, that I am not the only one with this concern as the German BaFin appears to have unearthed similar issues. Hopefully they manage to improve around this area, as I can otherwise recommend N26.

title: The people with good reviews on this‚Ä¶ DON'T DO IT!
content: The people with good reviews on this online bank are obviously working for them or are robots. Terrible customer service, they sell it as ¬£0.00 Monthly fee but actually if you want the metal card you pay a month fee that lock you up for a year without they being clear about it. so be careful. No company should lock you up for any term. If they believe in their value they wouldn't be so fearful and wanting to force you to stay. and if you cancel you must pay the remaining of the contract even if you have not used the card or their services.. to me they are coming with the same same same old banking bs.. they give you nothing for a lot!!! I wouldn't be surprise if their stay in business just how high tariffs will go up!!! Really regret signing up with this people. I have never received the card, and was being charged for 2 months without my knowledge and then after requesting to cancel it they offered to refund me the amount and yet took another 3 weeks for my card to arrive. finally I had enough and wanted to just cancel and they are making all attempts to delay it and very difficult for me to do so. Goodluck

reply: Hi Helder,Thank you for your feedback.There is a monthly fee of ¬£14.90 for our premium metal account which is listed upon signing up for your account, if you choose to opt for premium. In accordance with the terms and conditions of our metal account, there is a 30-day revocation period in which a customer is free to revoke their premium account without incurring any charge from us. Once this 30 day period has passed, the remainder of the contract which was agreed upon must be completed. The choice we give all customers is either to utilise the metal account and its benefits for the period of the contract, or to cancel your account and pay the remainder of the agreed fees for the remaining period.We are sorry to hear that the delivery of your card was delayed, and we hope you have had no issue with the card since. Please reach out to us if there are any further issues.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Sans Souci
title: Avoid N26
content: I'm not someone who'd usually write a review. However on this occasion I feel obliged so that should someone else do their due diligence in the future and read this, they might think twice. As I should have done myself but was hooked in with the modern marketing.Like others have experienced, notification of account closure was given without reason after the source of a transaction was required to be proven. The source statement was provided, and then notification of closure notice was given. No explanation.A Large sum of money was held in escrow which prevented me from honouring my commitments during this checking process costing me tensions in relationships I've worked hard to develop as a freelancer over the years as well as additional money to settle the original commitments.Customer service is appalling and stressful. This business has no future even if Valentin Stalf believe's otherwise. As a business owner myself, the customer care & communication is everything.
reply: Hi Sans,Thank you for your feedback.As you may know, N26 has held a European banking license since July 2016, and thus, we are obliged to act in accordance with European banking processes. We are obliged to carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. Sometimes, the result of these checks show that an account must be closed. In the event this happens, we endeavour to contact you to advise you of the decision with 48 hours.We apologise for any inconvenience or stress that this decision may have caused you. In the interest of account security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through this channel. We will continue this correspondence through your registered email address.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Team

reply: Hey Sherieffe,Thanks for taking the time to provide us with your feedback! We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions. These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. As a result, we may ask you to verify the origin or source of your funds. If you receive such a request, just send the requested documents via email. There are no exceptions or bypasses for such checks. You will be contacted by email. Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Brandon Wyles
title: Absolute joke of a Bank, do not recommend!
content: Been using N26 for about a year now as a bills account. I make monthly transfers from my personal account on a once or twice monthly basis, never gone over 10 transactions a month.This month is where N26 has really let me down; I'm moving in with the other half, and we both transferred deposit and first month payment into the account (10th May) totalling ¬£1000 into the account. My payment went through fine, and the other half's not so lucky.My account has been in review since with the other halfs payment missing from the account completely. We are supposed to be moving in this Friday (17th May), but with no signs of the money being in the account this has caused a lot of stress between us.I contacted customer services on Saturday (11th May) who informed me the money would be in by Monday (13th May) - didn't happen. Contacted customer services on Tuesday (14th May) Where I was told my account is under investigation and couldn't provide further details.When this is resolved, I have no doubts at all I'll be closing the account, and won't look back. No sense of urgency in resolving my account issue.EDIT #1: N26 emailed me 2 mins after posting this review (11:47am), asking to provide addition information. I responded with additional information at 12:01pm. Still no sign of Friday nights transfer within my account after providing screenshots of the transaction from each account - now being asked of proof we're moving house. To which I've provided a screenshot of our application and an email between me and my estate agents confirming contact/move in is on the 17th May. Was this needed, even after providing proof of where the money came from? Eagerly awaiting a further response.EDIT #2: N26 emailed to confirm they've sent the information over the the relative department (1:44PM) - Still missing payment from the other half, from Friday 10th. The closer it gets to Friday 17th the more stress we are feeling, all from an issue many others have previously talked about. Surely a phone call about this matter would have been far more sufficient if the case is this critical - alike a regular bank?EDIT #3: N26 emailed again (2:57PM) saying they have completed 'routine checks' and everything should be back as normal. But the payment from the other half is still missing. Very disappointing so far, The response time has defiantly increased since leaving a negative review, yet the underlying problem has yet been resolved - and shouldn't take a bad review to jump on a problem.EDIT #4: As end of the day draws near (4:15pm), I contacted customer support via the live chat asking if I could have further clarification on where my money was. To be honest the support agent was probably the most helpful agent so far - by providing me with the complaints email and advised the case had in fact not been completed - even after saying I could use my account as normal.EDIT #5: 5:15pm now, with no further correspondence, or notice when we will receive our money. Formal complaint has been sent to the complaints address now.EDIT #6: Sent another email as its now the last day until me and the other half move in together (16th at 9:45am), Still missing a ¬£400 payment - Not acceptable.EDIT #7: We've received a letter from Lloyds Bank (the other half's bank) as they have also investigated and tracked the payment  Confirming N26 have the funds, I've provided everything required and N26 has confirmed everything has been sorted with my account. So, Where is our money? Can't believe it's quicker to investigate and track down the payment rather N26 Just release our money...EDIT #8: This is getting very long winded, I've had to leave work early due to the stress of moving tomorrow with no money in my account. Are N26 going to cover my losses for today? Doubtful. We are so stresses and is causing tension between me and the other half. Was told via live chat the money could have been refunded - REFUNDED? Imagine if i just sold my car to someone, and the had a car and their money back - you simply can't do that?! I highly suggest N26 give us our money now, a call would be nice about now explaining whats going on.EDIT #9 (Conclusion): I Finally received my money back on Thursday 16th May at around 4pm. The sheer stress this has caused is beyond belief. I'm still without an explanation and formal apology for the whole fiasco. Will be tying the account up and closing the account in the coming few days.To be completely honest, N26 does have potential, the app is easy to use and the interface is good, just a shame about customer experience is abysmal.
reply: Hi Brandon,In accordance with certain European banking processes, we are legally obliged to carry out regular routine checks on user accounts and transactions. In the event we require proof of the origin of a transaction, we endeavour to reach out to the affected customer as soon as possible, so as to not delay the process.It is possible in some cases that a transfer may also fail for a number of reasons. In the event this happens, only the sending bank can track the funds. They need to do this through an official Payment Investigation rather than a Transfer Confirmation, as this will only prove that the transaction has left the sending account, rather than tracking its precise whereabouts. In the event an official Payment Investigation is carried out and states that the funds are with N26, we encourage you email it to us to be reviewed.We would like to apologise for any stress this situation has put you under. For security reasons, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through this channel. We hope that this can be resolved in a timely manner, and will continue this correspondence via your registered email address.Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Niels Bauman
title: Tired of shady banks
content: Tired of shady banks that only promote dirt in the baking environment. Improve your Customer service and we can start talking!
reply: Hi Niels,Thank you for your feedback.We regret to learn that your experience with us has not been positive thus far. All of our Customer Service agents are trained in the same manner and to the highest quality. Our agents are also offered follow-up training and support to ensure they are always knowledgeable and up to date with all new processes and topics that they will need to assist our customers with. In the event an agent is unsure on a topic they are assisting a customer with, they can reach out to senior support for help.We hope that we have the opportunity to make amends for you in future.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Team.

name: Gazingburg Myllanzy
title: Try N26 for a secure online banking service
content: I never actually trusted online banking services until I came across an advertisement of an ongoing promo of N26 in an a fitness app I am using. I decided to give it a shot and trust me, I am more than satisfied with the services provided by N26. I have absolute control of my bank account; I can do anything from sending and receiving funds to deactivating and reactivating my debit card on the N26 android app on my phone without bothering to go to the bank. All thanks to N26. I can boldly recommend N26's services to every individual i know

name: Aus meiner Erfahrung heraus ...
title: Internet-Betrug √ºber N26‚Ä¶
content: Internet-Betrug √ºber N26 "abgewickelt"...Man muss sich schon mal √ºberlegen, sowohl als potenzieller Kunde, wie auch als √úberweisender, ob man mit der N26-Bank zusammenarbeiten will.Wem es nichts ausmacht, sein Konto bei der gleichen Bank, wie zahlreiche Betr√ºger zu haben, bitte ...Wer auf ein Konto √ºberweisen will, dass bei einer Bank ist, die Betrug aufgrund mangelhafter Sicherheitsverfahren zumindestens beg√ºnstig, bitte ...Ich jedenfalls nicht !Die Bank zeigt sich in einem Betrugsfall sehr unkooperativ und zudem noch sehr langsam, also das glatte Gegenteil einer modernen Internet-Bank. Ich denke, dass dieses Gesch√§ftsmodell geschlossen werden sollte, bevor noch mehr Menschen ihr Geld in dubiosen Kan√§len verlieren. Meine Ansicht dazu ...
reply: Hey! Danke f√ºr dein Feedback.Sollten Mitmenschen auf Identit√§tsdiebstahl-Betrug hereinfallen, ist dies immer sehr bedauerlich.Sobald wir davon mitbekommen, unternehmen wir alle n√∂tigen Schritte: Konto einfrieren, Konto schlie√üen, mit den Beh√∂rden zusammen arbeiten, den gesch√§digten helfen und die Betr√ºger dingfest machen.Wir entwickeln weitere Ma√ünahmen, damit sich Kunden und Nicht-Kunden gegen sowas sch√ºtzen k√∂nnen: https://n26.com/de-de/sicherheit https://n26.com/de-de/blog/phishing-attacken-auf-bankkonto-vorbeugenWir entschuldigen uns f√ºr alle Unannehmlichkeiten.Dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Alessandro
title: Very bad.
content: Very bad.I opened an account with N26 about 6 months ago, than after 2 months I received an e-mail from them saying that the account was closed because of a substantial violation of the terms and conditions. Very funny because I had not used the card at all and never paid any money in it.What violation? Because the card had not been used for 2 months?Or something bad happened with my account without my knowledge and you guys did not want to say it to avoid being talked about.I replied the e-mail asking for more details of what happened, but never got any response, so very poor customer service.This is the e-mail I received:To ensure our customers‚Äô privacy and account safety , we are obliged to run routine checks on accounts and transactions.Unfortunately, we recently identified a substantial violation of our terms and conditions agreement. Section A14.2 of our Terms and Conditions for Banking - UK* states that we reserve the right to terminate user accounts without prior notice in cases of a substantial violation. Accordingly, we are required to terminate your N26 account. This termination is effective immediately.Usage of the account, the app, as well as the card issued with it, is no longer possible.Thank you for your understanding.Kind regards,N26 Bank GmbH
reply: Hi Alessandro,Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback.In accordance with certain European banking processes, we are obliged to carry out regular routine checks on user accounts and transactions. If the result of these checks shows that your account with us must be closed, we endeavour to contact you via email within 48 hours informing you of our decision, for example with the above email you have attached. This process is carried out by a dedicated internal department, and for this reason, our customer support team are unable to advise further on these situations via alternative communication channels.We apologise for any disappointment caused.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

Everything is clear and in case it isn't - there are friendly employees waiting for you to ask questions you're concerned about. Also, money transfers very fast. Highly recommended!

name: Lion Summerbell
title: Unbelievably bad customer support
content: Unbelievably bad customer support. Their app wouldn't send me a pairing code (without which you cannot approve any transfers) and customer service REPEATEDLY told me that they could only provide a code over the phone THEN NEVER CALLED. What a wonderful bank that doesn't allow you access to YOUR OWN MONEY.
reply: Hi Lion,Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. This assists us greatly in process development and improvement for the future.As security is our main priority, we abide by strict verification processes to ensure that your account is kept safe and secure. We have found that, in the interest of account security, providing pairing codes via a phone call once you have been fully verified is the most secure way to pair and unpair the device which grants you full access to your account. We wish to be absolutely sure that we are speaking with the account holder, and a phone call is one of the safest ways to do so. We endeavour to call you within 30 minutes of your request, and we apologise if this has not happened for you on this occasion. We will pass your feedback on internally, and we encourage you to email ideas@n26.com with any improvement suggestions that you may have.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Andrew Itabor
title: HIDING BEHIND THE LAW. CLEAR EMAIL SEND US YOUR ACOOUNT
content: I know that many out there are judgemental and quick to find fault but what I want anyone reading to do is to focus on the facts below,N26 has not given a reason for their actions on my account since April 9th - May14th which is 35days.On April 26th N26 emailed to request for a bank account to transfer my funds. In 15mins replied with authentic documents and bank card photo. which they claimed I should have sent to support and not replied to the email requesting this document. This was May1stBetween May 1-3rd I got confirmation after a online chat that the appropriate department has been forwarded my documents and I will hear from them in 1-2days. Today is May 14th and still no transfer of funds or positive communication.WHATEVER N26 REASONS ARE, THEY HAVE MADE A DECISION TO SEND MY MONEY. SO WHY GIVE ME A RUN AROUND?Below are some emails receivedHey Andrew,Thanks for getting in touch!Please correspond directly with the email you have received, I am very sorry Customer Service has no information for you at this time.Have a great day,PhilipN26 Customer Service N26 Bank GmbH | Managing Directors: Markus Gunter, Richard Groeneveld Klosterstra√üe 62 | 10179 Berlin | Germany HRB ID: 170602B (Berlin District Court Charlottenburg) | VAT ID: DE 30/595/7096==============Hey  Andrew, Thanks for your email and for the documents you provided; we forwarded them to the dept. in charge for your folder.We will come back to you as soon as possible.Have a nice day, N26 Bank GmbH Managing Directors: Markus Gunter, Matthias Oetken Klosterstra√üe 62 | 10179 Berlin | Germany HRB ID: 170602B (Berlin District Court Charlottenburg) | VAT ID: DE 30/595/7096.--------------- Original Message ---------------FromSent 01.05.2019 11:17ToSubject: FW: 04908925From:Sent: 01 May 2019 09:19Subject: RE: 04908925Hello,I submitted a bank verified copy of my Nationwide bank statement as requested in less than 15mins of receiving your email requesting that I provide you with this documentation. Note that your N26 bank has previously credited this same account which bears my name, so practically and legally there should be no cause for delay.Today is 1st of May which means that any transaction thresholds limiting my/your ability to make transactions is over and I can make transactions in accordance with your terms and conditions.I would like to state that as a financial institution in a customer facing industry you have failed to provide any details whatsoever regarding the restrictions placed on my account. So how can I address any dispute or issues arising?I would be forced to take FURTHER STEPS INCLUDING LEGAL ACTION and compensation if you fail to address this issue of releasing my funds promptly.RegardsAndrewSent from Mail for WindoSent: Friday, April 26, 2019 9:1Subject: 04908925Hey Andrew,In order to be able to transfer the remaining funds from your N26 account, we kindly ask you to send us an official bank statement of the desired recipient account, with the following information clearly visible:* Beneficiary Name (name of the account holder)* Account number* Sort codePlease note that this account should be in your name.Thank you for your cooperation.Kind regards,Your N26 TeamN26 Bank GmbH | Managing Directors: Markus Gunter, Matthias OetkenKlosterstra√üe 62 | 10179 Berlin | GermanyHRB ID: 170602B (Berlin District Court Charlottenburg) | VAT ID: DE 30/595/7096. ref:_00D24H3gm._5001o3RnyAL:refAFTER THE EMAIL AND TRUST PILOT REVIEWI am glad to comment the utter rudeness from the customer service personnel was not continued.However, THIS ISSUE HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH EUROPEAN LAW.YOU INFORMED CUSTOMER THAT ROUTINE CHECKS WERE BEING CONDUCTED ON ACCOUNT from April 9th. You N26 said expect email from us.N26 did not send email until April 26thThe EMAIL CLEARLY STATED PLEASE PROVIDE AN ACCOUNT IN YOUR NAME FOR US TO TRANSFER YOUR FUNDS.A decision has been made. WHY HIDE UNDER THE PRETEXT OF ROUTINE CHECKS. WHO DOES ROUTINE CHECKS FOR 35DAYS OR AFTER SAYING WE WANT TO TRANSFER YOUR FUNDS????? WHO? I WANT MY MONEY AND NOTHING MORE BUT I WILL GO TWITTER AND FACEBOOK NEXT.LET THE WORLD KNOW HOW YOU TRULY THREAT YOUR CUSTOMERS.
reply: Hi Andrew,Thank you for taking the time to leave your review.We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience this has caused you, and that this process has. In accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. We follow these processes to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure. We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We will continue this correspondence via your registered email address.Best,Your N26 Support Team

Et pour un prix d√©fiant toute concurrence, m√™me (surtout) pour l'utiliser en voyage √† l'√©tranger. - enfin une application qui √† tout, mais sans le superflu et les menus inutiles ou publicitaires. Et que tu ne peux plus retirer pour manger)-j'ai √©t√© tant de fois bloqu√© dans ma banque traditionnelle sur ces 3 derniers points et sur les frais intempestifs (parfois bizarrement justifi√©s), qu'√™tre √† n26 me simplifie la vie et reduit mon stress (les appels sans fin pour comprendre qu'est ce qui bloque encore et/ou se faire rembourser de frais indus)points n√©gatifs :- le service client par tchat un peu lent et inefficace. -Un tchat qui se deconnecte en pleine discussion. name: Tiia Lepp√§nen
title: The is the most simple mobile bank I‚Ä¶
content: The is the most simple mobile bank I have ever used. The customer service answers quickly and is very friendly. I love the Spaces feature - I am able to put money aside without creating another account or withdraw it.There are few things to improve though: 1) It is so irritating that when my fingerprint login doesn't work anymore, but it wants to get the password, I have to go to the settings to confirm AGAIN that I want to use my finger print. Why doesn't the app can learn that? Why the system resets my settings? Isn't this against "usability rules" which says that the user should have control over his/her options/ways of using the system?2) When I change the category for e.g. Vodafone which is recurrent expense and is taken automatically from my account, the app doesn't learn the new category, but I have the change the category every single time - every month. This is not difficult to implement. It is just couple of rows of code. I think this feature affect on the expenses pie chart also, and that way it has quite big impact on the system. The user needs to make unnecessary acts to keep the expenses pie chart up-to-date, even though it is easy to automise.3) On website, I have to go to my profile to be able to logout. Why there is no logout possibility in the main navigation / every page. This is against commonly know place to find logout functionality (which preferably should be followed in UX design). It took me a while to find a way to logout and caused frustration. But all in all, this is the best solution/system _in Germany_, but not Europe. Take a look of the solution of the Nordic web banks. Don't copy, but e.g. Danske Bank and Nordea have good features, solutions for many of above problems.

reply: Ciao Mauro, ci spiace di sentirti dispiaciuto e capiamo la tua frustrazione.√à possibile ricevere una ricompensa tramite il codice invito di un amico o tramite delle nostre parterships. Entrambe le modalit√† richiedono l'inserimento di un codice promozionale al momento della regitrazione. Questa √® una condizione fondamentale per l'accredito del bonus, in quanto i nostri sistemi processano tutti i pagamenti dei bonus in modo automatico. Se il nostro sistema non identifica il corretto inserimento del codice, l'accredito dello stesso non avviene.Ad ogni modo puoi ancora ottenere il bonus invitando un amico e ottenere una ricompensa di 15‚Ç¨ per ogni amico che apre il conto e soddisfa tutti requisiti espressi nei nostri Termini&Condizioni, che puoi trovare al seguente link https://support.n26.com/it-it/come-iniziare/altro/come-guadagnare-soldi-invitando-amici-in-n26. Purtroppo da questa piattaforma nonn riusciamo a capire bene esattamente cosa sia accaduto nel tuo caso e di quale bonus si tratta con esattezza. Sarebbe utile se potessi fornirci il numero del tuo caso, di modo da poter dare un'ulteriore occhiata. Oppure contattaci nuovamente via chat.Ci scusiamo nuovamente  e speriamo che questo accaduto non ti scoraggi a continuare ad usare il tuo conto.  Ti auguriamo ancora una buona giornata e buon proseguimento.Cordialmente,Il team di N26

name: lisa wigfield
title: They take the 'care' out of customer care!!!
content: If I could give this zero stars I would. I opened this account, never received the card in the post, contacted them. They advised I needed to pay the complete 12 months charges. Held me to ransom in affect so I would have to keep the account and pay monthly charges. No offer of changing the account type to a standard one. Their devoted customer service is definitely not what you would pay for. I advised on my current situation, just not interested, just kept telling me to go onto chat to order a new card. I had advised I never received the fist one and the account was never 'activated' they just don't seem to care about their customers at all. I am going to the financial ombudsmen. Absolutely shocking. I would never out so much as a penny into this account, wouldn't trust them with it. Sticking with my English main account.
reply: Hi Lisa,Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We regret to learn that your experience with us thus far has not been a positive one.It appears that you have opted for a premium account with us, which does have a monthly fee of 14,90 GBP. The contract for our premium offerings last for a year, although we offer a 30 day revocation period with the UK in which you can revert to a standard account for free if you decide our Metal account is not for you. Once this 30 day period has passed, it is not possible to revert to a different account without paying the agreed upon fees for the remainder of the contract. We kindly ask that you contact us via chat so that we can resolve this situation for you, as for verification reasons we can only proceed with a card reorder via that channel. You can access live chat in your mobile app via My Account > Help > Support Chat, or via a desktop on our web app at https://app.n26.com/loginLive chat is available in the UK from Monday - Saturday from 8am until 9pm.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Ben Haworth
title: Easy online banking AND in English (for non-native speakers)
content: I set up my N26 account when arriving in Germany a little over two years ago. The process was relatively simple and all the security checks were done online and via a video call. In comparison, to be a co-signatory on a bank account with Berliner Volksbank, I had two or three trips to the bank, plus a few phone calls. I'm told that setting up a bank account in Germany is pretty painful, and this definitely wasn't the case with N26.I'm a Black card customer, mostly because of the travel insurances that come with this which means I don't have to think about this when I go to visit friends back in the UK. I enquired about the Metal card because I saw that it had airport lounge benefits. It wasn't so easy to find out the precise details, first via the website, then via customer support, and then being told to call the airport Lounge partner. The end result was that there is a small discount to using airport Lounges (I can't remember exactly now, but it was either 24‚Ç¨ or 28‚Ç¨), and this doesn't really make it worth it for me.The online interface is pretty intuitive and easy to use. It's a bit frustrating that if I use my computer with a web browser, I still have to authenticate all transactions on my mobile phone, but I assume this is necessary additional security. Again, in comparison, it's a lot easier than Berliner Volksbank.The "winning feature" though as a non-native German living in Germany is that I can do my banking, including customer support, etc, all in English. This would be less daunting now that I've lived here for two years, but I wouldn't have wanted to deal with that on Day 1 in Germany.

title: Unfortunately a big disappointment from‚Ä¶
content: Unfortunately a big disappointment from customers services! These guys don't have your back! Extra charges without reason from ATMs, no compassion and coldness! That's not what you expected from modern online bank! Not recommend! Avoid if possible!
reply: Hi Lenka,Thank you for taking the time to leave your review. We apologise if you have experienced any inconvenience as a result of the ATM fee you were charged.We do offer a set amount of free ATM withdrawals per month depending on your location, and once you have availed of all of these free withdrawals, you will be charged 2 EUR per ATM transaction. In the event you have been charged a fee greater than this, this would be a private ATM fee which, sadly, we have no control over, and cannot reject or reverse them, as they are not related to N26 in any way. These are fees which have been decided on by the ATM provider rather than by N26, and they must be clearly listed upon making your withdrawal. To avoid fees such as these, we recommend using our ATM map which can be accessed from within our mobile app, or by only using official bank ATMs where possible.You can see more in relation to ATM fees via our support center: https://support.n26.com/en-es/fixing-an-issue/cash/why-was-i-charged-an-atm-feeBest Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Jack
title: WARNING DO NOT BOTHER WITH THIS COMPANY
content: I read the reviews before opening the account, I went against my better judgement as I thought I would give them a chance.I put money into my N26 account (only ¬£100, transferred from my Barclays account) and within 24 hours they had frozen my account for 'routine compliance checks'Customer service say they cannot give any information about how long this will be and I cannot access my funds.PLEASE HEED THIS ADVICE AND DO NOT UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES OPEN AN ACCOUNT WITH N26 THEY ARE THE WORST BANK I HAVE EVER COME ACROSS THEY WILL JUST FREEZE YOUR MONEY FOR ABSOLUTELY NO REASON!!!EDIT: I can see they have replied below saying that "an account is never blocked for no reason".This is completely untrue because they have blocked my money for no reason! All I did was transfer ¬£100 pounds from my main current account after I got my wages from my employer and they next thing they have blocked the account.It has now been 5 days since I replied to their email and still no answer whatsoever, my money is still frozen even though their email states that their checks only take a day!AS I SAID PREVIOUSLY, BEFORE YOU OPEN AN ACCOUNT WITH N26 PLEASE READ THIS REVIEW AND AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE!!!IF YOU ARE WANTING A MOBILE BANK OPEN A MONZO ACCOUNT I HAVE HAD ONE FOR A LONG TIME AND NEVER ONCE HAD IT BLOCKED!
reply: Hi Jack,Thank you for taking the time to leave this feedback. In accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine compliance checks on user accounts. We follow these processes to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure. In some cases, we must close an account after these checks have been completed. An account is never blocked for no reason, and our Customer Service agents do not have information on this subject, as it is processed by another dedicated department, and further information is provided to you exclusively via email. We kindly ask that you respond to the email you will receive from us with any further queries or concerns that you may have about your account.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Dennis Genge
title: Auf keinen Fall weiter zu empfehlen! - Support ist unterirdisch schlecht!!
content: Ich war anfangs sehr begeistert und zufriedener N26 Kunde, da die Online Plattform schick aussieht und soweit auch funktionierte.Nun wollte ich als N26 Gesch√§ftskunde einen Leasingvertrag aufnehmen und wartete √ºber drei Wochen auf eine R√ºckmeldung. Nach mehreren Anrufen bei der Leasing-Bank habe ich erfahren, dass es nur an N26 liegt, da diese noch nicht die Bankauskunft meines Kontos ausgeh√§ndigt haben, sodass ich die Zusage f√ºr meinen Leasingvertrag erhalten kann.Einen telefonischen Support bei N26 gibt es nicht und auf meine Nachfrage im Kundenservice Chat wurde ich nur darauf verwiesen, dass Sie solche Ausk√ºnfte nur der Bank aush√§ndigen und wurde abgewimmelt. Auf eine weitere Anfrage an die Support E-Mail von N26 erhielt ich lediglich eine Antwort mit dem erneuten Verweis auf den Kunden Service Chat.Ich als Kunde, habe also keine M√∂glichkeit mit einem internen Mitarbeiter zu telefonieren und den aktuellen Stand abzufragen und meine Leasingbank wartet heute noch auf eine Bankauskunft seitens N26, die jedoch nie eintreffen wird, da sich bei N26 scheinbar niemand darum k√ºmmert. Nun habe ich mir ein neues Gesch√§ftskonto bei einer anderen Bank er√∂ffnet und hoffe dort auf eine bessere Kundenbetreuung.
reply: Hey Dennis, danke f√ºr dein ausf√ºhrliches Feedback.Eine Bankauskunft erteilen wir nur anderen Banken, keinen Privatpersonen oder dem Kunden, sondern nur der anderen Bank. Bitte entschuldige, wenn dich dies ver√§rgert, dennoch kann der Kundensupport dir diese nicht aush√§ndigen.Diese wird bald fertig gestellt sein und dann sofort an die Auftraggeber gesendet.Wir entschuldigen uns f√ºr die Unannehmlichkeiten.

name: Chuck
title: Not worth it just for a metal card
content: It's great having a metal card, ran into a few key issue with this card... first of all the app is really quite Buggy, they also make you reset your face ID on your phone and if you travel abroad, don't get me started. Most importantly if you aren't happy with it, they make it really painful for you to leave, they charge you a full year worth of fee's before you are allowed to leave. All in all really disappointing.
reply: Hey Chuck,Thank you for your feedback. This will assist us greatly in improving our processes and services for the future.In the interest of account safety and security, we will ask our customers to reset Face/Touch ID every 30 days. In relation to travelling abroad, our card is accepted worldwide with any merchant which accepts Mastercard. To enable payments in a foreign country, you must go to your mobile app via My Account > Card Settings > Payments Abroad, and there should be no issue with making transactions. In the event you run into an issue when making a transaction, you can contact us from within our mobile app via My Account > Help > Support Chat.We grant a 30 day revocation period when you have opted for a premium Metal or Black account with us. If you decide the account is not for you within that time, you can revert to a free account without charge. Once this 30 day period has passed, it is not possible to revert to a different account without paying the agreed upon fees for the remainder of the contract. Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Daxane Peiller
title: Really bad customer service
content: I am really disappointed with N26, I used it for my trip in South America. And one day I woke up someone did two transactions In India for 240‚Ç¨. I really don‚Äôt understand the security process of N26, how can I be in Equador one day and some few hours later in India. There should be a way where when you enter a new country the N26 ask for confirmation instead of just giving away money to Stranger especially India as there is a lot of bank fraud going there. The person was able to withdraw money in a ATM without my physical card witch should not be allowed or it should be a fonction that you can allow in N26. But what I am the most angry about is when I contacted an agent for help he was really unhelpful and could not understand my situation.  All he said to me was you have to cancel your card, I tried to explain that I was in South America and needed money but he kept repeating the same, and avoiding my question about security. In the end I really don‚Äôt think that this bank is safe it‚Äôs fun because they give you the choice to control your param√®tre but it‚Äôs seriously missing security features. They add some stuff but forget the most important no one should be able to withdraw money from an ATM without a physical card or it should be linked first with security measure.
reply: Hey Daxane,We apologise for the inconvenience.You can read more about the act of card skimming by reading this N26 Mag article: https://mag.n26.com/what-is-a-an-atm-skimmer-how-to-protect-your-bank-account-when-withdrawing-cash-e9447e24b809If you don‚Äôt recognise a transaction or you‚Äôre sure you didn‚Äôt authorise it, blocking your card won‚Äôt be enough. We will send you a chargeback form so you can dispute the fraudulent transaction.You can read more about this here: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/cards/how-to-get-my-money-back-in-case-of-fraudBest regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: B
title: Fraud do not sign up for this!!
content: Fraud do not sign up for this!!I ordered a card that was advertised as being free I was then sent a n26 black card and was expected to pay a monthly fee for it and was unable to cancel the card until I had paid the money.Customer services insisted that I had ordered this card and said there was nothing they could do.
reply: Hey,We offer a Standard account which is free of charge. We also offer premium accounts, Black and Metal which come with a monthly fee. You can find our pricing list on our support center. Here is the link: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/account/how-much-does-an-n26-account-costIf you signed up for a Black account, during the sign up process you would have been asked to confirm and accept the Black membership terms and conditions. If you'd like to cancel your N26 Black account you can do so up to 14 days after you signed up. Once this date has passed you will need to pay the remaining fees. Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Shahin
title: Dont bother trying to get n26 to help with unauthorised transactions
content: I have so far been very satisfied with n26. I joined just under 2 years ago.Then on my card recently i had 2 unauthorised transactions. After having about 4 conversations with different agents explaining myself again and again (i dont think they leave notes anywhere on the acvoubt).. a few weeks later they tell me i need to fill a form out. Not an online form. Old school style..print it off..fill it in and sign it and then email it back. After a week they ask me AGAIN for the same information i gave 4 times on the chat. I replied. Then its just again the same questions per email. The chargeback amount is small so i told them to forget it. This is just not worth my time going back and forth having to have 10 different conversations repeating myself over and over again. They make this process very complex and comletely put me off trying to grt my money back. Anyway their reply was simply 'As per your request I have cancelled your chargeback request,'. Couldnt believe it. No acknowledgement that i told them i dont have time to waste on their over complex process where they make you go back and forth a million times. Maybe they just couldnt be bothered helping one of their customers. My normal bank does it better!
reply: Hi Shahin,Thank you for taking the time to leave your review. Feedback such as this is incredibly important for us to improve our processes and services for the future.We're sorry to learn that the chargeback dispute did not go smoothly for you on this occasion. For future reference, it is not completely necessary for the required chargeback dispute form to be printed out. It can simply be filled in on your computer, signed electronically, and then sent back to us, where it will then be sent to our dedicated specialists to be taken care of. Once you contact us from your registered email address, each correspondence will be recorded to your N26 account so that it can be accessed if you are connected with a different agent, so that they can assist you with your query. We do apologise that this did not happen in relation to your case.Obviously the communication you have received on this topic is not of the standard you had expected from us, and this is not the type of service we endeavour to provide to our customers. Again, we thank you for the valuable feedback that you have provided us with.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Steven Dewsbery
title: AVOID Banking equivalent to a tinder date with a Stalker
content: Foolishly responded to free account link on an Instagram add that opened a ‚ÄòFree‚Äô N26 account. During sign up I was shown the shinny metal card as a card option......so selected the shinny thing .... a few screens later my free account was now ¬£14.50 month, with sketchy details of benefits (lounge access sounded nice but lounge key had zero details online), so I stepped back and instead selected basic card and opened the free version of the account.  I received no emails or other correspondence and no card arrived basic or otherwise.Months later N26 long since forgotten a shinny metal card arrives to my home..Ok so I guess no one was willing to pay ¬£14.50 for nothing and now everyone gets the metal one......still no such thing as free so I did some research and saw that others had experienced this..... key callout was make sure it‚Äôs inactive in the AppSo I launched the N26 app and saw that Metal account was indeed active, so I immediately deactivated it.So to be clear I did not order the metal card and then cancelled the card account I did not as soon as unordered card was unexpectedly received.Now months later I logged into app because it showed a notifications.... since the card and account was inactive I was curious at the notifications, so sought to read them before deleting them. They advised that I owed 2 x ¬£14.50 to N26.....for the unordered card that was cancelledSo I used chat to get in touch....only available means for this bank.Agent told me that since I did not cancel within 30 days I was now locked into a 12 month contract.This is my worst ‚Äòbanking‚Äô experience.N26 is like going on a Tinder date with a stalker, sure you went on a date once but you ended the date in the first 10 minutes after realising their was no chemistry between you....Meanwhile Stalky N26 went and told all its friends your dating and sent you a gift one month later that you did not return.......So now N26 thinks your married.....N26 even managed to get an online marriage certificate......... sure you did not sign anything.... but N26 saw the way you smiled in that dreamy first date, plus you loved his gift..... so that must mean your married right?On the plus side I doubt N26‚Äôs marriage certificate will stand up to legal scrutiny......... but sadly that won‚Äôt get your wasted time back.Searching trust pilot I see many people were just sent the metal card and then had my above experience even when they ordered the basic card one..... if only I‚Äôd done more research before clicking that Instagram ‚ÄòFREE BANK ACCOUNT‚Äô link.You would probably not knowingly date a stalker so don‚Äôt enter into any form of interaction with N26, unless that‚Äôs your thing. In which case I hope you and N26 have a nice life together.Plenty of decent online banks that offer the same but without the stalky extortion component. Monzo, Tide etc.
reply: Hey Steven,We offer a Standard account which is free of charge and premium accounts which come with a monthly fee. If you signed up for a Metal account, during the sign up process you would have been asked to confirm and accept the Metal membership terms and conditions. To cancel your N26 Metal account you can do so up to 30 days after you signed up. Once this date has passed you will need to pay the remaining fees. You can read more about our revocation process on our support center: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/membership-plans/how-to-cancel-my-n26-black-or-n26-metal-membershipBest,Your N26 Support Team

name: PizzaXprezz
title: Irgendwas stimmt hier gewaltig nicht...
content: Vorab: sowohl mein Vater als auch ich besitzen die Albanische Staatsb√ºrgerschaft. Mein Vater hat sein N26-Konto (die Kostenlose) erstellt und konnte sie sogar per VideoIdent mit seiner Aufenthaltserlaubnis best√§tigen. Die Karte kam schnell und bislang funktionierte das Bezahlen und Einzahlen wie geschmiert. Die Nutzung per Smartphone ist so komfortabel und simpel, dass das jeder hinkriegt. Bezahlen per Google Pay macht sogar viel zu viel Spa√ü, da reicht das Geld aber nicht :PJetzt aber mal eine ernst gemeinte Frage, N26: es ist April 2019 und ich bekomme keine Erlaubnis mehr ein Konto mit meiner Albanischen Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit zu √∂ffnen, obwohl es mein Vater hingekriegt hat? Ich habe ein Konto er√∂ffnet und wollte mich dann in der App verifizieren. Pustekuchen... meine nationalen Dokumente werden angeblich nicht unterst√ºtzt. H√Ñ? Das ging doch bei meinem Vater... also direkt Chat mit einem Supporter ge√∂ffnet, der mir sagt, dass die App automatisch die Identifikationsart ausw√§hlt und diese nicht mehr √§nderbar sei. VideoIdent sei nicht verf√ºgbar mit den albanischen Pass, nur PostIdent, UND DAS NOCH NICHT EINMAL MIT DEM REISEPASS, SONDERN NUR MIT DEM AUSWEIS! Die Liste an unterst√ºtzten Dokumenten ist schon fast ein Witz, denn jeder Reisepass im Balkan wird als VideoIdent unterst√ºtzt oder per PostIdent, der Albanische Pass aber nicht, trotz gleichen Standards der biometrischen Sicherheit? Das grenzt schon fast an Rassismus.Also hab ich den Support gefragt, was ich machen kann? Abwarten, anscheinend kann man da nichts machen, bis die Dokumente von Albanien, einem anscheinend krass gef√§hrlichen Staat mit Terrorgefahr, unterst√ºtzt werden. Sogar der Afghanische Pass, der Pass mit der eingeschr√§nktesten Reisem√∂glichkeit der Welt, kann per VideoIdent best√§tigt werden! Das nennt ihr "Transparenz"? Ihr habt es innerhalb eines Jahres geschafft, einen R√ºckschritt zu machen. Bringt das endlich in Ordnung, sonst geh ich einfach zur DKB oder einer anderen internationalen Bank mit smartem Online-Banking.
reply: Hey PizzaXprezz, danke f√ºr dein ausf√ºhrliches Feedback.Hier findest du eine Liste mit allen Dokumenten, welche wir zur Verifizierung nutzen d√ºrfen: https://support.n26.com/de-de/erste-schritte/persoenliche-daten/wie-kann-ich-mich-ausweisenDiese Liste wird von der BAFIN vorausgesetzt, wir haben dar√ºber keinen Einfluss, sondern wird reguliert, damit es keine Probleme in der Sicherheit gibt.Sofern du einen Deutschen Pass beantragst, kann eine Verifizierung durchgef√ºhrt werden aber der momentane Stand l√§sst dies nicht zu.Gr√º√üe, dein N26 Support Team

name: Dante
title: While I like the idea
content: While I like the idea, there are still a few bugs. App takes a bit to navigate but all in all it functions ok.  Certainly the fees are a huge improvement over Italian banking. The down side, they use UPS for shipping your card. I waited 4 weeks for my card to arrive after 3 call backs to send a new card and use a different corriere. I recommended N26 to 3 people, 2 have given up after waiting over a month for the card and they thought it was a scam. 3rd is still waiting, 5 weeks no card and used different addresses! While it‚Äôs not fair to blame them for shipping, they know of the problem and told me there is nothing they can do, they have a contract with UPS! There is a reason amazon does not use UPS in Italia! Lowest contract bidder and no employees! In the end this will hurt N26 expansion in Italia.
reply: Hey Dante,We're sorry to hear you haven‚Äôt received your card yet. Due to a very high demand in the last couple of weeks, our card deliveries may take a bit longer than usual. Your card is delivered by our partner UPS and deliveries shouldn't take more than 10 days.You can find out more about these by reading this article from our Support Center: https://support.n26.com/en-de/getting-started/cards/when-will-my-card-arriveBest Regards,Your N26 Support Team

Auf E-Mails kommen inzwischen wochenlang keine R√ºckmeldungen.Kunden und Lieferanten beschweren sich √ºber meine Bankverbindung, die sich als Bak f√ºr kostenlose Gesch√§ftskonten  auslobt.

title: Account hacked and blocked
content: Account hacked and blocked - N26 doing nothingI am an N26 customer, for a few months. Last March 15th 2019, I received an automated unsolicited email from N26 indicating that my mobile phone was unpaired from my bank account N26. I knew right away it was  fraud. I contacted N26 instantly with the client service, finding that my account is inaccessible.The support replied that they transmitted the information to their fraud departement, who will contact with me very shortly.I didn't receive any reply from them, even if I tried again and again to contact them by email and by chat. I always receive the same answer, telling that they will contact with me shortly.Until this day, still no answer, no solution.I'm going to sue them, because it is the only solution left for me to get access to my money again.I do not understand the lack of communication and the inability of N26 to resolve the problem in a reasonably timely maner ...

Really?there‚Äôs a note in the app, that the amount wasn‚Äôt settled yet due to exchange rate, however it is already deducted on my balance. My purpose of reporting it was to immediately stop payment if it was not settled yet. However, I was informed that i need to wait for it to be settled first. Like what? how are you going to prevent that fraud when you need to wait for it to finally transfer the money to the fraudster?solution please!

name: Jonathan
title: Not great when closing down an account
content: Opening the account was easy, and so was receiving the bank card. Being a European bank, I was under the impression I would be able to have pound sterlings and euros in the same account. My impression was wrong (that was my own fault), so I decided to close down the account. That's where matters didn't go so smoothly.I sent back the form required to close down the account and received a confirmation email informing me that my matter would be handled within 1-2 working days. 8 days later and I still hadn't heard back from them, so I contacted the support team. My cancellation request was in a queue, and I would have to wait "a few good days" for it to be handled. Overall, I would have expected a smoother experience when closing down the account, and being kept up to date on what's happening with my request.
reply: Hey Jonathan,Thanks for your feedback! We regret to hear that you were provided with such customer experience.	You can cancel the account for free if you hold a standard one, by sending an email to support@n26.com. If you have a premium account, it most likely is a twelve-month contract. You will then be asked to pay the remaining fees.You can find out more information on the following page of our Support Center: https://support.n26.com/en-de/fixing-an-issue/account/how-to-close-my-accountBest,Your N26 Support Team

name: Erik
title: Beware ot scammy referral program
content: Overall I am satisfied with the service that N26 provides. However, I have to point out their borderline scam tactique when it comes to their referral program.N26 disqualifies numerous countries ad hoc from their heavily promoted monetary reward for a friend referral at their own discretion, without any mention to this in the T&C documents available to their customers. I have referred several of my friends to the service as I very much believe in the vision of N26 and I want to actively contribute the the success of the Bank in the future. My friends have activated their accounts and have been actively using them for payments meeting all the conditions speciied by N26 for an eligible referral. However I haven't received the monetary reward that N26 commits to in their T&C document.When i contacted the support team, I was informed that my countrty is not eligible for the referral program (even though I have been able to refer my friends and have been receiving many emails from N26 prompting me to share my personalized referral link with my firends,with a promise of monetary reward) and that I will not receive my monetary reward. There is no mention of my country being ineligible in the T&C document and when I asked for such document, I have simply been told that it does not exist but I still won't receive my award.I am writing this long review not because of the small monetary incentive which I will not receive, but because of my deep disappointment with the way N26 behaved to me as their customer and the way they addressed this situation. I believe that changing the rules of the referral program at their own discretion without any reference to the T&C documents of N26 is extremely intransparent and promulgates a negative perception of N26, as well as the whole    Fintech industry.I hope N26 management will take their time to read this review as a constructive feedback from their customer and at the very least will update the T&C document of the referral program to transparently list the countries that are/are not eligible for the referral program and the receival of the monetary award threin referred to.
reply: Hey Craig, We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers‚Äô needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers‚Äô issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Your feedback will help us improve our service.Best,Your N26 Support Team

content: App is fine but overall very unsatisfied with the service. Plus the Allianz insurance is rigged too -  all travel purchases have to be made with the card and otherwise your trip is not covered. Also damaged luggage is not covered by the card. title: Die Nicht-Bank zum Abgew√∂hnen!
content: N26 ist mit dem Versprechen gestartet, das Banking zu revolutionieren. Die digitale Dienstleistung √ºber das Smart Phone App hat dieses Versprechen zumindest f√ºr zwei Jahre gehalten. Dann haben die Gr√ºnder eine andere Art von Revolution gestartet und die Bank in Bezug auf Erreichbarkeit mit dem neuen Berliner Flughafen gleichgestellt (Der liegt ja in der N√§he),Das bedeutet, die Bank ist f√ºr Endkunden nur √ºber Chat erreichbar; kein Telefon, kein E-Mail, kein Fax - nichts, Es gibt entsprechende Kontaktpunkte f√ºr Beh√∂rden und andere Banken, aber Anfragen von Privatkunden auf diesen Kan√§len werden umgehend gel√∂scht. Chat ist als Kommunikationsmittel f√ºr bestimmte Themen gut einsetzbar; wenn Dir gerade jemand Dein Konto ausr√§umt, bringt einen das nicht weiter, Zuerst ist ein Chat Bot dran, der dir ungef√§hr so viel weiterhilft, wie ein Taxifahrer auf besagtem neuen Berliner Flughafen. Danach melden sich √ºberlastete Chat Center Mitarbeitende, die scheinbar mehrere Chats gleichzeitig bearbeiten und deren sachliche Inkompetenz selbst bei einfachen Fragen nur durch ihre d√ºnnh√§utige Unfreundlichkeit √ºbertroffen wird. Ich hatte zwei einfache Anliegen; Blockung einer Doppelbuchung und Stornierung einer Kartenreservierung; beides F√§lle, die ich bei anderen Banken ohne Probleme √ºber das Call Center gel√∂st habe. Nicht so bei N26; am Ende von unendlichen - mehrfach abgebrochenen - Chat Liturgien ohne Ergebnis (Wir k√∂nnen ihnen nicht helfen), durfte ich mir noch anh√∂ren, dass sie gerne wieder mit mir schreiben, wenn ich mich zu benehmen w√ºsste...Sorry, aber dazu habe ich kein Interesse.Wer N26 heute als Bank w√§hlt ist selber Schuld; ihr seit gewarnt.

name: J√∂rg
title: Finger weg von N26....
content: Finger weg von N26....Bin seit ca. 9 Monaten Kunde von N26. Das Konto wurde nur als Zweitkonto genutzt. Es gab keine Inanspruchnahme des Dispokredits und keine Bargeldabhebungen an Geldautomaten. Heute kam die K√ºndigung von N26, weil ich angeblich 'erheblich' gegen die AGB's versto√üen habe. Kundenservice per Chat war zwar umgehend erreichbar, speiste mich aber unfreundlich ab, mit dem nochmaligen Hinweis auf den genauen K√ºndigungstermin und beendete abrupt den Chat. Ich komme mir vor, wie ein Krimineller, der das Konto f√ºr irgendwelche illegalen Dinge missbraucht hat. Danke N26, echt eine super 'Bank'.Edit nach Antwort von N26:Auch vom Email-Support und auch vom Telefon-Support die gleiche Abspeisung wie im Chat: Sie k√∂nnen keine weitere Auskunft geben......Steht so √ºbrigens auch in den AGB's von N26. Gek√ºndigt ist gek√ºndigt. Wenn ich die weiteren Rezensionen hier lese, bin ich froh nichts mehr mit diesem Verein zu tun zu haben, denn spontane K√ºndigungen oder Kontoeinfrierungen scheinen jetzt geh√§uft vorzukommen.
reply: Hey J√∂rg, danke f√ºr dein Feedback.Bei Versto√ü gegen unsere AGB, kann dir der Kundensupport keine Informationen oder Ausk√ºnfte erteilen.Dies geschieht alles √ºber die Fachabteilung √ºber welche du auch eine Email mit allen n√∂tigen Informationen zum weiteren Werdegang informiert wirst.Mit den Kollegen im Email Verfahren, kannst du auch alle weiteren Dinge besprechen.Gru√ü, dein N26 Support Team.

name: Theo
title: Die Park-Bank ihres Vertrauens... üòñ
content: Eine Bank, die anscheinend die Bargeldabschaffung unterst√ºtzt oder lieber den Wochenend-Zins mitnimmt... üò°üò±Ich habe mein Konto bei der N26 Bank schon seit ca. 2015 und hatte in Sachen √úberweisungen auch noch nie Probleme irgendwelcher Art. Als ich mir nun ein neues-gebrauchtes Auto kaufen wollte, wollte ich mit meiner Master-Card das Geld am VR-Bank Automaten abheben. Aus diesem Anlass habe ich extra mein Tageslimit auf 2000 EUR gesetzt. An der VR-Bank angekommen (die N26 Bank hat keinen eigenen Automatenverbund, nur √ºber eine Fremdbank sind Abhebungen m√∂glich), wollte ich sodann die 2000 EUR abheben. Der Automat meinte aber, gibt nur 1800 EUR. OK, nicht so schlimm, dann eben am n√§chsten Tag. Also etwa 27 Stunden sp√§ter (war ein Wochenende), dann eben nochmal 1800 und dann am Montag eben den Rest. ABER *falsch gedacht*... Beim ersten mal ging es nicht, der VR Automat meinte "Ihre Karte ist an diesem Automat nicht zugelassen!". Ok, kein Problem, dann gehe ich eben zur Sparkasse neben dran. Auch hier die selbe Meldung. Dann rief ich beim N26 Support an, ob denn alles richtig eingestellt und mein Konto in Ordnung w√§re. Dies wurde bejaht und man sagte mir, dass Mastercard derzeit wohl Probleme habe. Komischerweise ging aber mit einer anderen Mastercard eines anderen Institutes alles wunderbar!!! Nun gut, dann eben Morgen wieder. Da ging es dann auch, der Automat gab anstandslos 1800 EUR raus und ich dachte, na gut, dann nach 24 Stunden (laut Support und AGB), kann ich wieder was abheben. Genau 27/28 und 30 Stunden danach, war ich wieder am Automaten vorstellig, sowie 48-50 Stunden im Anschluss auch wieder. Bei der VR-Bank, der Sparkasse und der Hypo Vereinsbank. Alle 3 Banken meldeten schon wieder, dass meine Karte nicht zugelassen sei, obwohl es ja zuvor funktioniert hatte und laut Kontoeinstellungen und Support auch h√§tte funktionieren m√ºssen. Die Karte war zudem auch nicht kaputt oder etwa der Magnetstreifen besch√§digt. Die Automaten taten so, als w√ºrden sie jeden Moment das Geld ausgeben, nur bei der letzten Sicherheitspr√ºfung brachen sie dann ab. Ergo, die Karte war f√ºr Barabhebungen seitens der Bank dann gesperrt. Ich hatte lange Jahre in der Geldbearbeitung eines Institutes gearbeitet und kenne mich da mit den Sicherheitspr√ºfungen durchaus aus. Da ich mein Geld nun nicht am Automaten abheben konnte (die ganzen 50er am Automaten sind zudem sowieso recht nervig und man muss sie dann sowieso umtauschen, wenn man was gr√∂√üeres anschaffen will und nicht √ºberweisen mag), habe ich nun alles zu meiner anderen Hausbank transferiert und hebe es eben nun da in Bar ab. content: Ich finde dass diese Bank eine regelrecht heuchlerische und betr√ºgerische Werbestrategie betreibt! Von wegen ‚Äûdirekt‚Äú, ‚Äûnah am Kunden‚Äú, ‚ÄûKOSTENLOS‚Äú! Leider er√∂ffnete ich das Konto bereits 3 Monate vor der K√ºndigung des alten Kontos und des Umzugs aller Dauerauftr√§ge usw. Wohl aus genau diesem Grund, kostete das Konto sehr wohl Geld! Undzwar nicht zu knapp. Da nun noch keine Eing√§nge verbucht wurden, musste ich mehrere Male Geld einzahlen um ein kurzfristiges kleines Minus auszugleichen. Dies Tat ich auch. Ich rundete den Betrag immer auf 10‚Ç¨ auf. Also h√§tte bereits ein Kleines Guthaben existieren m√ºssen. Auf Nachfrage hin wurde mir mitgeteilt, dass das reine Guthabenkonto auf Grund dieses Minuses von 0,07‚Ç¨ gek√ºndigt wurde! Ich erkl√§rte dem Mitarbeiter den Fehler, bat um Entschuldigung und sicherte zu sofort 10‚Ç¨ einzuzahlen...denn ab dem n√§chsten Monat wollte ich das Konto im Alltag nutzen! Man teilte mir mit, dass diese Entscheidung festst√ºnde und daran nicht zu r√ºtteln sei! Weitere Mails von mir wurden von da an gekonnt ignoriert! F√ºr mich pers√∂nlich war der Gipfel, dass mir der Mitarbeiter sogar mitteilte ( schriftlich! ), dass man den Betrag i.H.v. 0,07‚Ç¨ an eine Inkassofirma √ºbergeben w√ºrde, falls ich diesen nicht sofort bezahlen w√ºrde und in diesem Falle m√ºsste ich sogar einne 3-stelligen Eurobetrag bezahlen! Ganz ehrlich? So spie√üig, stuhr, und unprofessionell und so unfassbar kundenfeindlich w√ºrde nicht ein mal die schlechteste konventionelle Bank mit ihren Kunden umgehen. Ihr solltet euch daf√ºr sch√§men! Hier das Zitat aus der Mail: ‚Äû...Wir behalten uns vor, unsere Forderung gegen dich betreffend den offenen Betrag in H√∂he von 0,07‚Ç¨ auf deinem N26 Konto an ein Inkasso-B√ºro abzutreten, das dich dann ggf. kontaktieren wird.‚Äú

name: Shailen Sobhee.
title: Very poor banking experience!
content: Very poor banking experience indeed. Here are the reasons:-Very very poor customer support. First, there is no way you can talk to a real person if you have a serious problem. The chat is a hit or miss. Most of the times, the chat support agent is not trained and does not know much about the issue you raised.- They are terribly slow at responding to issues raised by email. After months of no replies and persistent requests for updates, they did reply back with "sorry for the delay; we had issues with our system". Really??!!- The bank infrastructure has terribly poor security features. I requested umpteen times to have 2-Factor authentication on Twitter, by email, on Facebook and they never cared to consider. That said, money on an N26 account is at 100% risk to being stolen by hackers. There is not way N26 will become my default bank account. I use it for the convenience of seeing my payments in real-time (that's one pro), but that's the risk I take. I do a monthly standing order of a fairly small amount which I then use.- The bank discriminates on nationalities: I think you try to follow some banking rules but I have no idea where these rules/restrictions come from. Because of my nationality, you said I could not use N26 Invest although you advertised the service is available in Germany. You failed to mention that you are picky on nationalities living in Germany. I contacted BaFin (no issues with my nationality). As a matter of fact, I was able to open my investment accounts with comdirect and Consorsbank. What rules you follow is beyond me. You need to review your policies. Botton line: lots of poor experiences. Mobile app is great, but everything around it is really not in good shape.

content: Ich bin Nutzer von N26 seit dem es N26 gibt. In dieser Zeit habe ich etliche andere geworben √ºber die Funktion "Freunde werben" aber habe NIE auch nur einen Cent erhalten. Trotz mehrmaligem Anschreiben an das N26-Team wurde ich mit ewigem Schriftverkehr und der Frage bombadiert, ob ich die Kundenwerbung doch "wirklich"√ºber den Einladungscode gemacht habe. Selbstverst√§ndlich, ich bin ja nicht dumm. Mir schuldet N26 also ca. 200.- und weigert sich dieses auszuzahlen, weil sie "die Werbungen nicht finden". Der nicht vorhandene telefonische Ansprechpartner ist wirklich ein gro√üer Mangel der so nicht akzeptiert werden kann. Bei dringenden Notf√§llen im Ausland ist man total "aufgeschmissen". Dass man sich in sein Konto auf der Webseite nur mit der E-Mail-Adresse und dem Passwort einloggen kann ist sicherheitstechnisch absolut inakzeptabel. Hier muss es dringend eine Pflicht-2FA geben !Die "Benefits" der "Black"-Variante sind ein Witz (ich bin Black-Kunde). Die Versicherung l√§uft √ºber die Allianz und wir wissen alle wie die Allianz "Schadensf√§lle" bearbeitet. Die anderen Dinge, die man als Black-Kunde als "Goodie" hat sind ein Witz. Man darf auch als Black-Kunde pro Monat maximal 100.- an der Supermarktkasse einzahlen. Zum Gl√ºck habe ich noch mehr Kreditkarten die zuverl√§ssig im Ausland funktionieren.Sobald es die ApplePay-Kreditkarte gibt, bin ich weg von N26....ich habe es nur wegen der Metall-Karte.
