content: Same experience as many others. They informed me about cancellation of the account. Although they explicitly wrote in the email that account is functional until 2nd of April, it is blocked. They are saying that I should transfer the funds to other account with my name, but cannot do it as it is blocked. Customer service is refusing to talk about the issue. I have never seen such a bad customer service. A few months ago it was published that Insight Venture Partners invested 300 mio in N26. I was thinking what a smart move! But I changed my mind... how can such an established venture capital fund invest in such a rubbish????

name: Rusty Aventador
title: Nicht zu empfehlen!
content: Meine Freundin hat im Oktober 2018 √ºber ebay Kleinanzeigen Ihre gebrauchte Handtasche f√ºr schlappe 10 Euro verkauft. Der K√§ufer hat ganz normal √ºberwiesen und wie versendet. Dezember 2018 war das Konto n26 dann gesperrt. Keine Nachricht nichts. Wir haben dann ca 1 Woche massiv n26 um Stellungnahme gebeten. Erst nach Androhung mit Meldung bei der Bundesbank bekamen wir per Email die Antwort, dass ein Privatverkauf nicht gestattet sei und das Konto daher √ºberpr√ºft wird. Wir haben jetzt Ende M√§rz 2019 und n26 kommuniziert seither √ºberhaupt nichts mehr. Daher haben wir alles eingereicht beim Schiedsverfahren. Dort konnte der Fall allerdings nicht bearbeitet werden, da n26 nicht freiwillig daran teilnimmt und dort auch nicht eingetragen ist. Die Schiedsrichter waren allerdings so nett und sendeten den Fall an die Bundesbank, da die das bearbeiten tut, egal ob n26 daran teilnimmt oder nicht. Die Bundesbank hat n26 bereits im Februar angeschrieben. Wir hatten das Konto selbstverst√§ndlich bereits im Januar sofort gek√ºndigt. Heute am 25 M√§rz 2019 schrieb uns die Bundesbank, da√ü n26 nicht bis dato reagiert hat. Die Bundesbank hat daher heute erneut ein Erinnerungsschreiben an n26 gesendet. Da wir im Vorfeld zu viel Negatives √ºber n26 gelesen haben, ist zum Gl√ºck nur schlappe 60 ‚Ç¨ auf dem Konto. Ich bin mir sicher das n26 auch auf das Erinnerungsschreiben von der Bundesbank nicht reagieren wird. Sodass ich dann allerdings wegen Unterschlagung, Betrug und Veruntreuung Strafanzeige erstellen lassen Wir haben alle Beweise zum Gl√ºck schriftlich, ebenso das Verfahren der Bundesbank. Mir ist allerdings schleierhaft, wie n26 die Banklizens behalten darf.

name: Michael Glass
title: Awful customer support. Good if you need a bank account fast.
content: I have had two serious issues with N26 customer support that would make me think twice about recommending them. Generally, the problem is customer support doesn't have more information than the FAQ, so if you can't solve the problem yourself, good luck reaching a person who can help you.1. I transfered a my savings in the US to Germany. My bank said the transfer had completed but N26 told me that they had not received the money and that I should check with the sender. Ok, major life stress that my savings had been lost in transfer. A week later, I received a notification that the money had been received the previous week (when they told me they hadn't received it) and N26 needed some tax / anti-fraud documentation. I had already spent a week hunting down a problem outside of N26, when the problem was internal and Customer Support is instructed to tell customers to fend for themselves.2. I recently messed up my taxes and my account was garnished (apparently my Steuerberater failed to forward me a mahnung). Same song and dance. What would be something resolved in 24-48 hours at another bank is ongoing and taking more than a week to resolve. Again, contacting their customer service involves them telling me what I already know then terminating chat. I'm lucky my friends will feed me while I can't pay for groceries.I still think N26 is great for the convenience / speed of setting up an account, but for someone planning on staying in Germany long-term, I'd recommend you open up an account at a reputable bank with real customer service.

name: Judith Bogner
title: Huge security gap, unacceptable customer service & communication
content: We‚Äôve been happy clients of N26 Germany since 2016. Until a week ago when the account got blocked out of the blue. Since then we‚Äôre finding out that N26 has a huge security gap and horrendous customer service. Fraud number on the bank of the MasterCard leads to automated voicemail pointing to chat. Every other bank has a fraud helpline. And where did phone support go? Now it‚Äôs only through chat or email. Different chat agents give different information, all chats are shut down without real help. Email reply takes 2 days and contain standard phrases pointing either to chat or to mysterious email sent earlier. After 6 days insisting via @N26_support on Twitter an email gets forwarded that chat agents claimed we should have received but that never arrived. The email contains standard blurb about cancellation due to misuse etc AND it was sent to a new fraudulous email address. Clearly someone on N26 side got into our account and changed the registered email address that N26 uses as part of its identification process. What good is fingerprint login when a simple email change allows fraud?To be clear. We‚Äôve been home all that time, app and card safe 24/7, We use the account to pay bills and receive salary. Very down to earth usage. No online use, no travel abroad.If N26 actually talked to us, we could help to find out what‚Äôs going on. We still have no access to our money which btw is illegal under German banking law. German banking authority and Bundesbank have been informed.

We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers‚Äô issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. We understand your disappointment, and apologize for any inconvenience that this may have caused you. We would like to thank you for bringing this to our attention. title: Zuerst war alles gut, doch dann....
content: Die ersten Monate war ich sehr zufrieden. Die App war super und √ºbersichtlich. Die Anmeldung ging leicht und unkompliziert. Ich wollte ein Deutsches Konto haben, damit es meine Familie beim √ºberweisen einfacher hat. Ich bekam monatlich kleine Raten f√ºr mein altes Handy und ein iPad Pro, welches ich letztes Jahr f√ºr meine Tante kaufte. Vor 4 Wochen stand ich dann ahnungslos bei meinem Autoh√§ndler, ich wollte den Service bezahlen und siehe da - Karte gesperrt. Abgewiesen. Am Guthaben konnte es nicht liegen, denn 1280‚Ç¨ waren ja noch drauf. Ich versuchte vergeblich anzurufen, wurde auf den Chat verwiesen. Dort sagte man mir kurz und knapp: Sie erhalten in k√ºrze eine E-Mail zu ihrem Fall. Tage vergingen, dann kam die E-Mail. Erhebliche Verletzung der AGBs, sofortige K√ºndigung. Bis zum 14.03 sollte ich mein Geld auf ein anderes Konto √ºberweisen. Da mein Konto aber nicht bis zum 14.03, wie in der Mail beschrieben funktionierte, suchte ich erneut Hilfe. Dem Support schickte ich alle Informationen und Nachweise √ºber mein Hauptkonto, mit der Bitte, das restliche Guthaben zu √ºberweisen. Bis heute keine Reaktion, keine Antwort, kein Geld. Im Chat wurde ich abgewimmelt, ich solle mich doch am Freitag den 15.03 wieder melden, wenn bis dahin nichts bearbeitet wurde. Am 15.03 kam dann eine Mail mit der entkopplung meines Smartphones. Hier gibt es ja offensichtlich mehrere, die bis heute ihr Geld nicht erhalten haben. Die Kommentare von N26 zu den Eintr√§gen hier, beantworten die Fragen genau so wenig wie die Mitarbeiter im Chat. Die Frage, wann wir unser Geld erhalten ist bis heute unklar und niemand √§u√üert sich dazu. Ebenso schwach ist es, mich nichtmal zu kontaktieren, wenn was unklar ist. Mir ist bis heute nicht klar, warum ich gek√ºndigt wurde. Au√üer die K√ºndigung selbst, keine andere Mail mit einem Grund. Nicht empfehlenswert, Finger weg. Falls es jemanden gibt, der sein Geld zur√ºckbekommen hat und einen √§hnlichen Fall hat, bitte mal melden. Liebe Gr√º√üe,Christian Woltereck

content: Hello.When I found in Germany online bank with modern design and supporting English I was pleasantly surprised... Usually we did it using our russian bank and Visa card, it always works fine, but SEPA is faster and cheaper and we tried to open personal account with N26. I registered and passed verification via video chat, a granny in chat said that I am successfully verified. After I disconnected I saw that verification status is still "in progress". I contacted support several times but they didn't tell me anything clear. Eventually 7 days later status changed to "not verified". I visited trustpilot and everything became clear for me. Local hypocrisy and double standards in work. Thanks God they did not allow me to deposit money. This is not a bank but rubbish and time wasting.

name: J
title: Disgraceful
content: I would give no stars if I could. The account was fine for a month or so. I then received a payment and was told my account was being closed to a voioatiom of terms and conditions. When I enquired as to what exactly I violated (assumed receiving transfers was normal for a bank?) I was told customer service could not help. I enquires as to how I would get the funds in the account and whether they could just return to the sender.  I was then contacted by back office support to say they will return to me if I provide my account details. I did this on March 4th (when they responded after closing my account on feb 22nd). I was asked to send a statement from revolout which I did only to be told they can‚Äôt accpet a screenshot. I explained revolout is an online bank such as themselves and that is where I need the funds returned to. I have had no reply from the support team since. I have reached out via twitter only to be told they will get back to me as soon as possible. It has now been a month since my account has closed and they still not have returned my funds. I have reported them to the financial ombudsman and I will be making a report to watchdog. Disgraceful and they should notHe called a bank.

title: ich habe im Januar ein Konto bei N26‚Ä¶
content: ich habe im Januar ein Konto bei N26 er√∂ffnet (Metall Privat Geb√ºhr 16.90‚Ç¨ pro Monat) Zun√§chst wurden 2 Monate die Geb√ºhren abgebucht aber es kam keine Karte. Nachdem ich dann etwas mehr Druck gemacht habe kam die Karte tats√§chlich dann 1 Woche sp√§ter an. Alle Zahlungen liefen von dan an Problemlos bis zu dem Moment indem ich eine Zahlung bekam. Dann bekam ich eine E-Mail, dass ich die Vertragsgrundlage f√ºr die Zahlung liefern sollte. Grundlage war eine Zahlung von einem Freund. Grundlage war ein gemeinsam geplantes Gesch√§ft. Nat√ºrlich wollte keiner von uns, dass der Vertrag offen gelegt wird und die Idee bekannt wird. N26 bestand aber mit dem Hinweis auf das Gesetz auf eine Zusendung per E-Mail also ungesichert und eine Bearbeitungszeit von 3 Tagen. Das hei√üt die Bank hat 3 Tage mit unserem Geld gearbeitet ohne Gegenleistung. In Bezug auf die Dokumente heist es in den Gesch√§ftsbedingungen nur lapidar, dass die Dokumente nur solange gespeichert werden wie sie ben√∂tigt werden. Wenn ich das richtig verstehe speichert die Bank die Dokumente solange, wie sie gesetzliche Aufbewahrungsfristen von Gesch√§ftsvorf√§llen erf√ºllen muss, also mindestens 10 Jahre. Zudem muss ich als Kunde die Datenschutz Gesetze brechen, weil ich pers√∂nliche Daten von Dritten offenlegen muss. Ich habe durchaus Verst√§ndnis das Zahlungsstr√∂me kontrolliert werden m√ºssen. Aber das ich jetzt daf√ºr meine Vertr√§ge offen legen muss, dass geht dann an Transparenz dann doch etwas zu weit. Ich muss meine Kritik korrigieren. Die Bank hat korrekt gehandelt. Der Gesetzgeber verlangt tats√§chlich diese Transparenz. Leider kann ich den Gesetzgeber hier nicht bewerten.
reply: Hey, vielen Dank f√ºr deine ehrlichen Worte. Es tut uns Leid, dass wir dich in solch eine Lage versetzt haben.Aus Sicherheitsrechtlichen Gr√ºnden sind wir dazu aufgefordert Betr√§ge √ºber h√∂here Summen zu kontrollieren. Dies wird durch das Geldw√§sche Gesetz geregelt.Die Metalkarte braucht etwas l√§nger in der Produktion. Sollte diese 2 Monate gedauert haben, k√∂nnen wir in diesem Fall auch die vorherigen Betr√§ge der Metalkosten wieder gutschreiben, da du dein Konto nicht richtig nutzen konntest. Wir entschuldigen uns f√ºr die Unannehmlichkeiten.

name: Bobby Wann
title: Early user. Now HATE them. Onboarding = awesome. The rest = HORRIBLE
content: I was one of the first users for this bank and I absolutely loved it. Now that they are growing, they have forgotten how they got here. The phone pairing didn't work and they blocked me for 24 hours even though it was their system's fault. They dont have capabilities to help you if anything goes wrong. You have to contact support over text and they are extremely unhelpful and rude every single time. You have to wait 5 minutes for them to respond to each message so a conversation lasts 30 min to an hour. If you yourself take longer than 5 minutes to respond, they end the conversation you must start over and answer security questions all over and speak to a new jerk! They blocked my card while I was in the USA and couldn't unblock it and couldn't explain why! Didn't even say sorry.The only perk to this bank over a traditional bank is the onboarding process. After that, a traditional bank is superior in every-way. It made me appreciate traditional banks and I am headed to one tomorrow to get away as fast as possible so I don't miss another payment or get stranded without money because their system is flawed. All of this would be way less horrible if their customer service wasn't extremely unthoughtful and downright hostile. STAY AWAY

name: Jason Lee Osborne
title: Stay away from this bank!!
content: Stay away from this bank!!! I am doing everything in my power to have them shut down but I need other bad reviews to join me on this. After opening an account 2 months ago, I started having my wages paid into it thinking it was a great bank because it was quick and easy to open an account and transfer funds I finally received my metal card ( it looks great ) but it came over 50 days later than expected.1 day after my card arrived I received an email saying my account has been closed due to the terms and conditions A14.2 with immediate effect and no warning. This chapter of the T&C doesn't even apply to me. I haven't got any loans or anything and do not owe this bank a penny. They have seized my hard earned money that I get from my job ( I'm in the army ). I have no money because N26 have basically confiscated my wages like I'm some kind of criminal. They show zero lack of respect for customers in the chat and always leave the chat when you ask a serious question. Very hateful bank actually I only get the feeling they are trying to steal from people.I cant access my money and now I cant even buy food I've not eaten in over 26 hours due to this.This morning I finally managed to get a hold of my bank card from the post room as I was away from my home when the card arrived and I tried to re enter the app to talk to someone however I can no longer access my app.Luckily my fiance can ring them as she lives in Germany but the call only tells you how to use the chat and then when you select to speak to someone it disconnects she says. I cannot chat to anyone from their support team because they have blocked me from entering the app!!!! So stupid! Its like they dont want to make life easyI have contacted the financial ombudsmen regarding this as they have seized my money unlawfully and I have also sent an email to watchdog so hopefully they will look into this.They will make you wait longer than expected for your card and then shut down your account and seize the money that's in there so please stay away from them!!!!

Each staff member seems to have different instructions on how to verify their customers; one insisted I had to provide the details of my STOLEN passport before he would update anything or help me, even though I hadn't had the passport for 4 months. When shipping me my card, they messed the address up TWICE. It took me almost a month to get my card! I've now closed my account and stuck with just Transferwise as their overall service and product is much more refined, user-friendly and really just offers a better total package. When you have to speak to a minimum of three staff per day, for over a week, just to try and get a transfer processed you know there is something wrong with your bank. title: N26 Bank - Kundenservice quasi nicht vorhanden
content: Von der N26 Bank w√ºrde ich jedem dringend abraten. Ich bin seit knapp 10 Monaten Kunde. Und bisher war alles ok. Aber mit dem ersten Problem, das aufgetreten ist, bin ich alleine gelassen und h√§nge seit zwei Wochen in der Warteschleife des Supports. Und es gibt keinerlei M√∂glichkeit, telefonisch Kontakt aufzunehmen - alles nur anonyme Chats oder Emails.Mein Bankkonto wurde am 23.02. gehackt bzw. unbefugt wurden meine Zugangsdaten ge√§ndert (habe nur eine E-Mail erhalten, dass √Ñnderungen vorgenommen wurden) und ich kann seither nicht mehr auf mein Konto zugreifen und mich nicht mehr einloggen. Ich bin auch im Ungewissen dar√ºber, ob mein Konto leerger√§umt wurde. Absolut keine Informationen.T√§gliches Nachfragen beim Support per E-Mail oder Chat und ich werde nur hingehalten. "Zwei Wochen Wartezeit sind normal." war eine der Antworten. Keine Auskunft, kein Zwischenstand, keine Garnichts.Ich habe (auf Vermutung weil keinerlei Infos von N26) Strafanzeige gegen unbekannt wegen Betrug erstattet und selbst mit der Strafanzeige als Referenz erhalte ich keinerlei Infos zu meinem Sachverhalt...Ich erwarte ja keine Wunder, aber zumindest etwas Entgegenkommen, einen pers√∂nlichen Kontakt und einen regelm√§√üigen Zwischenstand. N26 Bank sieht cool aus und wirkt cool. Aber hier wurde absurd weit digitalisiert und gespart. Ganz ohne menschlichen Kontakt und ohne schnelle Hilfestellung geht Bankgesch√§ft nicht. Besonders nicht im Not- / Ernstfall.

name: Chris N
title: Banking in 2019
content: As banking experiences go, this is at a whole new level. *Pros*Setup:I created a bank account with Santander the same week as creating my N26. The experience was night and day. Santander took over 2 hours in person, with me signing at least ten different pieces of paper. When I left, I think I brought with me a squirrel's holiday home with the amount of paperwork. N26 took less than 15 minutes on my phone. Just that simple. Mobile Experience:On top of that, their mobile experience is 10x better than any other bank I've used in the past. I spent 30 minutes on the phone with Santander trying to get the limit on my debit card extended. With N26 I can do it right in the app. *Cons*Fraud Detection:I recently got my card skimmed (or stolen somehow). The thief cleared out my N26 account overnight on a gambling site. N26 have been great with support, and I'm in the process of making a fraud claim to get that money back hopefully.However, I would have expected better fraud detection. I was just lucky that there wasn't a massive amount of money in that N26 account. I had been considering making my N26 account my main account, but I would need more trust in their fraud detection before committing to putting thousands of Euros in N26. *To be clear, I took all the reasonable and expected security steps on my side. I suspect that it got skimmed at a metro station in Valencia.

name: Enrico D.
title: blocked my account keeping abusively 180.000 euro
content: They blocked my account after I asked permission via email to wire in two transfer of 78000 and 176000 euro, the first went well, the second should arrive 1 day before (imagine how bad they was to act), they blocked me the account and they stopped to communicate with me. No emails, no answers, on the chat they close the chat down saying to read last email or that I do not pass the question to verify my identity, or that just they cannot answer and so on all printed, emails that never arrive. Many times asked to be contacted via phone, nothing, from 26 feb to 6 march this is the situation.Found in Trustpilot already people with account blocked for 4 months even for only 5000 euro, and they need to hire a lawyer in Berlin.I will do the same plus I will fly in Berlin to go directly in the court against N26 plus I will ask to the local police like many users are asking in Italy to ban the site because this is like a fraud and against the law and have to be punished by regulators.I was a user of another online app with better support, and I should expect from N26 bad quality and rude support something like that. They just cheated me, telling me to wire in money and then they blocked.Real all the abuses of N26 and fight against them. Contact regulators and let's get them fined and banned.Update 13 march: I want to go to the court and sue them, who want to join please contact me via email or contact the lawyer Monaco in Berlin. Still in the same situation, are over 3 weeks I do not have news and they do not communicate. Also I have confirmations from bank that they stoled the bigger while transfer arrived 4 days before the smaller one, so this make everything much more serious. I'm having very big damage. 3 weeks without money and informations! Stay away and protest with regulator and police.Update 14 march: Still waiting the money!Contacted the BAFIN, German banking regulator, and they answer you ONLY IN GERMAN, and rudely they tell you that they give 3 months!!! for answers to the banks. Imagine... never happen with other EU regulators for an URGENT situation like this.A complete abuse to all levels of Germany, never never I will open again an account in Germany at least with online banks.

name: Harm Moorlag
title: N26, helaas niet bij alle buursupers
content: omdat ik zat ben van de nederlandse banken met hun mega prijzen dacht ik eens verder te kijken; Ik heb daarom een betaalkaart van bank N26 aangevraagd. Het aanmelding proces is kortweg super! Kunnen de banken in Nederland nog wat van leren; geen gezeur en snel aangemeld. De bijbehorende gratis Debit kaart had ik binnen 4 werkdagen in huis. Dat was best snel. Toen maar eens geld gestort, klein beginnen en zien hoeveel tijd het kost. 1 dag kost een overschrijving, en dat is zeer redelijk te noemen. Dan de praktijk: de app is praktisch. zodra je niets niet weet kun je via de app chatten, in het Engels, maar toch... De eerste betalingen: sta ik bij de kruitvat en wil betalen met mijn fonkel nieuwe doorzichtige N26 kaart; helaas krijg ik een grote rode X. Ik kan niet betalen met maestro! Niet credit en ook niet debit.Snel met mijn Nederlandse pas betaald. Dan naar de AH; helaas dezelfde rode X. Toen maar met de chat advies gevraagd. De Chat mevrouw adviseerde om eerst een ATM te gebruiken zodat ook de PIN er duidelijk op staat (!?!). Geen probleem en inderdaad is het mogelijk met de debit kaart geld op te nemen en te pinnen bij een ATM.Meteen door naar de JUMBO; helaas ook een Rode X bij de kassa.Het blijkt dat geen supermarkt een debit kaart accepteert. Kijk, dat is nu weer jammer.5 maart 2019: update: ik wil vanavond op de app zien hoeveel er op de rekening staat. ik krijg melding x50. 'ze' zijn er mee bezig. benieuwd hoelang dit gaat duren. De Apple browser op de iMac komt er ook niet in. (ik laat 1 ster van de waardering vallen)5 maart verder in de avond: ik kan weer in de site en kan alles weer doen, sterretje er bij. Wel mooi dat je bijvoorbeeld de betaling in de app kunt begrenzen (0-2500 euro per keer) of geld opname 0-2500 euro per keer) Wat ook mooi is dat je de kaart via de app kunt beperken. Bijvoorbeeld geld opname uitzetten of betalingen uitzetten. Met de app kun je net voor je geld wilt halen of iets wilt betalen, deze opties weer aanzetten en daarna weer uit. Ook weer lekker veilig in het buitenland. Ziet er goed uit, ik hou je op de hoogte.

name: Salome Pratt
title: BEWARE - THEY BLOCK YOUR ACCOUNT FOR NO REASON AND LEAVE YOU AND YOUR KIDS STRANDED IN A FOREIGN COUNTRY IN THE WINTER SEASON
content: I opened my account in December 12 2018 to receive my remuneration for a contract that I have in Germany, I went through the verification process and it was validated on December 18. I had two incoming transactions from the professional German bank account of my management company and should N26 have any doubts about these transactions, they could easily trace them and get all the related documents. I have never deposited cash into this account.On Tuesday the 26th of February 2019, I tried to buy food but my payment was refused. I tried to connect into my account but I got a bizarre message. I went to my email and there I saw an even more bizarre message stating that they have decided not to accept the verification/validation that they accepted before they opened the account.I contacted them telling them that I am a 53 year old single mother with 3 children of which one is presently sick and in hospital and that I am stranded in Germany with no money to even buy food and asked them to unblock at least welfare money so that we could buy food - but they have not replied. I even gave them the contact details of my management company and tax team/accountants in Germany so that they could contact them to get any verification/validation that they would need - but they still have not unblocked my account.The bizarre message that they sent me in French is the followingBonjourDans le cadre du processus de v√©rification, vos donn√©es ont √©t√© examin√©es.Malheureusement, nous ne pouvons pas accepter les donn√©es que nous avons re√ßues.Notre partenaire a fourni la raison suivante: La qualit√© de la photo n'√©tait pas suffisante.Par cons√©quent, nous devons r√©initialiser votre statut de v√©rification. S'il vous pla√Æt laissez-nous savoir un moment opportun dans les 7 prochains jours.Si vous ne nous informez pas d'un moment opportun, nous devrons r√©initialiser votre v√©rification sous 7 jours et votre compte sera suspendu jusqu'√† ce que la nouvelle v√©rification d'identit√© soit compl√©t√©e.Si vous utilisez un compte pr√©mium (N26 m√©tal, N26 black) la cotisation mensuelle sera r√©guli√®rement imput√©e au compte.Si vous avez d'autres questions, n'h√©sitez pas √† nous contacter.Cordialement,N26 Customer ServiceN26 Bank GmbHManaging Directors: Markus Gunter, Matthias OetkenKlosterstra√üe 6210179 Berlin | GermanyHRB ID: 170602B (Berlin District Court Charlottenburg)VAT ID: DE 30/595/7096.

name: Dale
title: Not a good start and not really ready‚Ä¶
content: Not a good start and not really ready for service.The process of opening the account was slick and seamless using the cam on the phone to capture proof documentation needed, account number immediately available, very fast push notifications via the app of payments in and out. The app (what there is of it) is slick and a couple of nice touches like swiping over the camera to blur out figures if your in a public place)However this is where it breaks down a bit, despite stating on the website 5 - 14 days to receive your debit card (which already feels long compared with standard banks) after 14 days I get an email stating due to logistical problems it could be up to another two weeks, but hopefully not that long, at the end of the two weeks I complained via twitter got another email saying sorry they were having logistical problems it could be another week. So five weeks in and no sign of getting a debit card, given they don‚Äôt offer check books this makes the account pretty much useless. They don‚Äôt participate in the account switch service (presumably they don‚Äôt want people leaving easily when they realise how atrocious their service is) which means you have to manually visit each of your DD,s and manually switch them to your new account ( a process I have stopped till I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôm going to remain a customer) Once you do get DD‚Äôs into the account there is no way on the website or app to manage them or cancel them, if reports I have read are true you have to get a form, fill in details that are hard to get often involving you contacting the DD payee to ask for details, sign it and send it to support.Given they are new into the market you may also find companies can‚Äôt accept them yet as a DD source although hopefully that will resolve its self fairly soon, so far about a third of my DD‚Äôs could not accept N26 as a source. There is no way to manage regular payee‚Äôs that I can see. If reports I have read are true, if you try to cancel your account until their service matures you are slapped with a lifetime ban.I have read reports of payments (IN) being late or delayed in their systems meaning people default on their outbound payments for bills and mortgages. They do not have a 24 x 7 customer service team and if reports I have read are anything to go by their support team have not been educated on the basics of customer service (although I have not experienced this first hand)If you hold or want a euro account they can‚Äôt give you a second GBP account. Despite the UK market feeling like a lack lustre launch was botched and still waiting for basics to be fixed like getting a card, systems working reliably, and basic banking functions still needing to be enabled, N26 have made big announcements of moving on to its next markets in Brazil and the US. In summary - does not feel like a professional outfit, feels like a start up which is not what you want from a bank. I think they are trying to move when they are not ready. In my opinion they are not ready to take over as your primary bank, personally I‚Äôm just going to use them as a payment processor for some of my transactions. I started with plans to compleay switch my banking to them but I don‚Äôt feel like they are in any way ready for that. They need to do a lot of work on the customer service and realise they are dealing with people‚Äôs money, they WILL get mad if you fail to meet your obligations, that goes with the territory and being unable to answer questions in a knolagable way or closing chat windows before customers have finished is not going to win you and good will. They need to review their lifetime ban policy when customers decide (probably quite justifiably) that N26 are not ready for service yet. They probably should look at not charging yet even for their metal accounts until they really are truly ready to be called a bank with all the basic services. They need to get to at least the basic standards of banking functionality, like managing payees DD‚Äôs and SO‚Äôs before they call themselves a bank. They need to plan and evacuate launches much better than they did the UK. In my opinion they need to form a customer opinion group and take notice of the feedback they are receiving. Finally my advice by all means try them but don‚Äôt rely on them, and don‚Äôt make my mistake and sign up for their paid for service thinking you can switch to them, they are no way ready to be a bank.
reply: Hey Dale,Thanks for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We really appreciate your thoughts and suggestions! The easiest way to support us with your suggestions is by writing an email to ideas@n26.com. Your ideas will then be collected and directed to the relevant team. We are pleased to hear about your sign up experience. Deliveries to the UK can take up to 10 days. At this time Express delivery is not yet available. We apologise that there was an issue with your card delivery. Our UK accounts support Direct Debits. Please keep in mind that other UK banks can take up to 6 weeks to update their systems to recognise N26 accepts BACS. You have the ability to reverse a direct debit in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited. You can cancel only after the first Direct Debit has been taken out. Simply select the direct debit in question and choose Reverse debit. At this time saving payees is not available. As soon as it is we will inform you. We currently don't offer a switching service. It is not yet offered, however you'll be informed as soon as this feature becomes available. You can follow our @N26 blog and social media accounts to stay up-to-date!We are constantly looking to improve our services. You can read more about our customer service here: https://n26.com/en-de/blog/customer-support-at-n26We offer a Standard account which is free of charge and premium accounts which come with a monthly fee. You can find our pricing list on our support center. Here is the link: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/account/how-much-does-an-n26-account-costBest,Your N26 Support Team

title: Horrible customer service, general bad attitude
content: In light of my experience, I can not see N26 as serious, trustworthy bank.Few days after signing up, the application and the internet site were down for good ~15 minutes. in such case, you have absolutely nothing to do, no one to talk to, no way to understand what is going on.There is no functioning phone number - the number advertised has just annoying recorded message ask you to use the App/Internet site chat. but when thy are down, you just lost.I managed to got hold of customer service man for people interesting in opening new account. he said that they aware of the failure, and has no prediction for how long will it take to repair it.when asked politely how am I supposed to know about it, or what to do, he just ended the chat. very rude and unprofessional.This attitude can barely work for small online shopping site. this can't work for banking. leaving people with no clue what is going on, with no one to talk to or any information. how can you trust such company with your money?(yes, after a while the application said that there is "planned maintenance", which contradict what the customer service man said (failure) I feel this "scheduled maintenance" claim to be untrustworthy)Imagine one day the failure will not last 15 minutes, but days, weeks, forever? and you won't have anyone to approach. They seems to have such attitude which does not fit for banking. I don't feel that the customer is taken seriously or that I this organization can be trusted.   I can't recommenced this as main bank, perhaps convenient gimmick. don't put there any amount you can't afford to lose. I don't think those guys understand what being responsible to people money means.

name: Nick Steen
title: Top notch bank with excellent customer service.
content: An excellent bank with all tools necessary for travellers and daily transfers. Very smooth customer service and of course very beautiful credit cards (it's the simple things in life that count).I have contacted the customer service a couple of times, both for small questions and urgent requests, and every time I was helped smoothly and friendly. The issues were resolved in record time and I never had a feeling of being left in the dark, which is really nice considering it's your money they're working with.The app works intuitively, and most importantly, has never failed on me. It's both secure and simple, so you can find everything you need in an easy manner. The diagnostics are great, though the automated payment type recognition could use some more refinement, but nothing that a little manual correction can't solve.As a frequent traveller, it's especially great to have the Mastercard charges dropped. It has saved me quite some money in the long term.All in all a perfect allround bank with a smooth app and never failing credit card, which is all you need for regular transactions. If necessary, the customer service is great and helps you sort out your issues quickly and accurately.

title: Potential Scam - Be careful
content: Potential Scam - Be carefulFirst time I heard about N26, it seemed to good to be true. But I still gave it a go. I talked to somebody via video chat to verify, which seemed already very dodgey. Nevertheless I went through the process. Once all said and done I was told the card was on its way and would arrive within 2weeks.Nothing. No response to my email. So I waited patiently a few more months, nothing whatsoever. It never arrived. I doubt it was ever sent out.So I didn't keep bothering for obvious reasons.One year passes, I stumbled over an email from N26, logged into my account to see whats going on.Looks like they want me to pay now. Absolute insane.Screenshots:gyazo.com/ ab3315fe9f1340ea502c66e2e810770egyazo.com/ 1dc63cdd830bf0c7fd88ee710742239c(remove the space after the / )I can't even believe half of the positive comments here. name: Andy
title: Poor customer on-boarding and service
content: ProsApp is pretty slick and nice and easy to navigate.ConsTime to open an account - I get there is probably more hoops to jump through as they are a German bank but I had a Monzo account opened in 24 hours. N26 took over a week.My card - I'm still waiting for it after a month of opening my account.Customer Services - Is there even any? I've contacted them twice and had no response which instantly makes me think they have problems.Spaces - While I think it's a great idea to be able to make sub accounts of your main account it falls short when on the standard account model you can only create 2 spaces.Again Monzo come up trumps here as I've got 4 sub accounts and they dont charge me any extra for it. N26 want an extra ¬£5 a month.SummaryFor a company which is trying to gain market share and traction in an already competitive UK market they've got a lot of customer service issues to sort out and quickly.People dont want to be kept waiting especially with the new Fintech banking capabilities available from other companies they can onboard customers quickly and with little fuss.Maybe I just got unlucky but I've already pulled my money out of N26 and gone elsewhere.

Ich nutze auch nur die kostenlose Variante und hebe auch kein Geld ab, somit kann ich nichts zu den "Premium" Angeboten sagen.Als kostenloses Zusatzkonto ist N26 top. Die App ist schnell installiert und man kann sich ohne M√ºhen identifizieren. Ich konnte das ganz bequem bei einem Video-Chat erledigen. Einfach den Personalausweis ans Gesicht halten und ein paar Worte sagen - fertig!Die Karte kam auch z√ºgig und ich muss gestehen: Sie sieht schon richtig sch√∂n aus.Das N26 keine "herk√∂mmliche" Bank mit Filialen ist, st√∂rt mich √ºberhaupt nicht. √úber die App kann man alles schnell und einfach erledigen.Was mir richtig gut gef√§llt:Die einfachen √úberweisungen und die M√∂glichkeit, mit ein paar Klicks eigene "Unterkonten" anzulegen, auf die man dann Geld zur Seite legen kann. Nat√ºrlich ist das nichts neues, aber wie einfach es hier geht ist erstaunlich. Bei meiner prim√§ren Bank muss ich erst ein Formular ausf√ºllen und unterschreiben, bevor ich ein Unterkonto erstellen kann.Das Manko:Man braucht ein Smartphone, da N26 nur dar√ºber funktioniert. Ein kleiner Bequemlichkeits-Nachteil ist, das man sich alle 30 Tage mit dem eigentlichen Passwort in die App einloggen muss. FaceID oder Fingerabdrucksensor m√ºssen dann wieder neu "erlaubt" werden. Nachdem man das gemacht hat, kann man ohne Probleme FaceID oder den Fingerabdruck zum Login nutzen.Meine Empfehlung: Versuchen Sie es einfach mal. Nutzen Sie N26 als Zweit- oder Drittkonto und machen Sie sich mit den M√∂glichkeiten vertraut. Wenn es Ihnen gef√§llt, dann k√∂nnen Sie auch einen der Premium-Kontomodelle ausprobieren. To contact customer support you have to have the app, to have the app you have to get your documents registered first. So I guess they expect me to send the same photos for the next 50 years again and again considering the avarage life expectancy in my country. After googling the problem here and there and try to find a solution, I realise that they actually have a customer service. But it is on twitter or facebook. I don't know if it can get more lame than that. So if you are not using facebook or twitter don't even think about n26 because f you if you are not addicted to social media. Now I totally changed my mind about the service because think about it... Lets say you put 10000 euros to your account, and one day you realized that is 0 .It is suddenly gone. Who will you contact? Some guy on twitter? Some application? Or you can try to answer their noreply mails. This extremely easy to use no headache banking style in the end of the day can make you very very angry. And there is no real person whom you can shout at. So.. No thank you. I will pay my 3 euro something monthly fee and have a regular every day normal bank account. Which I can call and go to and write an email.

title: Top rekening met Mastercard, Maestro en goede app
content: Ik gebruik N26 nu een maand of 6. Heb eerst in UK Monzo gebruikt, daar was ik zeer tevreden mee (gratis online rekening, met app met push berichten wanneer je geld overmaakt, en erg handig om uitgaven in de gaten te houden).In Nederland opereert Monzo niet, dus ben overgestapt naar N26.Werkt bijna net zo goed, wel even weekje gedoe om Maestro kaart aan te vragen. Je krijgt eerst namelijk alleen de Mastercard. Pas als je die geactiveerd hebt, en 100 euro hebt gestort, kun je de Maestro kaart aanvragen. Ze gaan wel beide van dezelfde rekening.Je kunt zelf via de app je pincode instellen, en betaal-limieten voor binnen- en buitenland regelen. Geld overmaken is ook zo gepiept.Mastercard (debit) is zeer handig om in buitenland ook bv auto te kunnen huren. Heb hiernaast ook geen creditcard meer nodig.N26 heeft Duitse IBAN. Nadeel daarvan is 1 dag vertraging bij overmaken van en naar Nederlandse rekeningen. Wel goed tegen impuls-aankopen!Ik gebruik m'n N26 voor boodschappen en reguliere uitgaves, als ook internationale uitgaven. Voor Nederlandse automatische incasso's en sparen gebruik ik m'n Triodos rekening. Deze combinatie bevalt me erg goed.

content: I tried using the service a year or two ago in Germany as my parents moved there, but we were greeted with an error page during the signup process, and no-one reached out to us about it, so we just forgot.After that, I convinced my parents to give it another go, and we tried it again in December 2018. During the signup process, we had to wait for someone to show up at the sign-up call to verify our identity, but no one did within 40 minutes and we just lost the patience. We tried it next day and after a few minutes, we got greeted by a rude person on video that we couldn't understand and t hung up on us after a few seconds of miscommunication.When I tried to sign-up for my personal account in the UK, the experience was fine, and I was told that within 2 days I'll have my account approved. After a week I got an email saying that the demand is high and it will take a bit longer (the app said within 5 days), it has been a couple of weeks now and still nothing.During this whole experience getting a hold of someone at the company is extremely difficult as I couldn't find a phone number, email to reach them at. Their preferred way of communication is a chat inside the app, but you have to have an approved N26 account (so if you are having issues with sign-up, good luck). I somehow found a web-based chat which was only available within a specific page in their guide, which I found very awkward.I have absolutely no idea why anyone in the UK would even consider opening an account with them since Starling, Monzo, and Revolut seem like superior choices.

name: Adrian
title: Kundenkommunikation und Geschwindigkeit der Abl√§ufe sehr mangelhaft!
content: Am 21.01.2019 wurde mir √ºber Pf√§ndung meines Kontos mitgeteilt, welches daher gleichzeitig gesperrt wurde. In der eingehenden Email hat man unter anderem angeboten, den Gl√§ubiger direkt vom N26 Konto zu bezahlen, falls der Betrag darauf ausreicht. Da der Betrag auf dem Konto fast 3 mal so hoch ist, habe ich die Bank direkt per Email mit allen Notwendigen Verifizierungsschritten beauftragt, den Betrag samt evtl. Geb√ºhren zu begleichen. In der Email von der Bank stand, dass daf√ºr 3-4 Tage gebraucht werden. Als nach 3 Tagen nichts passiert ist, hat man mir per Chat best√§tigt, dass mein √úberweisungsauftrag ausreichend verifiziert vorliegt und die "entsprechende Abteilung" sich darum k√ºmmert. Als heute, 8 Tage nach der Pf√§ndung, immer noch nichts passiert ist, habe ich noch ein mal den Chat gestartet und erkl√§rt, dass es Ende des Monates ist und ich den Zugriff zum Konto f√ºr wichtige Zahlungen brauche und dementsprechend sehr dringend auf die Entsperrung des Kontos angewiesen bin.  Die R√ºckmeldung war praktisch identisch der von meinem ersten Kontakt. Fazit: Ich bekomme bereits 8 Tage lang weder den Gl√§ubiger trotz ausreichend Geld auf dem Konto bezahlt noch eine R√ºckmeldung, warum es so ist bzw. dass es evtl. ein Problem g√§be.Aus welchem Grund es bei N26 auch immer so l√§uft, sind sowohl die Kommunikation mit den Kunden als auch die Dauer der Abl√§ufe absolut mangelhaft. Dazu kommt, dass es bei mir bereits keine erste negative Erfahrung mit N26 ist. Abschlie√üend m√∂chte ich noch bem√§ngeln, dass das Zirkus, das N26 "Kundenschutz" bzw. "Datenschutz" oder wie auch immer nennt, einfach nur gewaltig und auf Kosten der Benutzerfreundlichkeit √ºbertrieben ist. So hat man unz√§hlige Verifizierungsschritte eingebaut, die in deren Zahl einfach nur nerven. So starte ich den Support-Chat von der N26-App, die f√ºr jedes Konto nur einmal auf einem Mobiltelefon installiert und erst mir Passworteingabe oder Face-ID gestartet werden kann und zwar auf meinem ebenfalls durch Face-ID oder Passworteingabe zu entsperrenden iPhone. Dann kann ich zwar alle Ums√§tze sehen, muss mich f√ºr den Kundenchat noch mehrstufig durch Geburtsort, den auf der Karte angegebenen Token und auch noch durch die Nennung eines Umsatzes auf meinem Konto verifizieren. Das komische ist aber, dass ich zweimal aufeinander beim Starten vom Kundenchat gebeten wurde, denselben Umsatz zu nennen, genauer gesagt den f√ºnftletzten. Und da sich w√§hrend der Sperrung nichts tut, ist das beide Male derselbe Umsatz gewesen.H√§tte ich heute den Bedarf ein neues Konto zu er√∂ffnen, w√ºrde ich mich mit meinen N26-Erfahrungen definitiv f√ºr einen anderen Anbieter entscheiden.
reply: Vielen Dank f√ºr deine ehrlichen Worte. Es tut uns leid zu h√∂ren, dass wir deine Erwartungen nicht erf√ºllen konnten. Wir werden dein Feedback an die entsprechende Abteilung weiterleiten

title: Virement de fonds de cl√¥ture d'un PEA rejet√© par N26 et cl√¥ture surprise de mon compte
content: Virement de fonds de cl√¥ture d'un PEA rejet√© par N26 malgr√© la fourniture de tous les justificatifs possibles sur l'origine des fonds.Le m√™me jour, r√©ception de l'email standard de N26 m'informant de la cl√¥ture de mon compte avec deux mois de pr√©avis.Comme d'autres personnes ont comment√© ici, il est difficile de comprendre en quoi mon "usage" aurait √©t√© contraire √† la section ¬ß 9.3 (section qui n'existe pas!) des Conditions G√©n√©rales d‚ÄôUtilisation ‚ÄúCompte courant N26‚Äù.Mon interpr√©tation personnelle est que je n'ai pas encore utilis√© ma carte bancaire depuis que j'ai ouvert mon compte N26, et il est probable que N26 tire l'essentiel de ses revenus des paiements par carte (commissions pay√©es par les commer√ßants) et autres produits commerciaux tels que cr√©dits √† la consommation etc. (je n'ai pas v√©rifi√© quels produits ils proposent exactement √† ce jour). Donc pour dire les choses cr√ªment je ne suis pas un client rentable pur eux.Evidemment, si j'ai raison sur ce point, c'est un aspect plut√¥t embarrassant pour eux, donc on comprend qu'ils pr√©f√®rent rester le plus √©vasif possible sur les vraies raisons de cl√¥ture de comptes.Je voulais tester mon compte avec diff√©rents types d'op√©rations plus ou moins complexes avant de d√©cider d'en faire ma banque principale et j'ai bien fait! Au moins je n'ai pas √† ce jour de fonds bloqu√©s chez eux comme nombre de leurs malheureux clients fran√ßais, s'il faut en croire tous les avis qui mentionnent ce probl√®me.Tr√®s d√©√ßus de mon exp√©rience chez N26, m√™me si je n'ai pas subi de cons√©quences vraiment f√¢cheuse comme nombres de leurs malheureux clients fran√ßais. Ma femme et moi d√©conseilleront cette banque en ligne √† toute notre famille, nos coll√®gues de travail et nos amis, comme √©tant extr√™mement peu fiable. title: Long Story Short
content: Long story short, this is a great online banking option for travelers but after some recent experiences with their customer service and their inability to dispute a charge made on my account by a fraudulent website without blocking/re-ordering my card really killed my faith in them as a serious financial institution. It seems that as they grow in size their client support is decreasing. When it comes to resolving problems with my money, I do not appreciate speaking automated chat robots or being told that my bank cannot do anything for me with out causing me great inconvenience. I think banks and other financial institutions should remember that it is our money that allows them to stay in business, so it may be a good idea to protect your clients assets.. All that said I still recommend them as a temporary banking solution for travelers or those without other banking options available. Great company that is growing fast, maybe too fast.

Anyway, they are good at raising money and spending it on plush offices, but the banking basics aren't there, even after several years of existence.

name: customer
title: Better to put your trust elsewhere
content: From my experience, this lot have a long way to go before they can be considered a fully functional bank.  It looks nice and slick and the app does its job pretty well. But if you hit any problems, then things unravel quickly - as others have noted here.  For me, they refused to credit a chunky deposit to my account - even though I had asked in advance if this was ok and provided evidence of where it came from.  It took two weeks to resolve. And through all that time it was impossible to get any replies from their Back Office staff. The in-app chat people are generally friendly but seem disconnected from the actual banking staff, so are of little help in these situations. And there is no phone number available to try and actually talk to someone. I wrote a formal complaint to their banking CEO Markus Gunter - no reply.I messaged their CEO Valentin Stalf on Linkedin - no reply.In the end they reversed the deposit payment, so at least I got my money back in the end.And now today I get an email saying my account was being terminated. Well that's just peachy.So no attempt from them to really look at the problem or raise any dialogue with me to find a solution.  And then it seems they consider me too much of a bother to keep as a customer.There are far better options available to you - Revolut, TransferWise etc that have much better reputations and people you can speak to when problems arise.

name: Stefan
title: Absolut unseri√∂se Bankerfahrung - nie wieder N26 f√ºr mich.
content: Ich bin bzw. war seit 2016 N26 Kunde. Eigentlich war ich recht zufrieden mit der Bank. Tolle App, tolle Features. Habe die Bank als Hauptkonto verwendet, bei dem all mein Zahlungsverkehr abgewickelt wurde, also Gehaltseingang, Miete, Versicherungen, Rechnungen, Eink√§ufe usw.Auf dem Konto war ein 5-stelliger Betrag.Am 28.12.2018 wurde dann pl√∂tzlich mein Konto gesperrt mit dem Hinweis einer "Routine√ºberpr√ºfung". Das Konto blieb jedoch gesperrt.Im Januar werden viele Versicherungen, Mietzahlungen usw. f√§llig, so dass die Lastschriften nicht eingel√∂st werden konnten und mir dadurch Probleme und Kosten entstanden sind.Am 08.01.2019 habe ich den Kundenservice gebeten, mein Geld auf ein anderes Konto zu √ºberweisen und mein N26 Konto zu schlie√üen. Das war auch nicht m√∂glich.Gestern bekam ich eine Email, dass die "Routine√ºberpr√ºfung" abgeschlossen sei und ich mein Konto wieder normal nutzen kann. Habe sofort alles Geld auf mein neues Konto bei der Deutschen Bank √ºberwiesen und mein N26 Konto gek√ºndigt."Routine√ºberpr√ºfung" ist ja OK, aber doch bitte ohne mehr als 2 w√∂chige Kontosperrung, bei der man weder an Bargeld kommt oder Zahlungen mit der Mastercard t√§tigen kann, noch √úberweisungen t√§tigen kann oder Lastschriften eingel√∂st werden.Ich kann nur von N26 abraten, das ist kein seri√∂ses Bankverhalten. Ich bin nun wieder bei der Deutschen Bank.Den Fall habe ich meinem Rechtsanwalt √ºbergeben und werde den mir entstandenen Schaden (R√ºcklastschriftgeb√ºhren, etc) zur√ºckfordern, n√∂tigenfalls gerichtlich. Dar√ºberhinaus habe ich den Fall der BaFin gemeldet.

content: I created an account two weeks ago having liked the idea of the spending analysis, app and financial control having smart bank account offers.However, I still haven't had an account set up after two weeks of radio silence, no card  and customer service tells me the delay would deffinately be resolved in 2 days, 3 days ago... There are mobile banks that get back to you quickly and set up accounts swiftly and simply generate a passive service to help you manage your finances and offer reassurence through good customer care..... My advice is simple listen to all the bad reviews from. People who have had a similar experience to me..... look at what N26s staff are trying to tell you.... DO NOT USE THIS  HOPLESS, STRESSFUL, TIME CONSUMING WASTE OF TIME... Nice idea... Badly executed

name: Khan
title: This bank is a joke.
content: This bank is a joke.I was victim of fraud as someone used my debit card details online and spent a big amount.I disputed the transactions and ordered a replacement debit card.The bank asked me to fill in dispute forms which I did. The bank told me that they would send the forms to Mastercard for review. Two days later, I received an email from N26 bank that my dispute has been approved by Mastercard and I will get my money back in 3 days.However, after 3 days, there was no money in my bank and the bank 'seized my account'. I was given no reason whatsoever. After several days, I received an email from bank asking me to provide some personal details to confirm my identity and source of funds.I provided the requested information on the same day.Two days later, I received another email from N26 that the checks on my account were successful and my account was 'fully operational'.I asked again about the status of the dispute I had raised. But no reply.Next day, I received yet another email from N26 support team that my account has been closed with immediate effect.I was given no reason why they did so. I was given no response to my dispute. I have been asking them again and again to give me my money back but there is a complete silence.To make things worse, there is no telephone line where you could call and complain.This bank is a scam. Please stay away; your money is not safe with them.

name: Guillaume Guinard
title: Carte fragile, service client fastidieux a contacter, renouvellement vicieux
content: Excellent service, jusqu'√† ce que vous avez un probl√®me de carte, ce qui va se passer a un moment ou √† un autre vu que celle-ci est tr√®s fine et se fissure toute seule √† l'usage (n26 black). Un jour elle n'est plus accept√©e par les machines, ou aval√©e.La seule mani√®re de contacter le service est via le livechat de l'application, si vous n'√™tes pas disponible t√¥t le matin il faut √™tre pr√™t √† faire la queue derri√®re au moins 20 personnes en gardant l'application ouverte pour la verifier regulierement. (attente moyenne : entre 15 et 30 minutes).Dans mon cas, j'ai command√© une nouvelle carte apr√®s que la mienne a √©t√© aval√©e par une machine. En commander une nouvelle est facile via l'application, mais mon colis ne m'est jamais parvenu (la faute √† UPS, et non n26). Cependant, √©tant au Royaume Uni je n'ai eu aucun moyen de suivre mon colis a moins de contacter mon service client, ce qui est fastidieux, et qui ne peut rien pour moi une fois la carte envoy√©e. R√©sultat, j'ai pass√© 1 mois et demie sans carte, car je n'ai pas pu contacter le service client pour √™tre averti que la carte ne sera jamais livr√©e chez moi mais envoy√©e a un point relais a la place, me rendre au point relais qu'il fallait a cause d'un voyage, ou meme retrouver le point relais en question (un lavomatique isol√© dans une ruelle perdue). J'ai quand m√™me d√ª payer mes frais et payer pour ma nouvelle carte, sans d√©dommagement. A noter aussi: Le renouvellement de votre abonnement est automatique. Si vous r√©siliez moins de deux semaines avant la fin de votre abonnement, c'est mort, quand bien m√™me vous n‚Äôavez pas l‚Äôusage de votre carte. Je recommande de r√©silier d√®s la r√©ception de votre carte, vu que la r√©siliation ne sera effective qu‚Äôun an plus tard, et d‚Äôannuler la r√©siliation au dernier moment si besoin. Tout se fait en un lien via l‚Äôapplication.

title: Terrible Customer Support
content: Customer Support experience:1. Click on the Chat button in the web.2. Tell the bot that I need a confirmation for my transaction.3. Bot didn't help.4. Wait for human.5. Human asks again, "How can I help?"6. "I want a confirmation for one transaction."7. CS advices me to check Statistics page in the app.8. I'm browsing the app to find where the Statistics page is....9. I get dropped from the chat for inactivity.10. Start a chat again.11. Do the steps 2-7 again. Including CS asking me again, "How can I help?" after bot failed to process the request and my previous conversation got dropped because of inactivity....19. I'm on the Statistics page.20. CS: "Press and hold on the transaction"21. Me: "Nothing is happening"22. CS: "Is it a transfer or card payment?"23. Me: "Card payment."24. CS: "We do not provide that."25. I need it for the customs authorities.26. You can print the whole month statement and highlight the transaction.27. But I do not want to share my whole month statement with a third party. I need it only for this one transaction.28. Sorry, we do not provide that currently.29. Could you please explain me why is it not possible?30. Got dropped from the chat....This is one experience from today. I don't remember ever having smooth CS experience with N26. If you never need to talk their CS, it's an OK app to use.

name: Karsten Knorr
title: Kunden statt Runden
content: In der Presse liest man gerade √ºber die neu abgeschlossene Finanzierungsrunde von 260 Mio EUR f√ºr die weitere Expansion. Und gleichzeitig hier und auf vielen weiteren Bewertungsseiten von den mangelhaften Erfahrungen, die wir als Kunden mit N26 machen. Wobei N26 auf diese nicht einmal mehr reagiert.Es scheint so, als w√§ren wir Kunden nur noch √ºberfl√ºssiges Beiwerk, nachdem N26 gerade am Anfang alles getan hat, um so viele Kunden wie m√∂glich zu gewinnen. Denn die Anzahl der Kunden ist wie bei vielen Startups der Multiplikator f√ºr die Bewertung des Unternehmens.Vielleicht ist das auch einer der Gr√ºnde, warum K√ºndigungen ignoriert und nicht bearbeitet werden? Und vielleicht wird es Zeit, mit den F√º√üen abzustimmen und N26 den R√ºcken zu kehren? So, wie viele von uns zahlreiche Freunde f√ºr N26 geworben haben, bekommen wir Diese Freunde bestimmt auch wieder von N26 weg. Und ein gr√∂√üerer Kundenverlust bringt N26 vielleicht zum Nachdenken..Was denkt Ihr? Bitte Beitrag als hilreich markieren, wenn Du zustimmst.Ah, jetzt probiert N26 schon, solche Beitr√§ge sperren zu lassen. Und Trustpilot bittet um Erg√§nzung des Beitrages um pers√∂nliche Erfahrung. Aber gerne :-)Kundendienst ist nicht erreichbar, es dauert Stunden, bis auf den Chat geantwortet wird, oftmals erfolgt gar keine Antwort. Wenn die R√ºckmeldung an den Kundendienst auch nur die kleinste Kritik an den Produkten von N26 erh√§lt oder N26 um Behebung eines Fehlers gebeten wird, wird der Chat sofort beendet. Keiner f√ºhlt sich f√ºr irgend etwas zust√§ndig, K√ºndigungen werden ignoriert und Emails nicht beantwortet.

name: Arman
title: Update at the bottom. was 1* now 4*
content: Opened a metal account almost a month ago. Have contacted N26 on the phone and via the online chat feature a number of times. The phone calls didn't resolve the issue but the people on the phone were friendly and professional.However still no card. All I'm given is a link to UPS tracking, then told the card has not arrived from the manufacturer. So I'm being given a tracking link to something the N26 themselves don't have. There are no timescales to when I can expect my card. Rather the support staff say I will have it ASAP or soon. Also in the most recent exchange the support staff assured me that I "could use the account the fully".When I challenged them on how I make atm withdrawals without a card, they simply offered me the email address to make a complaint. As it stands, I have signed up to a paid account with a host of benefits that I can not access.UpdateSo the card finally arrived, just in time for my holiday. Works like a charm. Didn't have any issues using it abroad. The app kept me up to date with all transactions through instant alerts. Most of the reasons for calling my traditional bank, I can manage myself through the app. Not sure if the production and delivery issues with the metal card have been resolved, but now I have the card. name: Geronimo Poggio
title: Perhaps the most comfortable banking experience in the whole of Europe
content: N26 has been my bank of choice for the last 4 years, and I have not once regretted signing up. They have never charged me a penny, and even though they have restricted their product considerably since launch, they are still above the competition in my book. It has been a very user-friendly experience for me, and I feel like a valued customer each time I contact support. Which hasn't been often mind you, because once you have signed up and been verified, the product basically just works.Pros:- No recurrent fees- Full checking account- Debit MasterCard- Easily manageable app- Enable/Disable access to MasterCard in full or in part with the touch of a button- Send money without a banking address with MoneyBeam- No foreign currency fee- Fast responsive customer supportCons:- Credit rating might hurt you now when trying to sign up, didn't in the beginning- Google Play dependency (not desirable for Custom ROM lovers like myself) - Only 3-5 ATM withdrawals per month in Germany (unlimited in the beginning)- Cash withdrawal now comes with a fee in some countriesThe cons are not that important to me, that's why I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a basic checking account with some nice bonus features sprinkled on top.

name: Sergio da Silva
title: Banking as it should be
content: Online banking as it should be: simple, fast, easy. The main caveat is that the MasterCard provided is a debit card and not a credit card. Not that it bothers me to see my bank account being debited immediately, but some merchants do not accept debit cards for securing a deposit and only accept credit cards (e.g. hotels, car rentals, ...). Support via the mobile app is great due to the tight integration. Would like to see more services being offered in markets other than Germany (I use it Luxembourg) and would like to have more ATMs support money withdrawal (very little ATMs in Luxembourg allow to withdraw money using the N26 MasterCard debit card - so far ING ATMs work but there are very little such ATMs available throughout Luxembourg).

name: Lorenzo Pedull√†
title: Chiusura conti, ecco qualche risposta.
content: Qualche considerazione sui casi di chiusura dei conti.Facendo delle ricerche online mi sembra di capire che i conti vengano chiusi principalmente per tre motivi:1. Violazioni del contratto e delle condizioni d'uso (es. creazione di account per minorenni, utilizzo della carta standard per fini commerciali, cessione della carta a terzi)2. Attivit√† illegali o al limite della legalit√† (es. acquisto di criptovalute, acquisti da siti segnalati come pericolosi, bonifici o pagamenti senza causale e quindi sospetti)3. Attivit√† che recano svantaggio a N26.Quest'ultimo √® il punto importante, che cercher√≤ di spiegare come meglio posso;N26, essendo una startup, ha l'obbiettivo di crescere il pi√π in fretta possibile e per questo motivo, cerca di attirare clienti offrendo un servizio a condizioni vantaggiose, quali la creazione di un conto estero in 8 minuti senza troppi controlli, prelievi e bonifici senza commissioni, spedizione della carta gratuita, e utilizzo gratuito dei servizi Spaces e Moneybeam. Con il programma inviti, N26 regala addirittura soldi ai suoi nuovi clienti!Quello che per√≤ alcune persone non prendono in considerazione, √® che alcuni di questi servizi e privilegi, come i prelievi ATM e i bonifici SEPA, hanno un costo, e ogni volta che noi facciamo una di queste operazioni, le commissioni vengono pagate dalla banca invece che dal cliente.La chiusura dei conti potrebbe quindi essere una conseguenza di prelievi troppo frequenti o bonifici troppo frequenti e/o elevati.Questa mia tesi √® supportata da alcune recensioni su Trustpilot che lamentavano di aver avuto il proprio account bloccato dopo aver provato a fare pi√π bonifici SEPA di fila con somme abbastanza elevate, e da un articolo del 2016 su Startmoney*** (vi consiglio vivamente di leggerlo) in cui il CEO di N26 ammetteva di aver chiuso il conto dei clienti che facevano troppi prelievi. Se ci pensate, questo spiega anche come mai la N26 √® stata sempre pubblicizzata come "smart card" da utilizzare principalmente per pagamenti online, contactless o bancomat. Nel contratto c'√® infatti scritto (punti 8.3, 12.1, 12.2) che la banca ha il diritto di chiudere il conto o modificare il contratto nel caso in cui l'utilizzo porti svantaggio a N26.Detto ci√≤, tenendo a mente che potrei anche aver scritto cose senza senso; io, personalmente, cercher√≤ di stare pi√π attento quando uso la carta, pagando contactless o bancomat quando posso e cercando di limitare i prelievi e i bonifici solo a quando √® strettamente necessario. Sono sicuro al 100% che un utilizzo ragionevole della carta non creer√† problemi a nessuno.PS. Customer care non soddisfacente al 100%, √® un po' lento, niente di grave comunque. Per il resto, uso N26 da Novembre del 2018 e fin ora non ho avuto nessun problema.

name: Matthew Vella
title: ABUSIVE BEHAVIOR from n26
content: Abusive behavior from n26. I have been a customer since Feb 2015 and it was all great **BUT** On December 18, 2018, I received an email for a standard routine check, which happens on every account at some point. They asked me to send proof of my income and how I'm using N26. So I sent all proof of my income and payslips and they immediately decided to freeze my account without any prior notice. I couldn't access my funds, pay my bills or withdraw. I have contacted customer care every day however they were not willing to engage and simply cut the chat immediately. I also begged customer care to close my account for good and transfer the money to another bank account that I have so I could move on. This is abusive behavior and I have reported this to BaFin too. They have no right to freeze my money without any legit reason. At this point, I felt scammed. On January 15, 2019, I received an email from a customer agent that my account has been unfrozen and that I can continue using my account normally. At this point I am upset. They treated me like a criminal, they didn't engage with my issues and also I had clients who have paid me and the transfer didn't go through - So I lost money from incoming transfers because N26 are saying that transfers should bounce back to client but they haven't. *** UPDATE - I got a call from N26 higher management to explain the situation since it got out of hand and mishandled badly. They apologized for the delay and had no excuse to my case. The reason of these routine checks is because they found out certain users have been using the personal account as a business account. The offered me a premium service for a year for free - which is a nice gift.

name: JFP
title: Very poor service
content: Very poor service - account opened quickly and easily and ran ok for a while. Don‚Äôt try and do transfers on a weekend - they just don‚Äôt work - when they do if there has been a problem with it - it shows on your statement but doesn‚Äôt tell you whether they have taken it or not. It has NO pending payments method. Off their own back they said their systems aren‚Äôt up to scratch and don‚Äôt have the facility to show pending or bounced payments. The downside to this is that you never actually know what your balance is as it shows pending payments as proper payments on you statements so these are are subject to change. My account was closed by then as I used my card on two occasions and had cancelled card transactions on both because I had a credit balance but apparently I had no money!!!!! Down to their poor functioning systems not showing me a live balance it causes errors - stay away from this company!Also if you need any help you have to do it through an online chat which is slow and cumbersome. For one query I had someone tell me that they were going to get back to me - no one did - I had to call NatWest who could tell me what they were doing wrong. N26 is a brilliant idea but sadly lacking and more like a Mickey Mouse bank - a bit all mouth and no trousers. Just stick to your normal bank - much easier.

name: Christian Kay
title: N26 banking app in UK
content: I was recommended N26 by a friend and I was intrigued and excited about this new (to me) virtual banking app. Application through N26 app was easy (free download in Apple app store or Android app store). N26 is a German bank but with UK banking licence, UK sort code and UK bank account numbers. BACs wage payments can also be set-up if this is your only bank. My new Mastercard card arrived made from very cool see thru plastic. Black and metal cards also available apparently. I transferred some money from my Barclays bank account to my N26 bank account as a test and it was instantly available. App is easy to use and navigate. N26 staff on hand if you have a problem. I used the chat function to ask a few additional questions. Mastercard is contactless once you've used it in an ATM. Pin number chosen by me through the app. Excellent banking concept.

title: Customer Support is an absolute joke
content: Customer Support is an absolute jokeI haven't received my card after 3 weeks and after contacting customer support 4 times. They all ask the same questions, offer the same solution, I accept and they tell me I will receive an email (not right away) with a tracking number. Unlike main stream uk banks that offer breakdown cover & a dozen other benefits for a lesser fee plus free spending abroad so it actually offers nothing by comparison.No direct debits,no standing orders Etc but surprise surprise there are plenty of fees!I question half of the reviews that have been left on trust pilot & looking at the list of CEO‚Äôs & reviews of its former employees I‚Äôd rather give my money & personal details to my 10 year old than these but your choice.Target market definitely sub prime sector that are desperate for a few quid to try & make it seem more attractive to investors & generate more revenue.Stay clear & stick to the main stream banks.

After numerous chats to customer service I made a complained to try and get the matter resolved. The response was to shut the account without explanation. I guess it's better to run from your mistake then to admit the bank has oneAs of this moment I have yet to receive the balance that was in the account at the time it was shut. And no response to the email asking for it to be returned. I will be interested to know what the FSA and the banking ombudsman have to say about this!!Looking for a app only bank try Starling or MonzoIf you want to look at how not to run an app only bank sign up Now!!!!

name: Eddy
title: N26 voelt vertrouwd aan als een old-school bank met een hele coole app
content: Ik ben heel tevreden met N26, de reden dat het nog niet mijn hoofdbank is, heeft meer te maken hoe ouderwets sommige bedrijven nog zijn en hun systemen nog niet hebben aangepast met SEPA. Incasso's van sommige bedrijven zoals verzekeringen (FBTO) of spaarbanken (Leaseplan Bank) accepteren alleen banken met een NL IBAN. N26 is een Duitse bank met een banklicentie, waar je geld tot 100.000 euro is gewaarborgd net als in NL.Nadat SNS besloten heeft haar credit card tarieven dit jaar aan te passen (van 0% opslag naar 2%) heb ik een aantal gratis nieuwe banken uitgeprobeerd: Moneyou Go (NL), Bunq (NL), Revolut (UK), Transferwise (UK) en N26 (DE). Moneyou and Bunq zijn uitgevallen vanwege de slechte app (Moneyou) en omdat de pas niet gratis is. Revolut valt af omdat het niet voelt als een veilige bank en de opslagen bij transacties hoog zijn. Transferwise gebruik ik voor overboekingen naar niet euro rekeningen en als backup Mastercard pas voor N26.Alles bij N26 is gratis: de bankrekening, de app, online bankieren alsmede de Maestro en Mastercard pas. De Mastercard pas is een debit card, je kan pas geld uitgeven als je geld hebt op je rekening. Betalen in NL, Europa en de wereld kost je geen wisselkoers opslag (bij NL banken tussen 1,1-2% gebruikelijk). Je mag 5x per maand euro's pinnen zonder kosten, ook in het buitenland. Wat wel kost: pinnen in vreemde valuta, 1,7% opslag zonder een vast bedrag extra. Geld overmaken naar niet euro rekeningen kost net zoveel als Transferwise, de goedkoopste partij om geld over te boeken naar een niet euro rekening, die ik tot nu toe ken.Welke voordelen zijn er nog, de app is heel cool, en maakt het gebruik van je pas veiliger. Je kan namelijk functies van je pas blokkeren of deblokkeren. Dus als ik de pas niet gebruik, zet ik alle functies uit, totdat er betaald of gepind moet worden, ga ik eerst naar de app en zet ik de functie aan. Ook realtime notificaties zijn handig, zelfs Mastercard transacties die je online of in de winkel doet, vraagt om toestemming op je app.Wat kan beter; N26 ondersteunt Ideal niet (NL systeem), dus onhandig bij aankopen in NL. Overboekingen zijn ook nog niet realtime zoals bij ABN-Amro of Bunq. Dus daarom is het nog niet mogelijk om alleen N26 als je enige betaalrekening te gebruiken.Tot nu toe de meest gebruikte functie van N26 is de gratis Mastercard betaalpas, dit scheelt me de jaarbijdrage van een credit card alsmede de 1,1-2% wisselkoersopslag bij aankopen online of in het buitenland.

name: Lightworks Photographic
title: Absolutely abhorrent - avoid like the plague
content: I try not to leave bad reviews as I know how bad they can reflect on the brand, but in this particular case it really warrants it. So here goes. Completely terrible from the start, first of all the verification process took well over three days, during the sign up process it implies that the verification process is a quick and simple process. From my experience it really wasn‚Äôt. In the end it got activated so I thought I‚Äôd give N26 a go. What a terrible mistake that was. Most banks in the UK now support faster payments, meaning that if somebody sends you money, majority of the time it‚Äôll be with you in seconds, again for me it wasn‚Äôt. Two different people wired me significant sums of money which when I went on chat to N26 support to see where my money was they told me it could take up to two hours. So I waited...and nothing. I then got told that due to some regulations it can actually take up to the next working day, which really frustrated me as I‚Äôd been onto chat about 5 times at this point and been given different answers. Luckily the money cleared another few hours later into the account. So, like any normal person I needed to make a couple of purchases on the net, first purchase went through fine, second one not so much. The card kept getting declined, over and over and over again. I had been onto N26 support about 10 different times at this point (I got many answers saying that the cards been unlocked and wait ten minutes, to blames on the retailer, until the last advisor just gave up and blamed MasterCard). I don‚Äôt say this lightly but N26 is the worst FinTech bank I know of. It‚Äôs just all marketing and a slick interface. Support and actual use of the account is terrible, it‚Äôs unfinished and needs a lot of work. When a bank can‚Äôt even provide its users with basic banking functions, like transferring money and spending you know to stay away.I‚Äôve used Starling, Monzo and Revlout and they‚Äôre great. They all have they‚Äôre own pros but N26 has nothing but cons. Please, for the love of god stay away from this bank, just save your time and money and use one of these other banks mentioned above if you want to use a challenger bank.

Momentan erwirken wir eine einstweilige Verf√ºgung gegen N26 da mir diese Grundlos den Zugang zu meinen Finanzen verwehrt.Daher einen Ratschlag an alle da drau√üen:Lasst die Finger von dieser Bank, hier ist der Kunde wirklich nur eine Ressource, die anscheinend nicht mal mehr n√∂tig ist.
