name: Jonas Schall
title: Bankfunktionen Toll, Support Mittelm√§√üig
content: Habe bei der Er√∂ffnung den Code BAVM4K benutzt und dadurch 20‚Ç¨ Startguthaben bekommen. Vielleicht hilft es ja einigen, die am √ºberlegen sind sich auch ein Konto zu er√∂ffnen. Erst einmal finde ich es schade, dass sich hier gef√ºhlt zum Gro√üteil immer nur diejenigen √§u√üern, die frustriert sind und dadurch das Bewertungsbild verzerren. Aber es ist leider so, dass Leute eher etwas Bewerten wenn sie unzufrieden sind, als wenn sie zufrieden sind. Ich benutze N26 jetzt seid ziemlich genau einem Jahr als Zweitkonto, neben einem Sparkassenkonto. Grundlegend ist N26 bei der digitalen Infrastruktur √ºberlegen. Die App funktioniert gut, Online-Banking ist super einfach und funktioniert ohne TAN oder sonstigem, und die App ist extrem √ºbersichtlich und kategorisiert sogar Ausgaben. Vor allem Gef√§llt mir im Vergleich zur Sparkassen-App, dass es in Echtzeit Pushbanchrichitgungen gibt wenn etwas abgebucht wird. Wenn ich am Supermarkt mit meiner Karte bezahle, kriege ich h√§ufig schon eine Transaktionsbest√§tigung mit genauem Betrag auf mein Handy, bevor das Terminal die Zahlung best√§tigt ‚Äì Als jemand, der bei Ausgaben schnell seinen √úberblick verliert, sind diese Echtzeitbenachrichtigungen unglaublich praktisch, da ich so nicht mehr am Ende jedes Monats irgendwelche Wirren Transaktion- und √úberweisungscodes von dem Kontoauszug entziffern muss und so einen viel besseren √úberblick √ºber meine Finanzen habe. Auch sch√∂n: W√§hrend ich bei der Sparkasse jedes Mal zur Filliale laufen muss (im letzen Monat zwei Mal), beispielsweise als ich meine Nummer √§ndern wollte oder mein Tageslimit √§ndern musste, geht beides und vieles mehr bei N26 direkt in der App. Auch gut finde ich, dass N26 Apple- und Google Pay, sowie Bargeldlose NFC-Zahlungen unterst√ºtzt. Mit der Mastercard Debit Karte hatte ich bisher keine Probleme; wer aber eine echte Kredit- und keine Debitkarte will muss zu einer anderen Bank, denn die gibt es hier nicht. Monatliche Bankgeb√ºhren gibt es keine, was bei anderen Banken gef√ºhlt immer mehr zur Seltenheit wird. Neben diesen Funktionen bietet die App noch weitere Dinge an, wie digitale Versicherungen, dem investieren in Fonds und Festgeldvertr√§gen uvm. davon w√ºrde ich pers√∂nlich aber abraten. Weiteres n√ºtzliches Feature sind meiner Meinung nach die guten Konditionen bei Auslandszahlungen: Keine Umwechslungsgeb√ºhr (die Sparkasse will hier 3% und mehr), kostenlose Abhebungen von Geld in der Landesw√§hrung (also keine schlechten Umwechslungsgesch√§fte mehr am Flughafen) und die weite Akzeptanz der Mastercard als Zahlungsmittel. Als Vielreisender im nicht-EU-Ausland kann ich N26 daher unbedingt empfehlen.Jetzt aber zum gr√∂√üten Kritikpunkt, dem Support: Man merkt, dass N26 noch in den Kinderschuhen steckt. Ich vertraue der Bank zu 100 Prozent, dass mein Geld dort in sicheren H√§nden ist, nicht zuletzt wegen der Einlagenversicherung bis 100.000‚Ç¨ und der europ√§ischen Banklizenz. Was aber den Support (In meinem Fall per E-Mail und Chat) angeht, ist dieser nicht immer in der Lage schnell und effektiv zu helfen. Ein Problem von mir konnte der Support beispielsweise garnicht l√∂sen (Schlussendlich musste ich selber auf den Fehler kommen!), f√ºr andere Probleme dauert es sehr lange, bis sich was tut. Zu Sto√üzeiten musste ich bis zu einer Stunde in der Warteschleife im Chat warten, auf eine E-Mail musste ich eine Woche warten. Mein Tipp daher: Anrufen. Ging zumindest bei mir deutlich schneller, als √ºber andere Wege. Kritikpunkte von anderen, dass der Support angeblich garnicht antwortet kann ich nicht best√§tigen, die Wartezeiten sind allerdings wirklich (zu) lang. Dazu muss ich aber auch sagen, dass die Situation vor einem Jahr noch deutlich schlechter aussah und sich hier vor allem in den letzen Monaten viel getan hat.Insgesamt ist N26 eine Bank, die etwas f√ºr Technikbegeisterte und/oder Vielreisende ist. Wer viel mit Bargeld bezahlt und Online eher wenig kauft, sollte von der Bank absehen (Monatliches Abhebungslimit von 5 Abhebungen uvm.). Der Support hat sich meiner Meinung nach deutlich verbessert, ist aber immer noch nicht vollkommen ideal. Ich w√ºrde N26 erst einmal als Zweitkonto er√∂ffnen und dann schauen, wie es einem gef√§llt. Insgesamt m√∂chte ich die smarten Funktionen der Bank nicht mehr missen und finde sie trotz aufgez√§hlten Problemen eine zukunftssichere, innovative Bank, die ich allen in allem empfehlen kann.

name: Luuk
title: Refrain from signing up
content: I have had very mixed experiences with number26 bank (hereafter referred to as ‚ÄúN26‚Äù). When I joined N26, I thought I would be relieved of annoying bank policies that made no sense. I thought N26 was more transparent, helpful and dynamic. I was happy when I received my free card and decided to upgrade to Black. That would make it even better, right?Well, it turned out I was wrong. N26 isn‚Äôt quite in the business of making a better bank experience for customers, it‚Äôs rather in the ‚Äòmake money quick‚Äô business. This has been evident to me through various experiences.First of all, don‚Äôt bother contacting Customer Support. They will be able to chat FAQ answers to you, but won‚Äôt go an inch father for you. My card broke after about 7 months, I‚Äôve never had something like that before (as in their cards would last years) with my previous banks. I contacted N26 Support in the hope they could do something for me since I had been a Black member for a while, but all they could do was refer to the app and indicate that I had to pay.N26 tries to lock you into contracts. Black or Metal runs at least a year and renews a MONTH before the expiration of the first year. And yes, they do send unclear emails regarding the cancellation, for which you only have a four week timeframe. They send one email. One.I‚Äôm very disappointed in N26 and I wish things had turned out differently.

name: Scott Jones
title: Bad communication & bad customer service
content: I recently received an invite to join the UK version on N26, which I expressed an interest in a long time ago.Submitted pictures of my driving licence at different angles as requested, 5 days later I receive a very blunt email: ‚ÄúApologies, but we aren‚Äôt able to open you an N26 account. As a bank we have to follow strict legal requirements for every account we open. Unfortunately, this decision is final and our Customer Support cannot make an exception or help you further.‚ÄùNo explanations as to why, just good bye. I tried the customer services just to see if it was possible to just get a reason as to why this happened via their web chat, the agent pretty much regurgitated the email above and then closed the chat on me immediately. Tried to sign up again to use a different form of ID (only thing I could think it could have been for my rejection), but after entering name and birth date it says there are issues with info I provided and to contact customer services, so it seems they have completely blocked/cut me off.Terrible experience and terrible service. No issues that my application wasn't accepted, but big issues that I received no communications during the verification process to check/query with me any issues, then when rejected being totally cut off without any reasons being provided.Was really looking forward to trying N26 out, but I will now be advising people to try elsewhere. I'd recommend Starling Bank or Monzo instead, both far superior in the customer service department, and their products are great.

title: Erfahrungsbericht und 15‚Ç¨¬†Promocode
content: F√ºr 15‚Ç¨ Startguthaben einfach √ºber diesen Link registrieren ;)https://n26. com/r/dominikb2688Ich bin seit ca. 2 Jahren Kunde bei N26 und habe dort das kostenpflichtige N26-Black-Konto er√∂ffnet. Die Er√∂ffnung ging sehr einfach und f√ºhrte direkt zu einer Verifizierung via Video. Der Mitarbeiter bei der Verifizierung ging scheinbar seine Liste zur Kontoer√∂ffnung durch und beantwortet mir alle Fragen neben der Verifizierung. Ich musste meinen Personalausweis vorzeigen und ein Foto anfertigen lassen. Trotz angegebener Lieferzeit von 2-3 Wochen, kam das P√§ckchen mit den Karten schon nach ca. 6 Werktagen an. Einloggen konnte ich mich direkt nach dem Gespr√§ch mit dem Mitarbeiter. Alles war sehr einfach einzurichten und alles klappte schnell online. Die PIN konnte ich frei w√§hlen, je nach Belieben und ist auf jede Karte anpassbar. Als die Karten ankamen, mussten sie nur noch mit individuellem Code auf der Karte aktiviert werden.Das Online-Banking ist das beste Online-Banking, das ich kenne. Es ist sehr √ºbersichtlich und man kann einzelne Unterkonten, sogenannte Spaces er√∂ffnen. Dort kann man das Geld innerhalb von Sekunden hin und her verschieben. F√ºr andere Nutzer von N26 ist eine Funktion, √§hnlich wie Paypal, eingebaut. Man kann innerhalb von Sekunden √úberweisungen t√§tigen. Abgesehen von schneller √úberweisung zur selben Bank, sieht man Lastschriften von beispielsweise Tanken oder vom Einkaufen sofort bei Eingabe der PIN. Man kann an eigene Kontakte sogar eine Anfrage zur Best√§tigung schicken um wichtige √úberweisungen nicht zu vergessen. Kartenzahlung ist au√üerdem durch die kostenlose Maestro und die grunds√§tzlich kostenlose Mastercard √ºberall m√∂glich. Kostenloses Geld abheben bis zu 5 mal im Monat ist auch problemlos an jedem Geldautomaten m√∂glich.Der Kundenservice von N26 ist sehr gut. N26 ist erreichbar gewesen und konnte mir bei meinem Anliegen sofort helfen. Die Notfallnummer oder der Live-Chat funktionieren einwandfrei und die Mitarbeiter waren √ºberaus freundlich. Die L√∂sung wurde umgehend erbracht und ich konnte mein Bankkonto mit der neuen gew√ºnschten Funktion nutzen.Durch die Integration der N26-Black-Karte, konnte ich meine teuren Reiseversicherungen k√ºndigen, welche in 3-facher Ausf√ºhrung in N26-Black vorhanden sind. Es gibt sowohl eine Reiser√ºcktritts-, als auch eine Reisegep√§ck- und eine Auslandsreisekrankenversicherung, welche alle f√ºr 9,90 EUR monatlich integriert sind. Au√üerdem sieht die N26-Black-Karte noch besser, als die bisher schon sch√∂ne durchsichtige und kostenlose Kreditkarte. Zus√§tzlich ist auch kontaktloses Bezahlen m√∂glich mit sowohl der Maestro, als auch der Mastercard.Aber auch die kostenlose Variante kann ich nur empfehlen!Die N26-Bank bekommt als Bewertung volle 5 von 5 Sternen f√ºr ein herausragendes Online-Banking in der App und des eleganten Designs der Karten.

name: Damiano Brigante
title: ALLEGO COPIA EMAIL N26 DI CHIUSURA CONTO DEL 17/10/18
content: ALLEGO COPIA EMAIL DELLA RIDICOLA N26 DI CHIUSURA CONTO SENZA MOTIVO COME STA SUCCEDENDO A TUTTI:Per garantire la sicurezza dei conti dei nostri clienti siamo tenuti a eseguire controlli di routine automatizzati sui conti e sulle transazioni.Purtroppo, recentemente abbiamo riscontrato una violazione del nostro contratto mentre stavamo verificando il tuo conto.Il paragrafo 8.3 dei nostri Termini e condizioni e il comma 3 dell‚Äôarticolo 19 del nostro accordo sulle Regole principali per il rapporto stabiliscono che ci riserviamo il diritto di chiudere i conti senza preavviso in caso di violazione.Siamo pertanto obbligati a chiudere il tuo conto N26. La cessazione ha effetto dal31.10.2018Dopo tale data non sar√† pi√π possibile continuare a utilizzare il conto, l‚Äôapp e la carta rilasciata con esso. I tentativi di depositare fondi sul tuo conto al termine di questo periodo saranno rifiutati.Al fine di consentire la corretta conclusione del rapporto d‚Äôaffari, il tuo conto rimane attivo fino alla data indicata. Ti preghiamo di trasferire l‚Äôeventuale saldo residuo, al quale hai diritto, su un nuovo conto bancario o di prelevare i fondi prima della data di cessazione.Se alla chiusura rimane un saldo residuo sul conto o se si verificano problemi nell‚Äôesecuzione del bonifico prima della chiusura del conto, ti preghiamo di fornirci le seguenti informazioni rispondendo a questa e-mail, in modo da poterti trasferire quanto rimane sul conto.Nome del beneficiario (nome del titolare del conto)IBANBICTi informiamo che il bonifico degli importi avviato da N26 potrebbe richiedere tempi pi√π lunghi.Se hai attualmente superato il limite autorizzato, ricarica il saldo fino al giorno della chiusura del conto.Ti ringraziamo per la comprensione.Cordiali saluti,N26 Bank GmbH* In termini legali: a causa di un utilizzo non conforme al contratto, ai sensi del paragrafo 8.3 delle Condizioni generali "Conto corrente N26" in combinato disposto con il comma 3 dell‚Äôart.19 delle Condizioni generali "Regole di base per il rapporto tra cliente e banca", chiuderemo il tuo conto 2622198941 con un preavviso straordinario in data 31.10.2018.

content: So let's start at the beginning.I used to love this company and got all my friends to sign up with them as well. I then realized how slooow customer service is and what astonished me the most was the bad service received from Allianz (their travel insurance partner). Although I understand N26 don't have any control over Allianz, its been 4 and a half weeks, 4 emails to Allianz and no reply from them whatsoever. N26 must still take responsibility since i'm paying them the monthly fee and not Allianz (my contract is with N26).I emailed N26 about the issue and they just apologizes all the time but don't sort the issue out. I reported my incident on the 8th of October. Its been a month now without any reply from Allianz.I still like N26 but will recommend getting the normal bank account and under no circumstances the Black card as I thought service will increase, but its non-existent.

St√§ndig muss ich hinter meinem Geld bei dieser inkompetenten Bank hinterher laufen....!Auf meine 3  E-Mails die ich gestern(18.10.18 um 15:00 und 20:00Uhr) an den support@n26 geschrieben habe, wurde mir bis jetzt nicht geantwortet!

content: I've lost over ‚Ç¨1000 because I didn't take all these recent bad reviews of N26 seriously. Do not open account in N26 and if you already did, take your money somewhere else ASAP.I've been N26 client for 4 months now. Personal account. Everything worked fine until this week. * Get ready that you will be investigated like terrorist for ordinary amounts of money from/to your closest family member /in EU/. You will be asked to provide invoice or paper contract and explanation of both source of funds and purpose of transactions. (No joke). Send your mother ‚Ç¨2000 and you're done.* Get ready that your money will be FROZEN without any warnings. * Based on what I read here, get ready that your money will be STOLEN for ever. Forget 100K EU guarantee. It's a lie.* All info you'll get from support is bullsh*t or no replyThis bank is built to rob ordinary people and they hide behind EU/German AML law. I'm surprised that no legal authority took action against N26 already.UPDATE Sunday Oct 7thWhile I couldn't make SEPA transaction via iPhone nor web last days as they blocked it (red notification "Error"), today I tried my luck with ATM and my N26 MC - for the first time, as I used N26 as diversification account. I tried KBC Belgium ATM with ‚Ç¨200 withdrawal and to my surprise it gave me my money! Great. ‚Ç¨800 left. I tried again with ‚Ç¨800 and it said rejected. Then I got idea to try ATM of different bank, so I went to Raiffeisen Vienna with ‚Ç¨500 withdrawal and bingo! Now it started to be exciting. ‚Ç¨300 left. I went to Erste ATM, tried ‚Ç¨200, it said: daily limit overrun. I opened N26 app and my daily limit was 1600. Strange math, but I raised it to 2500 and finally Erste gave me ‚Ç¨200. Tomorrow I will ask N26 to close my account, so I have left them ‚Ç¨100 in case they want to charge me ‚Ç¨63 for that plastic card of value of ‚Ç¨2.50.I would never say that one day I will experience that feeling of 1929, when you get your own money from the bank and you feel like you just won the lottery.

name: Cihan Hasanoglu
title: N26 Support sehr schlecht
content: Ich bin seit 2016 Kunde von N26 (damals Number26). Damals war ich noch ein Student und war zufrieden wie alles abl√§uft, einwandfreier Support, Bargeldlos bezahlen im In- und Ausland! Ich habe schon damals aus Neugier nach einem Dispokredit nachgefragt, der abgelehnt wurde was meiner Meinung nach verst√§ndlich war, da ich studierte und kein gescheites Einkommen hatte, obwohl ich damals schon nebenher als Werkstudent gearbeitet und BAf√∂G erhalten habe. Heute bin ich seit 6 Monaten fest eingestellt und verdiene ordentlich Geld. Ich beantrage in der App Dispo, dieser wird mir verweigert, da das System bei der Bonit√§tspr√ºfung scheitert. Ich muss anmerken, dass ich bisher weder einen Schufa Eintrag hatte, noch eine Finanzierung oder einen Kredit hatte! Ich habe immer noch geglaubt, dass irgendwas im Hintergrund l√§uft, das meine Bonit√§t beeinflusst, bis ich Freunde getroffen habe, die ich geworben habe, die noch Studieren und nur in den Ferien 6-8 Wochen Arbeiten, die jedoch Dispo Angebote von bis zu 6000‚Ç¨ bekommen!!! Daraufhin habe ich versucht N26 zu anrufen, jedoch haben Sie nur den Chat sonst kann man die nicht erreichen! Naja habe ich es mal mit dem Chat versucht und erschrocken wie ignorant die Mitarbeiter sind!!! Mir wurden einfach von der FAQ Seite die Gr√ºnde kopiert und geschickt, obwohl ich gesagt habe, dass die Software sich irren muss, denn anders ergibt das keinen Sinn f√ºr mich! Ich wurde nachdem ich mit K√ºndigung bedroht habe an den Telefonischen Support zugewendet. Dieser hat mir versprochen meinen Fall Manuell zu √ºberpr√ºfen, nachdem alle anderen mich glauben haben lassen, dass das nicht geht. Nach einer Woche kam dann die Mail, mit der Begr√ºndung mein Konto sei kein Gehaltskonto, daran erkennt man das die √úberpr√ºfung nicht statt gefunden hat, da seit April mein Gehalt auf mein N26 Konto √ºberwiesen wird! Der Support ist echt sehr schlecht geworden. Ich war eigentlich sehr zufrieden mit N26, aber das bleibt leider nicht lange so und werde wahrscheinlich k√ºndigen m√ºssen...

name: Ivano Buffa
title: TERRIBLE COMPANY... STAY AWAY FROM IT!
content: Hi,Long story short.I signed up for a private bank account.After a few days I opened a new business in Ireland and I wanted to create a "business" bank account with N26. I went to their web site and found out that it is not possible having a private and a business account at the same time.I then closed my personal private bank account in order to be "in compliance" with their rule and tried to sign up for the business one.Unfortunately the system didn't allow me to do it so I tried to call them and here I found the first problem: NO TELEPHONE NUMBER WHATSOEVER!!!Then after struggling a lot I found online their email support (I COULDN'T FIND IT IN THEIR WEB SITE). I then contacted them explaining the situation and this was their COLD and SHORT reply (copy and paste):---Unfortunately you are not able to open a new account after closing the previous account. We hope this changes sometime in the future but at the moment you can not create a new account after closing the previous one. Have a great day,---I then replied letting them know that what they said WAS NOT WRITTEN ANYWHERE in their web site and asked for a valid technical explanation (see my email copy and paste below)---Thanks for letting me know.Whilst I was expecting this reply I honestly don't think this is fair. I have never seen a bank with this kind of policy and, beside your answer, no valid technical explanation has been given to me yet. I am simply getting penalized just because I wanted to be in compliance with the rules that your company has created.Unless you are able to provide me with a valid technical explanation, can you please escalate this to your manager? I really need a business account.Thanks.Looking forward to hearing from you---After that I have got another COLD and CARELESS reply (see copy and paste below):---Thanks for getting in touch and i understand your concern. I will forward this as a feedback and yes we will get back to you when we can offer you a business account. Have a great day,---So basically I'm now in their black list just because I followed THEIR RULE and I still DID NOT GET a valid answer.The truth is "THEY ARE IN MY BLACK LIST" and I will never stop spreading bad words about them between all my family members (lot), all my co-workers and all the social medias as the treatment I have received is simply DISRESPECTFUL and UNFAIR. TERRIBLE COMPANY!STAY AWAY FROM IT

Wie sollte N26 jemanden daran hindern woanders ein neues Konto zu er√∂ffnen, sein Gehalt auf dieses √ºberweisen zu lassen und seine Lastschriftpartner √ºber die neue Kontoverbindung zu informieren?Dann wird sich dar√ºber beschwert, das man bei N26 keine EC-Karte hat. Wer zahlt bekommt √ºberall einen besseren SupportAnsonsten f√§llt mir bisher kein wirklicher Nachteil ein. Dass das Konto an EIN Smartphone gebunden ist sollte klar sein. title: ICH BEKAM KEINE RUECKERSTATTUNG BEI BETRUG! ACHTUNG!
content: In Australien wurde trotzdessen das ich meine Karte noch hatte mein Konto von fremden leergeraeumt (Karte wahrscheinlich an einem manipulierten Automaten benutzt), somit war ich aufgeschmissen ohne einen Cent in der Tasche.Ich habe Ihnen direkt nach dem Vorfall im Chat und eine Mail geschrieben. Nachdem ich die Unterlagen von Ihnen erhalten habe, habe ich Sie Ihnen ausgefuellt per Einschreiben zugeschickt was von Ihnen bestaetigt wurde. Jedes Mal wurde sich fuer die Unannehmlichkeiten und die verzoegerten Antworten entschuldigt wofuer ich offensichtlich nichts konnte. Auch die Situation mit der Polizei habe ich Ihnen genauestens geschildert woraufhin mir ein Stefan nur geantwortet hatte das es schade sei das sie mir nicht weiterhelfen koennen.ICH MOECHTE BETONEN DAS SIE BEI DIESER BANK AUF ANTORTEN MANCHMAL WOCHEN WARTEN ODER GARKEINE BEKOMMEN OBWOHL ES OFFENSICHTLICH EIN NOTFALL WAR!Mir wurde bei einem Telefonat auch bestaetigt das alles was Sie brauchen angekommen sei und die Rueckerstattung einige Zeit in Anspruch nehmen koenne. Da ich auch eine neue Karte bekommen sollte, habe ich im Glauben das alles erledigt sei auf diese gewartet um mein Konto wieder zu aktivieren. Ich habe also WIE MIR AM TELEFON VERSPROCHEN WURDE. auf die Rueckerstattung gewartet die laut Ihrer Aussage dann abgeschlossen werden konnte! Da wieder ueber Wochen nichts von Ihnen kam habe ich nochmals versucht eine Anzeige online abzugeben was wie in den Mails zuvor beschrieben natuerlich immer noch nicht moeglich war.Ich habe alles zu was Sie mich angewiesen haben weitaus frueher als in den 120 Tagen erledigt! Auf Ihre Antworten musste ich dagegen oft lange warten oder habe wie zuletzt gar keine erhalten weshalb ich Ihnen gestern im Chat nochmals schreiben musste.Andauernd wurde mein Fall von jemand neuem bearbeitet mit der Nachricht das Sie mir das Geld doch nicht zahlen wuerden.DER GIPFEL WAR DIE LETZTE MAIL IN DER DIE SACHBEARBEITERIN EINFACH EHRLICH SCHRIEB DAS SIE EIGENTLICH GARNICHT GENAU WEISS WAS VORGEFALLEN IST !DEFINITIV DIE UNSERIOESESTE "Bank" VON DER ICH JE GEHOERT HABE! Meiner Meinung nach ist es hoechstriskant diesen Menschen sein Geld anzuvertrauen. Mit jeder anderen Bank waere diese Angelegenheit schnell und ohne Probleme erledigt gewesen.AUCH NACH MEHRMALIGER NACHFRAGE WURDE ES MIR NICHT ERLAUBT BESCHWERDE BEI EINEM VORGESETZTEN EINZUREICHEN ODER WENIGSTENS MIT DEM SACHBEARBEITER ZU SCHREIBEN DER MIR AM TELEFON KLAR ETWAS ANDERES GESAGT HATTE WAS IN MEINEN AUGEN HOECHST UNSERIOES IST UND DAFUER SPRICHT DAS SIE IHREN EIGENEN FEHLER VERTUSCHEN UND MICH ABWIMMELN WOLLEN.Ich werde nicht akzeptieren wie ich hier behandelt wurde und meiner Meinung nach extrem dreist betrogen wurde!Ich moechte nochmals darauf hinweisen das dies meine subjektive Meinung ist. Jeder der das liest kann sich selbst seine Meinung ueber die Serioesitaet dieser Bank bilden.

name: Peter Surda
title: Worse than useless
content: After about 4 months of use, N26 canceled my account with no advance warning, claiming the account was used in violation of the terms of service, but refusing to say anything else. I hired a lawyer, who after reviewing my account statement said he can't see anything wrong with it, however even if I prevailed in court, it would only result in the cancellation taking two months instead of being immediate. Since at that time it was almost two months after cancellation and they returned my balance, that's the end of it for me.I wasted many hours trying to figure out what happened. I still don't know how they came to the conclusion to cancel the contract or of they were even telling me the truth. As far as I can tell, it's entirely possible that they, rather than me, were the violators of the terms of service. I don't really care if they are incompetent or have something against me being their customer, their own ToS gives them an option to end the contract amicably (two months advance notice), which they didn't.This was the worst bank experience that I ever had and I can't recommend N26 to anyone.

Diese kam bereits nach 2 Tagen bei mir an.All meine Eink√§ufe habe ich entweder √ºber die Mastercard oder GooglePay, ohne gro√üe Schwierigkeiten, abgewickelt.Die Instant Pushnotifzierung gef√§llt mir sehr gut und hilft einen √úberblick √ºber seine Kartenzahlungen zu behalten.Das Anlegen von Dauerauftr√§gen oder √úberweisungen war √ºbersichtlich und ohne gro√üe H√ºrden zu erledigen.Online√ºberweisungen werden nicht, wie z.B bei Sparkasse oder ING-DIBA per SMSTAN freigegeben, sondern ebenfalls √ºber eine Pushnotifizierung und der Pers√∂nlichen "Onlinebanking" Pin, welche man einfach in der App festlegen und/oder √§ndern kann.Auch im Alltag hatte ich bis jetzt keinerlei Probleme mit Kartenzahlung oder Bargeldabhebung.Ich kann die Bank w√§rmstens weiterempfehlen. name: Dimitris Vayenas
title: Are they going belly up?
content: Last month I was informed that my account will be terminated for no specific reason.I contacted them and I also contacted BaFin (the German regulator) to complain. BaFin responded immediately, asking me to file a complaint as they informed me that terminating bank accounts in German banks requires at least two months notice; thus it appears that N26's action to terminate with a shorter notice is illegal.The account was operating fine past N26's deadline so I thought that everything is fine thanks to BaFin‚Äôs intervention. I received my payroll money there, did a transfer,  but as I went to withdraw 2000 euros my account was blocked. 10 days ago they informed me that my account has been indeed terminated. They offered to transfer my moneys (over 2500 euros) to another account. I provided them the account number on the 1st of August but they have kept the moneys. Their customer ‚Äúsupport‚Äù is unable to provide me with details about when the transfer will take place; they continuously say that my request is with their ‚Äúbackoffice‚Äù. In all my requests I receive this (identical) message:‚ÄúHey Dimitrios!Thanks for your email. I have already sent your details over to our back office team and they will be in touch with you shortly. Thank you,EmilyN26 Customer Service Klosterstra√üe 62 | 10179 Berlin‚ÄùTried to call them with my registered phone and customer number to be left in the queue waiting for over 25 minutes! They eventually picked up the phone when I opted to not key my customer code.Yet, a friend of mine who faced similar termination but only had a few euros in their account he got them back. So I am wondering if they are going belly up or if they are penalizing me for communicating with the German regulator (to whom they have yet to respond!!!).‚ÄúHey N26‚Äù what are you going to do?

Quindi, per me √® ottimo. Il mio ma, si riferisce al fatto che ancora si sta sviluppando in Italia, per esempio non si possono fare ricariche telefoniche, o ricaricare con Sisal. Vorrei per√≤ ricordare che, in Germania come in Francia, sono pi√π avanzati, in quanto (io non ci credevo ma √® cosi) puoi chiedere un prestito bancario direttamente dallapp di N26, avere la risposta in meno di un'ora e se positivo cio√® accettato, il denaro viene versato in tempo reale. Per il momento √® disponibile in Italia la funzione di risparmio, dove praticamente hai due conti separati.

name: Pierre Martinow
title: Internet Bank with growing pains
content: Key facts: - N26 doesn‚Äôt save you from private fees of some ATMs (in my case 6 EUR for withdrawing 10 EUR)- customer support is slow in responding via email and I mean really slow: at least 8 days no answer- waiting time for reaching the customer support chat agent is at least 30 - 45 min waiting- slow response time of the customer support reps in the chat app as well- application is buggy- customer support can‚Äôt read about previous issues you had with the company, even if it was just an hour ago, which shows that they have some serious system issuesUpdate October 2019: N26 resolved the issues mentioned above, except the ATM fees, customer service works better now, even though they still can‚Äôt help you to solve standard issues quicklyLong story:First, N26 is not offering entirely free withdrawals, something you don‚Äôt expect from a company that openly advertises their free withdrawals at any ATM. Once I was withdrawing 10 EUR on an ATM in a Kiosk and was impatiently clicking through their never ending amount of questions, confidently knowing that I don‚Äôt need to pay withdrawal fees anywhere I ignored whatever was written there, ten questions later I was finally able to withdraw my 10 EUR and received a notification from the N26 app that 16 EUR were withdrawn from my account‚Ä¶ wait a second‚Ä¶ 16 EUR? Holy ****, I just paid 60% to withdraw some money. I was then trying to reach N26 customer support how it can happen that I have to pay fees while I am in my NO FEE withdrawal limit, after 20 minutes waiting I lost my internet connection and after reconnecting I couldn‚Äôt even find the chat icon anymore, so I wrote an email and then again‚Ä¶ waiting‚Ä¶ after eight days waiting and checking several times in the app if the chat icon would reappear in the support section, I was finally lucky, the chat icon came back and again I contacted the customer support team and waited in line ‚Ä¶ for 30 minutes! Once I finally reached the customer support team I was told that there are exceptions and of course, I would find them in the fine print‚Ä¶ well if I had only known that before. Second, the app is not always working, for instance when you want to pay something online in an online shop and you get prompted to approve the transaction in your app, but instead, when you open your app, you receive an error message. So you contact the customer support‚Ä¶ and again‚Ä¶ you wait for 30 min‚Ä¶ then finally it was my turn and the customer support rep told me to reinstall the app, which I did, and again, the same error pops up, so again I contact the customer support and again wait for 30 minutes. No, not this time, this time I even waited for 45 minutes‚Ä¶ however, the customer support rep told me that he is not able to read about the previous issue and I have to explain him the entire problem again, after explaining him the problem again he told me that he can‚Äôt help me with this issue and I shall contact the support team via email with detailed information about my phone maker and model. I was pretty surprised by that answer because I don‚Äôt even have an exotic smartphone, just a usual iPhone 7.Overall N26 bank feels like a cheap and buggy budget airline which has a pretty design but you can feel that they save money on every corner of the business, for instance as mentioned above, customer service, missing system capabilities and application stability. After this experience I decided that I will move on to another online bank. They should have saved the money on marketing and invest it in customer support and a good DevOps team.Update October 2019: if you haven‚Äôt paired your N26 app to your phone you can‚Äôt approve online payments at some occasions, an error message shows up that something unexpected happened and that they are looking into it (which they actually don‚Äôt do, otherwise customer service would be aware of it) a standard issue, the customer service though is still not aware of that. However, availability of CS and internal systems improved greatly

name: Alex Gibson
title: Very blatant bad faith actors
content: I arranged an incoming wire transfer which was held up after being identified as 'unusual'.  What followed was several weeks of frustrating communication, their customer service takes on average 4 days to respond, and were very clearly stalling the process for their own economic benefit.  The funds were required for a time-sensitive contact, and I had to scramble to find an alternative source.  N26 is the type of organization that would rather make a quick buck by acting in bad faith than hold onto a customer.  This attitude does not bode well for the future, and there is far better competition in the field now.  It is a shame to see N26 fall by the wayside, they were a pioneer, and operated smoothly with good customer service a couple of years ago.

content: I opened an account at N26 because it was fast and easy to do so. So far everything has been smooth. No issues with payments going through or cash withdrawals. The downside of having this account, for me at least, is that I am unable to have funds wired from the United States directly into the account.  Since I am employed by a US company and all of my banking is currently there, it really doesn't work well for me.  At this point the only way that I have been able to get funds in there is to transfer them to my friend's German bank account and to have my friend transfer the funds to N26.  If it weren't for that, I would be perfectly satisfied.

reply: Hey Ana! We are sorry about how long it took to answer your email. Card transactions always happen in two steps. In the 1st step the merchant blocks a specific amount. In the 2nd step the merchant collects the money. The authorization will expire automatically after a maximum of 10 days if the merchant doesn't collect the funds. You can check final transactions on your PDF statements by clicking the arrow next to your usable balance in the mobile app.We can send you a chargeback form if you don't recoup the funds within this period.

name: John
title: Avoid N26 if you don't want frustration in your daily life.
content: N26 really wants to be "the app bank" and disrupt old fashioned banking by offering a sleek and affordable service. But they are failing to do so and have not yet realised that they've become what they say they want to disrupt: a conventional bank.The app has many bugs. 3D secure often doesn't work. Sometimes payments don't work. Other times the debit card doesn't work. Duplicate charges for the same thing happens every now and then. There are issues with payments where the card needs to be authorised and an amount booked: I've experienced paying for gas, 100‚Ç¨ was booked, I only bought 30‚Ç¨ worth of gas, but it took about a week for the remainder 70‚Ç¨ to be refunded.Banking needs to just work and you need to feel safe and secure and trust that you will be able to make easy quick payments at any time. N26 is not like that and often you will be frustrated by all the things that don't exactly work seamlessly. You will often have to uninstall the app, unlink your smartphone, reinstall the app, re-link your smartphone in order to get things to work. Too bad of you're trying to buy a ticket for a train leaving in 5 minutes or if you're standing at a coffee shop trying to pay, with a long queue of people behind you.At least you know that when things don't work, there's a team of skilled and helpful customer support agents ready to chat with you at any time. NOT! N26 is the company where I've experienced the rudest, most inefficient and careless customer support in my life. They have no empathy and will rather insult your intelligence than admit something is wrong on their side. If you have a an issue that's just a little more complex than a simple question about the product, it will take several months to resolve your issue. Emails are not answered and sometimes the same email is answered by several different agents, all saying something different. There is no connection between the customer support you receive though chat, phone an email, for each of these you will have a different ticket number.N26 also has the habit of changing terms and conditions and pricing quite often and in many cases you won't even be informed or asked to accept the changes. Let's say live in Spain and you've signed up to be a customer in Spain but N26 has repeatedly failed to deliver your debit card and for the 3rd attempt you happen to be in another country for a month and ask for the card to be delivered there: the terms and conditions and pricing applied to your account will be changed from Spain to that other country you happen to be in, and you will not even be informed about this.I recommend you to look elsewhere, if what you want is a sleek modern bank that just works and that has your back.
reply: Bonjour Nassima. Vous allez √™tre contact√©e dans la journ√©e par t√©l√©phone ou pas email.

name: Andr√© Batista
title: 2 Months to receive the card (and still nothing)
content: The title says everything. I already ordered the card twice and when I ask in the chat what happend they just say to wait more. They suggest me to use the express delivery, but I'll not pay for the Bank mistake in delivery the card, and of course, they will not give me the express delivery. Then I'll need to wait more two weeks, and if I lucky I'll receive the card...
reply: Hey John, we're sorry you've experienced such hassles using N26. The application functions by pairing a phone to it and this pairing quality can vary with certain models or makes, which explains why uninstalling the app and repairing your phone is necessary and efficient. Card transactions always happen in two steps. In the first step the merchant blocks a specific amount. In the second step the merchant collects the money. Gas stations are no different and the maximum amount is blocked when you insert your card. The authorization will expire automatically after a maximum of 10 days.We ship cards to countries within the Eurozone only and the shipping address counts in determining which conditions apply.We suggest sending your feedback to ideas@n26.com!

name: Giorgio volante
title: Don't open an N26 account, NEVER!!!
content: I saw many reviews with my same impressions of this bank account: useless and thieves!!!I never received the credit card also after sending them messages. They continued to charge fee on the account only to have opened it, but i was unable to use it because i had never received the card! When I ask them for support, they replied after different months saying that i never asked again to have the card (that is a lie, i have the mail with the request i did)!Howsoever, I cannot waste time following them so i decided to pay the remaining months in the way i can close the account (NO ONE SAY TO ME THAT I WAS OBLIGED TO PAY 12 MONTH, NO ONE SAY IT AT THE BEGINNING) and also this procedures it's going to take some time because they are always late on reply to me.Summarising:never decide to open an N26 account, they are only thieves, unprofessional and very bad at customer service! The only thing that makes me happy is that they will fast and easily go to bankrupt.
reply: Hey Giorgio. We're a bit perplexed about this review. We wish to apologise for the time you waited for the card.Card shipments vary in time depending on the country you reside in and we rely on national postal services for deliveries. We can reorder cards if you contact us via telephone or chat, not through email as it's not as safe as the first two channels. The Black account is a twelve-month contract and you'll have to pay the remaining fees in order to cancel it. This is advertised on most if not all documentation. You can find it here for instance: https://docs.n26.com/legal/01+DE/06+Black/en/02black-terms-and-conditions-en.pdfOur Support center also states the year-long minimum period: https://support.n26.com/read/000001390?locale=en

content: I really like the app. It's easy to use and modern, although it sometimes has critical problems.That being said, their customer support is very poor and makes the company and the service feel untrustworthy.First of all, different staff answer completely differently on one thing. name: Aboudi Barrage
title: j'avais poste un avis n√©gatif sur‚Ä¶
content: j'avais poste un avis n√©gatif sur l'assistance en ligne concernant l'ouverture du compte. title: Horrible video conference signup‚Ä¶
content: Horrible video conference signup process. Took me 30 minutes, though I did nothing wrong. I imagine a less tech savvy person to spend a lot of time on this, or simply failing to sign up.It's just a very slow and needlessly complicated process. When you visit a bank, they don't analyze your passport quality in detail.But it accepts people from many nations across Europe, so it's one of few banks that actually creates almost pan-European competition. This is very positive, hope they expand the offer to all EEA nations.The bank has a free MasterCard debit card, but offers no savings account. Also it limits number of free withdrawals. So DKB bank is normally a better option, or Ferratum. But Ferratum only accepts people BORN in the nation where they reside! So if you have German passport and live in Belgium, you cannot open an account. Only if you ALWAYS live in Germany until death :-) This is just absurd, at least n26 is not that absurd. But I do read that non-Europeans living in Europe are blocked, like people with Indian passports.I like that transactions are dated also by time, so you know when money arrives on your account - not just by date. But lack of savings account, makes Ferratum generally a more attractive offer. I therefore don't use my account every month, but has it as a backup.

name: Tori Mills
title: Awful, Avoid like the plague!
content: Quite possibly the WORST customer service I have ever encountered.Avoid this company like the plague, staff are unhelpful and rude!I had been shopping around for an online bank and came across N26 as a potential, everything looked good on paper so I decided to try the online application....After inputting my name and date of birth I was told that my application could not continue and I should contact customer support, trying to contact the support team leads you into a loop of FAQ's but very little information on how to actually get in touch.Finally I managed to source a phone number and the fun began, I spoke to an incredibly bored sounding young man who advised me that I had previously attempted to open an account but as my address details were incorrect I had to go back in via my e mail address and start again then my account would be opened and I would get my card ASAP.Brilliant, or so I thought, however, as I had apparently attempted to open the account over a year ago, I had no recollection of my original password, no problem, I will simply click the link to re set my password.... THIS LINK DOES NOT WORKSo, once again I called the number and spoke to an English Advisor called Chris, Chris advised me that he couldn't reset my password, but no problem as it was a while ago he could request for my previous application to be deleted and I could reapply, unfortunately the deletions were only done once a week on a Saturday.I waited until the following Tuesday and tried again, once again the application did not work.I couldn't find the number again but managed to eventually find an option for live chat...Spoke to John, who couldn't have cared less, once again I was told that I would have to wait another week for my profile to be deleted, but apparently now deletions are done on a friday.... by this point my blood is starting to boil and I am losing confidence by the minute.  I explained to John that I had already requested this, he advised me that I would just have to do it again and be patient.I asked to speak to a manager, John assured me that a manager would call me back ASAP however John was unable to give me a name or a number and ended the chat...... This was yet another lie, As I am STILL waiting for N26 to call me!After waiting a considerable amount of time with no call from the mystery manager, I got on chat again and this time spoke to Chiana she advised me that managers do not speak to customers as they are busy doing management things and If i thought about it, surely that would make sense..... (Wow)I asked her for head offices number so I could complain that wayFinally I spoke to someone on the phone, once again, we went through all of the rigmarole of what was going on, to this point not a single person has apologised for the time wasting, the lack of service or the fact that no one seems to know what is actually going onFinally I was told that I cannot have an account, I asked why, I have good credit and earn a good salary, but no reason was provided, I asked what the reason was, I was told that the agent that I was speaking to did not know why and would not put me through to anyone else to offer any justificationThe only thing I can think is that they do not want my money.quite possibly the worst company I have encountered for Customer service and I will be assuring that I do not recommend them to anyone looking for a bank account
reply: Hey Conor,we're sorry to hear that but please get in touch with our support team again, and we will refund your N26 Black fee for the first months.

title: Nur als Zweitkonto gut
content: Die Bank zeigt eindeutig, wo es langgeht. Bei Problemen hilft der telefonisches Service extrem schnell.  keine Geb√ºhren f√ºr den Einsatz im Ausland. Mehr geht nicht. Leider muss ich auch etwas Wasser in den Wein gie√üen. Dass die debit ‚Äì Karte die Funktion Girocard nicht unterst√ºtzt, ist in Deutschland ein no go.  An etlichen Stellen wird die Karte nicht akzeptiert (Stichwort: nur EC-Karte). da hierf√ºr die Girocard-Funktion fehlt.  Man braucht also dauerhaft noch ein zweites Konto einer Bank, die eine normale EC Karte enth√§lt, das ist wirklich l√§cherlich und unpraktisch. Die Funktion Money beam, f√ºr die N26 steht, hat bei drei Versuchen zweimal nicht funktioniert. So etwas darf bei einer Bank nicht passieren, die Transaktionen m√ºssen zuverl√§ssig laufen. name: gregor mercina
title: Not very proffessional
content: I have the card for about half a year now. The payments and money transfer were all ok, that's why I recommended it to 2 of my friends via the "Invite Friends" program. Both friends ordered the card and topped it up with money. And then the story starts to complicate. The "Invite Friends" promises to give you (me) 15‚Ç¨ for each friend (and it was 30‚Ç¨ during the Christmas time). I NEVER saw this money. Contacted the support team and they say the "Invite Friends" program currently doesn't work. I don't care if it currently doesn't work - it worked (or at least was presented as working) when I invited my friends. And besides - although they said the program currently doesn't work they are still misleading the customers with 15‚Ç¨ reward on an "Invite Friends" page. At least they should remove that statement. Honestly, I'm quite disappointed with the customer service, especially because they're a bank and shouldn't afford such flaws. We're talking about money here and SCAM-ing people is the last thing you should do in a financial business.If anyone from the N26 is reading this please contact me so we can sort this out.GM

name: nicky
title: Dig beyond the surface and it's a mess
content: When you peel back the layers beyond the cool app and flashy upgrades, you find a company utterly incompetent at basic service. Their partnership with Allianz is all talk: good luck getting a response if you have a claim and N26 won't do anything to help. Their partnership with Clark is useless. They don't manage anything for you. It takes up to a week to get email support responses and they usually just apologize but not solve your problem. But what really annoyed me most is it takes over two weeks to get a new card in the mail. They actually deactivated my old card before I received my new card and so I had online payments bouncing and all types of drama. I absolutely hate when companies proritize all these bells and whistles but can't get the basics right.

name: Thomas Jamison
title: Everything started out well
content: Everything started out well, easy to set up and the app was great. Over the last year though the holes in N26 have appeared and they are pretty major. The fraud that occurred on my accounts and those others who started around the same time is near at 100%, after money is stolen you are made to submit scanned documents, wait an unknown length of time to get your money back and pay for the privilege of getting your card back, 25 euro if you want to receive it in under 2 weeks. Receiving money internationally when not using Transfer Wise is complicated and full of flaws, the team at N26 do not know and are not equipped to give the answers required. I have money that is going to be lost in the system for 3 weeks thanks to the wrong information supplied by the team and website.My account has been blocked more than once for no reason, the customer service hours make it impossible to do anything when this situation arises also.Yes it is easy, but in reality its a terrible bank, if you are looking to do anything other than get settled in a new country stay clear. The operation is a pretty shambolic.The response below even shows how terrible the info is, they do not accept all SEPA transfers! Even the apology doesn't have the correct information.
reply: Hey Thomas,we're really sorry that you were put in such discomfort. For now, we offer a SEPA-only account. For incoming and outgoing transfers outside the SEPA zone, please use a service like TransferWise. We hope for your understanding for this inconvenience!

Au final, N26 refuse de prendre en charge ces frais, refuse de me mettre en contact avec un responsable et me fait perdre 120‚Ç¨.Mon constat : N26 ne s'av√®re pas une banque s√©rieuse, et reste pratique pour acheter sa baguette de pain le dimanche.PS : si besoin je peux fournir les impressions √©crans des √©changes avec le service client.

content: I love N26. They made it super easy and fast for me to get set up with a bank account as a new expat in Germany. The fact that they are fully digital is a plus - the mobile app is slick and enjoyable to use. I can transfer money or moneybeam friends (the closest thing to Venmo here) in seconds. Withdrawals at any ATM also a plus. I‚Äôm happy that they‚Äôre expanding overseas and will consider creating an account in my home country, the US, as well.

name: Arnold Kern
title: N26: Hard to get your money back!
content: I've successfully used n26 for almost 6month, then suddenly received a message that my account will be closed and I have to transfer or withdraw money from the account. But all transactions were blocked and I cannot get my money even withdraw them for almost 2 month now. I have called the n26 Support dept. several times, and wrote messages, but the only answer I have got is: "I have forwarded your request to my colleagues to take care of. As soon as I have new information about your request, I will get back to you.". It is outrageous, especially to lock money before New Year‚Äòs Eve celebrations! I ask to resolve this issue and thinking to advice other friends of mine who use this bank to choose another one.
reply: Hey Arnold, thank you for your observations, we're really sorry that you were put in such discomfort. We'll forward your feedback to the corresponding department. We hope for your understanding for this inconvenience!

name: Salnas 21
title: So far I have mixed feelings about this ‚Ä¶
content: So far I have mixed feelings about this service. + Have received my first transaction and worked just fine + Have made first transfer, havent heard of feedback if recipient has already reveived the funds though, but seems like all should be well + App is simple and easy to use, nice design- Incompetent customer care staff. Initially when signed up, took about 2 weeks to finally get some straight forward answers and assistance from staff- Came across very rude CS agent (almost certain name was Alex). For the first time ever I felt rather disgusted by how Im spoken to, considering he didn`t bother to even try to understand what my concern is. Wasted lots of time trying to explain to him what my concern is, seemed like he is just replying for the sake of it. Threatened to close the chat after I highlighted ONE word in caps letters (no intention to be rude or "shout"), which I found hilarious and disgusting. Anyway.. Alex will learn, maybe. - Could not complete transfer via computer, solution from CS -> use App without gathering any feedback if this is IT issue, if account settings need to be amended etc. If I`m using computer, obviously it is more convenient for me to do so, so was surprised noone would even bother to check why the transaction would not work via computed (was receiving pop up window saying "access denied" without any further info). So far so good, despite the customer service.
reply: Hey, we're really sorry for the bad experience so far. We'll forward your feedback to the corresponding department.Please note that N26 is "The Mobile Bank", Europe‚Äôs first completely mobile bank and you have your full financial control only with N26 app on your smartphone.

name: Jimmi Larsen
title: N26 terminates account for purchasing Bitcoin
content: I opened an account with N26 and deposited money into my account monthly. I then decided to purchase some bitcoin using N26 MoneyBeam (buying from another N26 user), and a few days later I was interrogated by N26 staff via e-mail with regard to my Bitcoin purchase.I explained everything as requested and provided all requested documentation, but my account was terminated with immediate effect, with a vague excuse of being in breach of their T&Cs. I looked through their T&Cs and couldn't find what I would have been in violation of, and repeated requests for clarification were ignored.Stay away from N26, they've terrible customer service and despite being an online bank, apparently still living in the past.
reply: Hey Jimmi, thank you for your honest feedback, we're really sorry that you were put in a negative situation. Currently, we don't offer any kind of cryptocurrencies integration and promote the option to buy or sell cryptocurrencies with your N26 account regarding the German Anti Money Laundering Act.

name: Tomislav Gelo
title: The bank for those who don't need a bank
content: I've used several different banking products but nothing comes close to N26. I can do 99% of the things I need via the amazing mobile banking app and for the other 1% I can contact the customer support and get my questions resolved in no-time. I can recommend N26 to anyone looking for a banking solution without the need of going to a brink-and-mortar bank ever again!

name: Kamaldeep Patra
title: Unable to open N26 account since Indian passports are not supported by your system
content: As highlighted N26 system needs to be upgraded so that other nationalities can avail the opportunity to open an N26 account. The system should also support documents other than passport like Permanent Residence in Germany "Niederlassungserlaubnis". Currently while opening an N26 account it was not clear who should apply and which all nationalities are eligible for the time being.

name: Marek
title: One of the Best Banks Out There
content: N26 is one of the best banks I've ever used. Personally, I find big traditional banks highly repulsive, so an efficient online bank was the obvious choice. Here's how it compares to Revolut. Most importantly for me, N26 processes its card payments using the Mastercard rate, which is much better than the infamous in-house Revolut one. In other words, for every 100 EUR foreign currency payment I make using the Revolut card, I lose roughly 1 EUR versus if I made it using the N26 card. In addition, certain online retailers (including some in the UK) couldn't process the payment made by the Revolut card, while the N26 card worked just fine. It might have to do with Revolut card being Prepaid versus N26 card being Debit. This is purely personal preference, but I find the N26 Mastercard to be much more visually appealing than the Revolut one. Although, quite the opposite is true for their premium cards. N26 also has a better customer service

name: Nicolas Embleton

title: Top Angebot!
content: Ich nutze die Angebote von N26 jetzt schon seit fast 2 Jahren und bin wirklich sehr zufrieden. Registrierung, Verifizierung und die zusendung der Karte ging alles einfach und schnell sodass ich bereits nach 7 Tagen die Karte nutzen konnte. Die dazugeh√∂rige Handy App ist √ºbersichtlich und selbsterkl√§rend. Bis auf einmal hatte ich nie ein Problem weder mit der Karte, der App noch dem Konto.Als ich den Kundensupport kontaktierte wurde meine Problem sofort erkannt und die Schritte zur L√∂sung des Problems einfach und klar erkl√§rt sodass nach 5 Minuten wieder alles so funktionierte wie es soll. name: Melissa Boyer
title: N26 is incredible
content: N26 is incredible! Everything seems easy with this bank ! Starting by opening the account ! It's so fast and easy. Just be aware that you need 2 proofs of identity. The staff is really nice, and seems happy to help you. When I want to have a look on my account history, I am enjoyed every time : the design is clear, simple, modern. I know immediately where I paid something and how much. The AI behind the classification is working very well and I have nothing to correct. The merchants are surprise and like my transparent credit card, ahaha. Also, I love the push notifications ! It's maybe the point I prefer the most, because the transaction is instantly recorded and not in two or three days, maybe more. No bad surprise ! Then, when I need to transfer money, nothing is easier ! I just need to enter the Bank account information (BAI), and I pay in the currency I want (if the account is not in Euro-zone). The TransferWise's fees are really cheap, and the transfers are made in 24h ! The BAI are saved, so I don't need to ask N26 to authorise the future receiver, and authorise the transfer ! Time saving ! I am just waiting for the savings being available in my country, and little overdraft authorisation.Thank you N26.

I would have loved to open a bank account but it is a no getter for me if I have to go around the town to get correct information instead of getting it from the bank in the first place.
reply: Hey Kirandeep, We're thrilled to announce we're now capable of accepting Indian passports via photo verification. This applies to users residing outside Germany. The Indian passport is however still not accepted in Germany.

name: Michael Blohm
title: not so sure yet...from beginning ‚Ä¶
content: not so sure yet...from beginning everything was easy...i sent some money for test...all good. now i have 2 clients they put an additional info to my name...just for their internal use...2 times incoming money declined coz not match 100% with account holder...whats rubbish...coz my name is clearly on it....lets see it get better
reply: Hey Michael, we're really sorry that you were put in such discomfort. Due to some changes and in the regulations, all banks are obliged to adjust to this new set of rules. All incoming transfers should arrive since the recipient name can still be associated with the account holder, however the bigger the difference the more likely it is that a payment might be rejected.

title: Absolutely avoid! DISGUSTING customer service
content: Absolutely avoid! They don't give a **** about youNowhere can you see that they do not support SWIFT transfers.I went to my local bank and sent the money using the details they provided. Everything went smoothly and the money left my local account but never arrived in Germany.When I contacted N26, they told me that SWIFT transactions maybe work, but aren't guaranteed to work. They wouldn't move a finger to try and locate my money and they don't think they mislead customers. They send you their articles that explain that you should use Transferwise but don't say that they don't support SWIFT.The result - worse exchange rate, paid commission and you have to exchange your money back to local currency and then back to Euro. Other reviews have mentioned the long time it takes to get the money - they said it should "probably take 10 days". They don't know how their systems work and they don't want to pass my complaint to a higher authority. DISGUSTING. 0 empathy for someone who's sent 1/2 of his money and doesn't have it in either of his accounts. Just go for a real bank if you're moving to Germany and avoid disappointment from your bank in your first days...
reply: Hey Ravid, we offer a SEPA-only account. For incoming and outgoing transfers outside the SEPA zone, please use a service like TransferWise.

name: thomas
title: Nice concept but awful operation
content: The basic idea of N26 is quite nice. It's very handy for daily use apart from one thing; their debit card is not that weird German "EC Karte" so some shops and restaurants refuse your N26 debit card. But it's ok since I hate this crappy format anyway and avoid shops who only accept them as much as possible.The real problems with N26 are the investment account and their customer support.Obviously they have way too less support staff in terms of both number and qualification. When I had a problem (which is not yet solved btw) and wrote an email to them, I got a response 10 days later. And the response was like "we will investigate the issue and get back to you when we have any updates", which provides no information.And the problem with the investment account is even worse. The app says it takes 3-5 days to open an investment account. Now I still don't have my account after 2 month. I've been writing to them via email and chat every week and I've been always getting responses like "It will take a week more" or "I reckon it will be fixed in a couple of days" but all of them turned out to be false.In conclusion; basic idea and features are cool, but the CUSTOMER SUPPORT IS HORRIBLE. They are too friendly even in case of very serious problem, they lie and they do nothing to solve the problem.

content: Ich bin seit Juli bei N26 dabei und bin von Grund auf begeistert. Man bekommt eine kostenlose Debit-Mastercard, die nat√ºrlich kontaktlose Zahlungen unterst√ºtzt. Ums√§tze werden in Echtzeit dargestellt und man bekommt, individuell konfigurierbar, sofort eine Push-Benachrichtigung, wenn mit der Karte online sowie im Laden gezahlt wurde. Die App ist sehr √ºbersichtlich gestaltet und man sieht, dass das Unternehmen eine mobile Bank sein m√∂chte. Andere Banken versuchen zwar auch das zu erreichen, aber es wirkt schlichtweg nicht so einfach und intuitiv wie bei N26. Was soll man zu den Geb√ºhren vieles sagen: Kontof√ºhrung und Karteneinsatz sind weltweit kostenlos. Die Anzahl der Geldabhebungen ist in Deutschland auf 5 Mal pro Monat begrenzt, was mir v√∂llig ausreicht, da ich sonst auch meine Karte zum Bezahlen verwende. Neben der Abhebung am Geldautomaten kann man mit Cash26 auch in Superm√§rkten Geld ein- und auszahlen lassen. Leider fallen bei einer Einzahlung ab 100‚Ç¨ Geb√ºhren an, obwohl es die einzige M√∂glichkeit ist, Bargeld auf ein N26-Konto einzuzahlen. Im europ√§ischen Ausland habe ich die Karte bisher auch f√ºr Zahlung sowie Geldabhebungen ohne Probleme eingesetzt. Mir gef√§llt auch sehr, dass man die Karte innerhalb der App konfigurieren kann. Das bedeutet, dass man die PIN ganz einfach √§ndern kann, dass man die Karte sperren kann, Limits setzten kann usw. Innerhalb der App werden Transaktionen √ºber Tags kategorisiert und im Reiter Statistiken bekommt man die verschiedenen Kategorien auch ansprechend dargestellt. Des Weiteren kooperiert die Bank mit externen Partnern. So kann man Versicherungen managen, Investments und Spareinlagen starten und einen Kredit beantragen. Alles direkt in der App. Auch wenn Apple Pay mal in Deutschland startet, bin ich mir sicher, dass N26 von Anfang an dabei sein wird.F√ºr mich als Digital Native ist N26 perfekt. Es ist einfach, es ist kostenlos, es ist wirklich alles gut. Keine andere Bank kann hier in der Benutzererfahrung mithalten. Ich nutze N26 sehr gerne als Hauptkonto und empfehle es auch sehr gerne weiter. Und da es kostenlos ist, rate ich jeden N26 mindestens einmal zu testen.

content: Worst bank I ever had!1. N26 blocked 3x80 EUR on my card and spent more than a month to return money back! And know how they returned it? They just adjusted my initial amount! You admit that problem was on your side!It seems that your departments don't communicate to each other.For resolving issue #2, after waiting for more than 2 months, I had to contact a developer directly and after one week my issue has been fixed. Not any support from support!
reply: Hey Denis. We're sorry for the late response, we hope you can accept our apologies. Most transactions are authorizations made by the merchant. They are there to test whether your card data is valid and whether the transaction can go through. The amount is simply blocked and is automatically credited back onto your account within ten working days. We've worked on refining our app since October and 3D Secure is functional now!

name: Rachel Ernst
title: Fairly reliable bank
content: Fairly reliable bank. I only had a few hiccups as they are new and were still building policy and discovering how things work within a global context. For example, in Japan, the Mastercard debit has a hold put on it along with the actual charge meaning that double the amount of money is pulled from your account. The hold is returned but only after 10 days. This was almost catastrophic for my trip and N26 had no information at the time that this situation might happen. There was nothing much they could do but it changed how I use my Mastercard when traveling internationally.

name: Etienne
title: Poor customer experience
content: Poor customer experience. Looks cool, but lacks transparency. I opened an account online and went through the entire registration process. I went for the black option, and expected to be able to receive my salary there. I selected Spain as my country of residence, as they recently opened there. To my surprise, once the registration process was finalized, I received a german IBAN, when I was expecting a spanish one. Nowhere was it clearly stated during the registration process that this would be a german IBAN.  Even though Spanish businesses are lawfully obliged to accept SEPA IBANs, most of them refuse non-spanish ones. So I got stuck with this German IBAN, and could not cancel the contract until at least the end of the 1st year. After contacting customer support, I was told that there is a 14 days cancellation period. I was never informed of this by the registration officer, even though I clearly stated my problem. Summary: Disappointed by the lack of transparency, and the lack of flexibility when addressing directly my problem to the customer service. Lost money and time. Will make sure to share my experience with people interested in N26.

name: Bill
title: Read this review before you open an account!
content: Decent online banking interface with relatively simple features. However, if you need to get support (and trust me you will) YOU ARE SCREWED! I don't know if it's because I am an English speaking customer, but their support does not answer phone calls and they definitely don't answer emails. If you need something done quickly like a new card, some technical issues solved, or transfer problems then expect this to take 2-3 weeks before you get a resolution. I finally gave up on them last month and asked them to close my account. They sent an automated reply saying that I will hear back from them in 1-2 business days. It has been a month and no response. I still get emails from them, one of which was an email saying that if I don't provide my TaxID (since they became a sanctioned banking institution in Germany this is now required) or THEY WILL REPORT ME TO THE AUTHORITIES. This wouldn't have been an issue if they had just closed the account a month ago when I asked them to. THANKS NUMBER26 FOR BEING A HUGE PAIN IN THE BUTT!

Leider war die Aussage nur, es kann zu Kursdifferenzen kommen.. 150‚Ç¨ von 900‚Ç¨ Invest.. das ist keine Kursdifferenz das sind knapp 20% !!!  Daraufhin meinte der Supportmitarbeiter er k√ºmmert sich darum und meldet sich via Email schnellstm√∂glich bei mir... Nun sind weitere 7 Tage vergangen ohne Reaktion. Ein merkw√ºrdiges Gef√ºhl wenn man seiner Bank weder vertrauen noch sich aus sie verlassen kann.. Ich war bisher immer gerne N26 Kunde und habe N26 auch an etliche Freunde empfohlen. Sparkonten im EU Ausland, wo es noch ein wenig Zinsen gibt, und Fonds mit niedrigen Verwaltungsgeb√ºhren, die breit diversifiziert sind und tats√§chlich Ertragschancen haben.
