name: Gerard Bonner
title: I have no problems with the service as ‚Ä¶
content: I have no problems with the service as offered. I kind of concur that, while the app is nice and all, and the banking service is easy to use (especially easy to open!), it's not all that innovative. Apple Pay launches in Italy and there's a big fanfare about them launching it in Italy too, later in the year. Well, what about the other regions where Apply Pay is already available? What about Android Pay, or even, just making NFC payments a built-in feature of the app.

name: mak spy
title: Good app good communication.
content: Change of ‚ù§Ô∏è. I can honestly say these guys are fantastic now at whatever you need. Fast and courteous. Use them all the time Good untill u need to talk to somebody. Also it maybe cool and hip to address me casually but when you are responsible for my money, starting communications with Hey and what's up isn't cool. Long story short emails are just completely ignored or 3 weeks to reply Hey... Phone 40 min wait

name: Neil M
title: Good
content: Money transfers to other banks are really quick. Push notifications for every transaction in real time are fantastic. Charges are low, and it's possible to use the account without any cost. I can understand why they've had to introduce some over the last year.Paying for stuff in other currencies is so much cheaper than other banks. It's nice to also be able to see the original amount and the actual exchange rate used. Customer support, the few times I have had to contact them, have been pretty quick to respond. Perhaps I've had really easy questions compared to others. I've been using N26 since the wire card days and I never had any issues at time of switchover or after. My card arrived promptly in the post to Ireland, first time.Right now, I feel the app design has taken a turn for the worst. There is so much white being used everywhere it can be hard to distinguish at a quick glance. It also seems less stable and prone to more glitches than it used to. Bugs can sometimes take time to be fixed. For example, the statistics page on the website hasn't been working for months. Most of the newest products that they've launched are Germany only. Come on N26, if you want to be a pan European bank then you need to overcome the challenges and launch these products in other countries. How hard is it to have a savings account that anyone can open?While I enjoy using N26 and would recommend it to people, they could fall behind other banks if they can't launch their products outside Germany.

name: Tom
title: Absolutely Appalling
content: Absolutely AppallingI signed up for the black card having had wanted to get behind a revolutionary fintech startup and purchase travel insurance.  1 month after signing up my card hadn't arrived.  I contacted customer service and was told to wait another week.  I couple of weeks later I re-contacted them to tell them it still hadn't arrived.  I told them that I wanted another couriered, my negative balance wiped (resultant from 2 months insurance subscription), and insurance for my upcoming 4day business trip to Italy that I would be covered for had I been able to book the trip with my N26 card.  Nicolas responded "I'll send you another card - you can expect it in a couple of weeks".  I honestly couldn't believe it.AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!

name: Heiko Schade
title: Achtung Betr√ºgerbank
content: Achtung Betr√ºgerbank. Sperren einfach das Konto ohne ersichtlichen Grund und 10 Tage sp√§ter hat man immernoch keine Info warum. Auf eMails wird nicht geantwortet und die total unf√§hige Hotline verweist immer auf eine Fachabteilung. Diese w√ºrde sich zeitnah melden. Diese Aussage h√∂rt man dann jeden 2. Tag.

name: Dario Idrovo
title: Avoid at all costs!
content: This so called bank is a bunch of crooks, their customer service staff is lazy and will copy and paste responses, when you disagree with it or ask for additional help, they will dismiss you. I was asked by one of their CSRs (Carles) to google how banking works so I can learn something. I was told by this same person that he couldn't talk to somebody who didn't listen (me) just because I kept asking for additional help because they took my money and wouldn't give it back to me. They claimed the merchant took it but they didn't. N26 did. I asked him how can I close my account? He told me I could go to their support page and read about it... UMM HELLO IS THIS NOT SUPPORT? Just horrible horrible. Same happened before and somebody by the Name of Dani also dismissed me. I honestly don't see a future for this so called bank. Take your business elsewhere!

name: Antonia Tritthart
title: you can't wire money from the US to the account
content: They currently don't accept payments from the USA! Your money will be stuck for a week and then send back. I change back to a real bank who is grown up enough to work internationally.

name: Paul
title: N26 - Immer wieder akute St√∂rungen - peinlich!
content: Wird leider bei N26 immer schlimmer mit den vielen Fehlern.Aktuell wieder seit Std. kein Login, keine klaren Ausk√ºnfte auf dem Smartphone.Lt. Website werden wieder einmal Wartungsarbeiten durchgef√ºhrt,was nur Sek. dauern soll .... blabla.Wartungsarbeiten m√ºssen am Werktag nach einem langen Wocheende durchgef√ºhrt werden, seltsames Timing?Immer √∂fter - trotz Kto.deckung und im FairUse noch nicht am Limit - lann kein Geld an Automaten abgehoben werden. Zuletzt bei der PostBank wird unvermutet die N26 mastercard nicht akzeptiert.Akzeptanz ist immer noch schlecht, viele Online-Firmen, vorrg. im Ausland, lehnen die N26 Mastercard als KK ab.Peinlich f√ºr den Kunden, wenn Du im Gesch√§ft nicht zahlen kannst wg. techn. Probleme.Oder vor Ort unterwegs dann abwarten musst, weil die Technik streikt. Sonst hat man ja nix anderes zu tun. So demontiert sich ein Bankunternehmen allm√§hlich selbst.Schade, an sich ist der Ansatz schneller, einfacher, preiswerter  Bankgesch√§fte am Smartphone eine tolle Idee.MfG

name: Zilexa
title: App is anything but innovative in 2016-2017
content: I joined after the migration mess and I live in NL. At first i was drinking the coolaid and recommended everyone to join this bank. I travel a lot. But man, this is actually a much more old fashioned bank than traditional banks! Reason: (1) their app might have been cool when in launched in 2015, it has been surpassed easily in 2016 by the apps of all traditional banks, at least the ones I know like ING. (2) customer service is non-existent, i have a pending issue since early January, they have been dead silent for 9 weeks now. To elaborate on point 1:1A their app is anything but intuitive. Forget what well-known tech and finance blogs write. It's simply not true. The app is slow, doesn't have a clear visual when it's loading, scrolling through your expenses can be horrible unless you have a very fast 4G connection all the time, the filter feature is very cool but completely hidden by a button barely visible after you hit the search button (i bet 90% of the users don't even know it exists).1B There are also real problems with the app. For instance, unlike any other (debit) creditcard app, N26 is the *ONLY* app in the world that does not distinguish CC authorizations/reservations from actual payments. This can lead to serious problems. You could for example see 4 payments to  1 hotel, same amount each, not knowing which one was the payment, if any (!) And not knowing what the hell is going on. Even Amex totally crap 1980 style app clearly marks authorisations.1C not all users experience this showstopper issue but I certainly do (on Android): you cannot save account numbers. Normally N26 will store the account number but only after a successful payment has been made. Unfortunately i have used the app for 6 months now, no account number has been stored. And having to type in all bank details every time i need to pay for a service or send someone money is extremely annoying! I have send screenshots and details of this bug 5 months ago, got a confirmation from Support they would forward it to the right department. I have emailed them 4 times since, no response. With all app updates since 2015, no actual useful features have been introduced. N26 app is the *LEAST INNOVATIVE* app of 2016 and so far 2017. Their Dutch (now going European) competitor BUNQ bank is actually doing much better with an innovative app that receives useful updates with new features all the time + BUNQ has realtime, in-app, real-person (no bot) Customer Service! It's just their business model (and price, paying a couple of cents for each local payment became too expensive for me ) that still keeps me using N26 mostly.As an example of missing innovation: BUNQ introduced a feature that will hold all pre-authorised monthly payments (like ISP, Netflix, energy etc) , an Android notification comes in requiring you to confirm these payments. The first time you approve, you have the ability to approve all feature pre-auth payments and even set a limit so if your mobile phone provider suddenly charge you double, it will be blocked and you will have to confirm it first. This is how payments should be! This is something N26 should have come up with in 2016. But they didn't. But knowing all this, i still use N26 for 2 simple reasons:1: it is free and cheaper than other banks when traveling (I use it together with Revolut).2: it gives realtime info on your CC (although not being able to see if it's an authorisation is extremely bad).So it is definitely usable and if you just need the cheapest possible bank, this will do but be aware of extremely bad Support (basically non existent), an old, non-intuitive app, no way to identify authorisations, and no improvements to the app for over a year. Fix all the above and you'll have happy customers instead of just a huge amount of new customers and angry old customers. Black:The paid subscription (N26 Black) is absolutely not worth it, it doesn't solve any of the mentioned issues so it's a no go. It is not available in NL yet but I have read the German offering thoroughly and definitely not worth it, as travel insurance there are much better similar prices options (even cheaper). But i guess people are used to the buyer protection with their old CC's and that's what makes them choose Black.

name: vinwal
title: Habe seit √ºber einem Jahr N26 und es ‚Ä¶
content: Habe seit √ºber einem Jahr N26 und es ist f√ºr mich nicht mehr wegzudenken. die wichtigsten Vorteile von N26:Der gro√üe Vorteil ist, dass mir bei meinen Transaktionen keine Bankangestellten mehr das Leben schwer machen. Bei traditionellen Banken muss man bspw. f√ºr die Freischaltung eines h√∂heren Betrags am Vortag anrufen. Der Azubi vergisst am System die Eingabe zu best√§tigen und die Bezahlung wird verweigert. Beim erneuten Anrufen ist keiner mehr erreichbar, da freitags um 15 Uhr Feierabend ist. Bei N26 sind das ein paar Klicks in der App und der Betrag ist sofort freigeschaltet. Hinzu kommt, dass insbesondere f√ºr Auslandsreisende so gut wie keine Geb√ºhren anfallen. Da ich auch in der Schweiz lebe, ist das f√ºr mich der gr√∂√üte Vorteil. Auf Kartenzahlungen in Fremdw√§hrung fallen keine Geb√ºhren an und es wird der aktuelle Wechselkurs ohne Aufschlag verwendet. G√ºnstiger kann man nicht im Ausland bezahlen. Einziger Nachteil: Auf Bargeldabhebungen in Fremdw√§hrung f√§llt eine Geb√ºhr von ca. 1,7% an, was immer noch weit unter der Konkurrenz liegt. Diese ist aber, wie oben erw√§hnt, leicht zu umgehen, indem man mit Karte Zahlt. Das Gesch√§ftsmodell von N26:Ich kann nachvollziehen, dass bei einem kostenlosen Konto mit diesen Leistungen Misstrauen aufkommt. Womit verdient N26 Geld? Bei einer Recruitingveranstaltung an meiner Uni hat N26 sich vorgestellt und ihr Gesch√§ftsmodell erkl√§rt: N26 versteht sich als Plattform f√ºr andere Unternehmen aus dem Finanz- oder Versicherungssektor. Nach und nach werden deren Leistungen in die App implementiert, und somit f√ºr Kunden "aus einer Hand" zug√§nglich gemacht. Bisher sind Vaamo und Transferwise solche N26 Partner, aber es werden noch einige dazu kommen. Werden die Leistungen der Partnerunternehmen nicht genutzt, f√§llt nach wie vor keine Geb√ºhr f√ºr das Kernprodukt von N26 an.

name: Lufi
title: Seit der Umstellung nicht mehr zu gebrauchen
content: Zuerst k√∂dern und dann die Leistungen k√ºrzen. Damit habt euch echt disqualifiziert. K√ºndigung von mir und meiner Frau bekommt ihr noch diese Woche. Mit euerem N26 habt ihr einen Weg eingeschlagen der euch in keiner Weise Met von anderen Banken unterscheidet. Abgesehen von euerem Pseudo-Hippster Marketing und dem guten Versicherungsdreck den kein Mensch braucht. Und dann noch Leistungen die vorher Selbstverst√§ndlich f√ºr 60‚Ç¨ im Jahr verkaufen. Und Tsch√ºss.

name: DerHenni
title: I opened an account here after they ‚Ä¶
content: I opened an account here after they migrated from Wirecard Accounts to their own banking accounts.I am yet surprised about the good working banking here. Good App with all functions you need, 100 EUR cash deposits free monthly in Germany, working Debit Mastercard and the registration procedure was easy and fast.Only things that could be improved: a German Girocard is missing, unfortunately many shops and restaurants accept no Maestro or Mastercard but only Girocard in Germany and cash withdrawals at ATMs limited to 3 per month is quite unflexible. With a Girocard and a few more free ATM withdrawals I'd consider to use my account as my main current account.

name: Alex
title: I am very satisfied with their service
content: I am very satisfied with their service. There were small issues when migrating from Wiredbank to their own bank, but apart from that their Uex of the application (Android version) is very smooth and friendly. I use the service optionally in Austria, therefore I did not experience the issues described by others. Considering that this is a free service, people should be more positive and patient. Keep up the good work!

name: Massimo Lucchini
title: Mi trovo benissimo con questa banca ‚Ä¶
content: Mi trovo benissimo con questa banca App, tutto semplice facile e sicuro, mai aperto un conto corrente in 8minuti, e la carta arrivata in due giorni, e poi c'√® la possibilit√† di sofortuberweisung non molto facile trovare banche in Italia che supportano questi bonifici istantanei

name: Fabrice
title: Simple et avantageux
content: Tr√®s satisfait par mon compte N26 : client depuis un an, je n'ai pas rencontr√© de difficult√©. Vraiment avantageux quand on voyage beaucoup avec les retraits et paiements sans frais mais aussi pour les depenses au quotidien. Seul le service client devrait √™tre am√©lior√©: tr√®s difficilement joignable par chat, un peu plus facile par tel mais uniquement en anglais.

name: Jakob
title: Same Story as some people writing here.
content: Same Story as some people writing here.The Bank has switched to from Wirebank to N26 and gave our new Debit Cards (black one). I activated this one mid of december and did not used it until now.Now I received a mail that I have to pay for the pay rent. When I loged in I saw that ~19‚Ç¨ are in Minus, because they charged me monthly 4,90‚Ç¨ (January twice) and the account is in Minus now.Now they are two issues. 1.) this 4,90‚Ç¨ are now charged monthly for one year without the possibility to quit. If I quit I have to pay the whole year.   This is what the not very friendly chat told me. 2.) This is a debit card and now they are going into minus and are charging me for that.There is no obligingness at N26. I feel very cheated now.

name: Sophie Scholl
title: Only positive experiences!
content: Only positive experiences!And nice to handle in everyday life.

name: Dimitri Visser
title: Nice bank!
content: I use N26. I have the Maestrocard and Mastercard and I am very happy with it. Opening the account was very easy. Banktransfers are very fast. Exchange rates are good also. They have a nice way to transfer money outside the Euro zone, which is very nice and cost effective.

name: S. S.
title: The future of banking
content: Easy to use, intuitive, and ready for the future.  I'm well enjoying using the services of this bank. I've chosen for N26, as the bank for my international travels and international transactions, as my Maestro card from another bank was a hassle to use abroad. Using the Debit Mastercard from N26 I won't have any problems using ATMs abroad, which is a big plus. The app is good, and the second money is deducted from your account, it gives you a notificaiton on your phone, so your're always aware of what is happening to your money. The bank is less personal than traditional bank, due to its all online service, and therefore might rise suspicion that it is a scam by some people. However, this bank is not a scam. I've been using their services for the past few months, and I don't see anything wrong with it.

name: Jonathan Turner
title: Am very much enjoying N26
content: I don't understand all the bad reviews, I have come across no issues, it's much better put together then the Irish banks I'm with and the app/notifications are great. Also it's cover by the german banking scheme up to 100,000, which I made sure off before joining. Obviously it's needs some improvements, customer service needs a focus, but every bank has issues, N26 isn't that bad in the grand scheme of things.

name: mohamed
title: N26 is a nice trap
content: it used to be all free when they just launched their bank. Now it is as expensive as any other bank. What's the point then? Lying to customers to attract them then changing the policies 1 year after.

name: RS
title: Worst banking experience ever!
content: Who decided that this joke of a company can call themselves a bank!? It's the worst combination of German incapability of dealing with people + criminal "bankers". This is absolutely NOT a bank and your money will not be safe with this organization. I would advise everyone that is a customer right now to take your money out before it's too late. People who are considering to become a customer, just don't!

name: Zana azad
title: A poor excuse for a bank
content: Never bank here !!! They are incompetent , I made the mistake of banking here for a year and never again will I make this mistake ! They take years to make money transfers and when you call customer service , you will be greeted with rude people who hang up on you . I've never dealt with a bank with such poor service . Please don't make the same mistake I did

name: klant
title: Goede app, internationaal betalen op internet zonder gedoe
content: Ik gebruik de N26 CC Debit card voor aankopen via internet en voor de dagelijkse zaken ook steeds meer. De app is zo fijn dat ik deze pas als standaard pas ga gebruiken, behalve voor het pinnen van geld, dat is maar 5 x gratis per maand.

name: Brian Peters
title: Good - but greater focus on customer service needed!
content: I have used the app and banking services for several months and I am impressed with the general efficiency and clarity of service. Yes, it has had some teething issues and I too was irritated by the transfer from Wirebank when they achieved their own banking licence, but it has vastly improved since that time. I was disappointed that charges are to be introduced, but I can see that near dormant accounts are of little use to anyone, so will happily pay the new charge as I believe their quality of service is generally good.My only concern is that as time has progressed the customer service is getting worse. There is an arrogance that wasn't there before and messages such as "We are very busy and there will be a delay ...etc" don't give me confidence. The last time I contacted them, I had to wait for 4 days for a reply - after sending a reminder. Not good enough for an online bank.I still recommend N26 although I have knocked one star off this review. There are competitors, such as Bunq, which are well worth looking at and offer better service. Make sure that you have a decent phone, a little understanding of how app based banks work before you jump aboard.

name: Joan
title: Good Product, Bad Service
content: I'm fan of N26 Bank, is smart, clean and secure, the big problem is with client service.2 days of more to get response, and then the response is a faq guide.This company are forget he has a bank and the clients have money in the bank, if the client have issues with card during a travel or restaurant, N26 need response urgently.

name: thomas heinig
title: absolut das schlimmste was es im Bankenbereich gibt
content: E Mail dauern Wochen bis man eine Antwort bekommt. Arbeitswei√üe fragw√ºrdig. Mir wurde mein Konto gesperrt weil ich eine  R√ºckzahlung erhalten habe die kurz zuvor abgebucht wurde und mir wurde Geldw√§sche unterstellt.Ich musste  einen  10 Belege einsenden um nachzuwei√üen das es sich um mein Geld handelt. Es wurden immer und immer wieder neue Dinge gefordert. Ich konnte nicht einmal ein Brot kaufen weil ich an mein gesamtes Geld nicht heran gekommen bin. So etwas ist unglaublich. Unfreundliche Mitarbeiter.Es gibt andere Banken die gut und kundenfreundlich sind da braucht man so ein Firma nicht.

name: Julia Berlinghoff
title: Dont do it!!
content: Dont open your account with N26 if you can!!! They lie, are NEVER available and when you lose your phone you are left on your own. But they wont give a damn about that.Before opening the account I asked the support about charges and they said there were none. After some more research in the internet I found an article pointing out some of these charges would occure. Asking the agent again, she confirmed there are these charges. WHY did she lie before?Then whenever you have an issue it takes for them like over a week to reply and they will only reply one of your questions and with their already existing sentences. After asking more specific the agent again figured out she was wrong. Until then she still answered only one of my questions. Then my phone got stolen in south america and I have no access to my account, cannot unlink my phone without calling. But of course it is expensive making an international phone call without a phone! Its a unacceptable and what they allow themselves should not been called bank! Its just a joke. A joke they make with your money.I am so disappointed!!!!

name: Eddie Olsen
title: A complete joke of an organisation
content: This company is a real joke of an organisation. They claim to be able to set you up within 7 minutes, but in truth are utterly incompetent, and did not accept my British passport as proof of identity after spending more than 30 minutes of my time on the phone to them.Although they advertise in English, their reps call you and immediately start talking in German. It's almost a con how deceitful their marketing stance is.It seems they have also sold my telephone number to tele marketers, as I am now regularly receiving calls from random financial institutions across Europe and other "data research" organisations.I would avoid this company like the plague and find better online banks elsewhere...

name: Lora Vardarova
title: Unacceptable for a bank
content: This is a joke of a bank. Don't waste your time. Their app does work only on the latest smartphones. You can't do anything with the online banking only. They closed our account as we could not migrate to their new accounts as the app does not work on our smartphones. And now they do not provide any support to get the outstanding balance.

name: Dennis Bommer
title: Nie wieder! Ich w√ºrde diese Bank meiden.
content: Sehr schlechter Kundenservice. Durch die Kontomigration komme ich nun an mein Geld nicht mehr ran. Vom Support erh√§lt man keinerlei Reaktion.

name: Jorge
title: Good at end.
content: I opened a bank account without any problems. I successfully transfered money to N26 using SEPA transfer in 1 or 2 days. Then, I haven't received my N26 black credit card after 15 days. However, they charged me the 5.90 euros subscription. I contacted the customer support and they told me that it was because there was no name on my mailbox. I asked on German Quora if it was true they told me it is not true. I asked the french post (because i live in france) to tell me if it was the problem and they told me it is not the problem. Furthermore, I sent a message to their support team to tell them that the format of their french address was wrong and that the number had to be before the street on a french address like 23 rue du pont while they send their mails to rue du pont 23They ignored my comment. However, after 9 days I received my black N26 card. I transferred money from and to N26. They are fast. They respect the SEPA transfer and they never block the transfers. I transferred up to 2000 euros and I didn't face issues about due diligence.I give 5 stars because my credit card has never been blocked and no SEPA transfers have been blocked even if I heavely used the N26 cards and transfers.

name: Patrick Ackermann
title: zukunftstr√§chtig mit Verbesserungspotenzial
content: Gegen√ºber dem klassischen Banking f√ºhlt sich N26 an wie Banking aus der Zukunft :-)  Ein bisschen merkt man zwar, dass N26 noch in der Aufbauphase ist. Aber es wird immer besser. Meine Empfehlung f√ºr Leute die mal was neues probieren wollen. Die beste Banking App die ich kenne!

name: charlie
title: Nice idea, terrible customer service
content: The rates look competitive compared to similar services, but customer service is almost non existent. After 3 days I finally reached someone who told me he couldn't help or even suggest a possible solution (I just needed to check that my delivery details for a debit card were correct). He essentially called me a liar when i explained that it had taken 3 days to reach someone and I'd hoped for a little more advice... guess I'll just wait to see if my card turns up. If you can find a number or an e-mail address (takes some searching), don't expect to be answered.

name: Sam Mac
title: broken
content: signed up, gave all my details via video including my passport and received nothing in the 5 months since.

name: Bob Salita
title: Excellent Banking but Usual FinTech Startup Pains
content: Every banking transaction has worked as expected. Their app continually improves and now seems polished. Withdrawals, deposits and notifications are fast. I've never had any problems with their debit MasterCard. That said, if you have an issue not addressed by their FAQ, good luck on getting timely answers and service. I can cautiously recommend them.

name: Theodore Georgas
title: Impossible to even get a message through to customer service.  THEY SUCK!!!
content: My card doesn't work and they don't even allow you to send customer service a message.   They force you to go to the help files with standard questions but if something does not work then you are screwed.

name: Davy
title: Worst customer service ever!!!!
content: I was a client of N26 for quite some time. When N26 got its official license all customers had to transfer their account. Was it not only the horrible app that doesn't work at all, when I called them they said they arranged the transfer for me. But when the deadline came that my account would be closed, I called them where my new card was and if everything went right. They told me that I didn't transfer my account, which the employee of N26 clearly told me she did on the phone. They didn't come up with any solution at all and said I had to wait and then MAYBE I could open a new account. They were very rude on the phone, I have never experienced worse customer service than this. If you want all your customers to go to another bank then keep up this awfull appalling customer service!

name: Reginald Beach
title: So disappointed Customer service appalling.
content: My experience with N26 started so well. I loved the concept and the control one had over one's card. But then disaster...... When they actually become a bank.I received my new card, but every attempt to get it registered failed.It became almost impossible to talk to any one about this.The phone was never answered and after waiting for 20mins or more I would be cut off.More then a week after emails sent I would still be waiting for a reply.I did get through once by phone and followed all instructions to try to rectify the situation. No luck. In the meantime my wife was having the same problem.I did get one email response, finally, but no follow up to my reply. I had no choice but to transfer our funds out of our accounts.WILL NOT RECOMMEND TO ANY ONE.

name: Jacob
title: Nice idea but it is a complete disaster in execution
content: In the first months I joined N26 I actually enjoyed the bank and the experience. It was a fresh take on banking and we all know that we need something fresh when it comes to banking since regular banks just suck.I knew that there would be some troubles since N26 is a startup and still growing but boy I had no idea what I was getting myself into. But one thing after another.First of all I really don't like the fact that they release new unstable features. Guys this is supposed to be a god damn bank and not some toy that I don't mind if it stops working for a day or two. A lot of their stuff either doesn't work at all, isn't supported in your country or is "temporarily unavailable and they are working on fixing the issue"See the problem with that is that I need my bank account to work. I don't care what kind of problems you have. Every bank manages to run smoothly but N26 just simply doesn't work pretty often. They have issues where you cannot access your account or even sometimes not use your card at all because of internal issues.Second I want to rant about the "MasterCard" which is not a real MasterCard as they state it. It is not accepted in a lot of places which say that they accept MasterCard payments. This applies to online shops and local stores.My worst experience so far was by far my trip to England. There I apparently got scamed ? All my money was taken from my account because it seems like some guy withdraw all my money at an ATM even though I haven't lost my card. Despite being broke and stuck with no money at all in England for four weeks I called N26 (Had to call them 4 times because I was waiting for about 1 hour each in their line because apparently they don't have enough workers) and the gentlemen told me not to worry locked my card and send me a new one at my address back at home and he ensured me that I will get my money back within 14 days since it was not me who took out the money.3 months and 10 calls later I got my money back... (I didn't actually expect to get it back after 3 months but I was positively surprised) so I started spending money again yay.2 days later they took the money away again and there I was sitting with a negative account balance without even activating the feature to go below zero. I called them again and they once again told me to wait 14 days. 2 months later I got my money back again but this time I was done with this god damn bank and about to close my account.After some research I found out that a lot of people got scamed like me with an N26 account. Some of them from the exact same merchant as me which I find very shady but if you ask N26 directly they of course just tell you that it is a coincidence.Besides that everything that seemed to make N26 appealing was taken away with the new bank accounts.Now the free tier doesn't offer free international withdrawals anymore and I find it interesting that the free account doesn't cover ATM withdrawal theft anymore which is a huge warning sign for me. You have to pay for the premium card if you want to protect yourself from theft which is absurd.I could go on and on and on but I think you get the bigger picture.N26 is a joke. They are a startup experiment which I doubt will survive in a 10 year stretch. They are unreliable, unsecure and sometimes even unreachable when it comes to customer support and when it comes to banking and choosing this bank as your go to bank you will have a hard time.

name: Asic Rebels
title: Don't trust berlin hipsters
content: N26 is the perfect example of what you get when hipster morons businessmen-wannabes try get into serious business, like banking.They have f'ed up everything they can:1. Design is actually quite horrible. I've used several banking apps and this is really a bad one. Combined with constant crashes there is no joy of using it.2. They roll out half-baked features that are buggy (buzzword "MVP") - the newly added feature "N26 invest" has "+" sign hardwired into the GUI in the field of your performance. So when performance is negative, you get "+-" :)App constantly crashes and most certainly can't work with semi-stable internet connection (EDGE/GRPS)3. Desktop app is a second-class citizen. very rudimentary interface, redicilous tab navigation, fixed (!) comma sign in the cash field, etc. etc.4. They haven't told that their IBAN will be temporary. I've moved everything to this piece of crap only to find myself moving again. And it is not easy in Germany. Most services require a written letter to change your IBAN.5. They actively conceal the fact that their maestro card is not a real german "EC" card. Technically they are not lying, but this is a clear marketing deception, which was critisized. Be ready for your card not being accepted A LOT.6. Their support is ridicilous. Can only help with basic issues. Also, they ask for your card number for an identity confirmation :D you know, the information you see when you are already logged in the webapp and you don't have to have a card to "identify" yourself.

name: Rastislav Vasicka
title: My money was stolen
content: My money are stolen and the bank send me the e-mail I need pay for stolen money.I have debit card and even I am in minus. When I allow it?Really bad bank ever.GO AWAY OF THIS BRAND!!!

name: Bernhard
title: Seri√∂s ist anders...
content: War bis jetzt fast 2 Jahre Lang wirklich zufrieden mit Number26  ja die Karte sogar in den USA genutzt und dann Gestern ohne Begr√ºndung einfach Konto gek√ºndigt!? Aber wie ich jetzt im Netz nachgelesen habe bin ich da  ja kein Einzelfall wie es aussieht ...! Auch das √ºber 400 Kunden einfach  das Konto gek√ºndigt wurde weil Sie zu oft am Bankomaten abgehoben haben ..?Oder auch wie auf deutscheskonto.org     Beitrag 9288 zu lesen :Hinweis: N26 hat Kontof√ºhrungsgeb√ºhren von 6 Euro pro Monat eingef√ºhrt f√ºr bonit√§tsschwache Leute bzw. Leute, die das Konto nicht so nutzen wie gew√ºnscht. Bitte habe das auf dem ‚ÄûSchirm‚Äú, damit du ggf. das Konto wieder k√ºndigst. Wir w√ºnschen dir eine gute Reise!Also seit Euch im Klaren das Ihr mit der Mastercard Kunde der Wirecard Bank seit (Number26 ist nur ein Mittler) dann googelt mal nach einer √ºberraschenden unbegr√ºndeten K√ºndigung so wie ich nach Wirecard und Sicherheit oder Betrug... wirklich schade war vollstens zufrieden mit meiner Zweitkarte..:( Aber ohne Begr√ºndung einfach mein rein als  Guthabenkonto genutztes Konto sowie Karten zu k√ºndigen ..?Oder Nutzer in 2 Klassen einzuteilen..?Schockiert mich nun..:(Seri√∂s ist anders zumindest eine Begr√ºndung verlangt eigentlich der Anstand!

name: Carsten-Pascal
title: Mein Geld wurde einige Wochen gesperrt bei N26 Bank
content: Meine eigenen gemachten Erfahrungen mit dieser Bank sind schrecklich. lch hatte 2x Geld per MoneyBeam an einen Freund gesendet, der auch bei N26 Kunde ist und da mein Kontostand ein Plus zeigte, wurde der MoneyBeam auch angenommen von N26. Mir wurde der Betrag abgezogen und dem Freund gebucht, aber mit dem Punkt bei seiner Buchungen in der APP, Geld steht in 1-2 Tage zur Verf√ºgung, was auch korrekt ist, aber er hatte das Geld auch nach Wochen nicht erhalten, obwohl mein Konto zu diesem Zeitpunkt ein Plus zeigte. Ich hatte dann zur Sicherheit von beiden Konten Screenshots gemacht ( liegen vor ), wo die Abbuchung auf meinem Konto zu sehen ist und bei dem Freund dass die Buchung nicht richtig als Guthaben verbucht wurde. Er konnte √ºber das Geld nicht verf√ºgen. ( Sondern nur √ºber den Betrag den er vorher als Guthaben hatte ). Mir wurden die Buchung aber belastet und abgezogen vom Kontostand.  Wochen wurde nicht¬¥s Unternommen von N26. Dann erhalte ich eine Mail eines Chat Hotliner ( liegt mir vor ) der N26, dass dieser meinen Kontostand per Hand nochmal um einen Betrag per Hand belasten wird. Der Empf√§nger hat das Geld per MoneyBeam weiterhin nicht erhalten, obwohl mein Kontostand ein Plus zeigte. ( wurde meinem Konto aber belastet ) Die √Ñnderung per Hand des Hotline Chat Mitarbeiter, meinen Kontostand nochmals zu √§ndern, ergab dann das ich ein Minus hatte und meine Karten nicht mehr einsetzen konnte, keine √ºberweisungen mehr machen und nicht mehr an mein restliches Geld konnte, obwohl ich ein Plus hatte auf dem Kontoauszug aber nun nicht mehr im Kontostand, da dieser von dem N26 Mitarbeiter ins Minus gesetzt wurde, was er mir ja auch in der Mail best√§tigte, aber durch die √Ñnderung des Kontostand des N26 Mitarbeiter auf ein Minus Kontostand, war nun alles gesperrt. Mails an den Chat wurden Wochen nicht bearbeitet. Somit wurde mein Konto falsch belastet. Dann erhalte ich eine Mail von der Bank, dass Sie festgestellt haben, dass sich mein Konto momentan leider im Minus befindet. Und sollte daf√ºr sorgen, dass der fehlende Betrag in den n√§chsten 7 Tagen wieder ausgeglichen wird, um weitere Schritte zu vermeiden. Mein Kontoauszug ( liegen vor ) zeigte weiterhin mein richtiges Guthaben PLUS an, meine Kontostand √Ñnderung durch den Mitarbeiter aber ein Minus. Wenn der Mitarbeiter nicht mein Kontostand ge√§ndert h√§tte, w√§re alles bestens gewesen. Tolle Bank, die einfach per Hand meine Kontost√§nde √§ndern kann mir das noch in einer Mail Mitteilen, aber den Fehler erst Monate sp√§ter erledigt, obwohl ich mehrmals wochenlang mitgeteilt habe, da es ja eine Fehlbuchung ist und ich somit nicht mehr an mein Geld auf dem Konto dran konnte.

name: Yoav Ben Tal
title: Does exactly what it says on the label
content: Have been using for 4 years and overall it's been fantastic. Very simple, app and website are maybe little too basic. Customer support in English is probably the best you will find for a German bank.

name: Kostas Tsiakalos
title: It is a fantastic
content: It is a fantastic, easy and pretty fast way to manage your financial worldwide

name: Marina Psichogiou
title: Great experience overall
content: I am able to use my card all over the world without issues and without ridiculous charges, this is making my life easy.A few issues when trying to move money outside of the EU, hopefully it will be solved.

name: Calin
title: Works perfect for me !
content: Works perfect for me !

name: Scott Gillies
title: This is one of the worse company's I‚Ä¶
content: This is one of the worse company's I have ever dealt with. I have as abusive staff members calling me stupid over the phone for not having headphones to be able to talk to them with. I have been verified with a valid UK passport 3 times and been severities 2 times. I have spend over 100 euros trying to call between I'd now and n26 which are two separate company's. There is zero communication between these company's and there is extreme holes within the security of this company as all you have to do is keep calling until you accepted. My application is a legitamet application but if I was trying to commit fraud I could of easily got threw the process as or representative says my passport isn't valid another says it is. I am out of pocket because of this company and I'm still waiting to see if they will return the 90 euros that was entered to my account and no magically disappeared with no trace. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY THERE ARE DATA SALES SCAMMERS. Use TransferWise, Monese, PayPal, revolut or any of provider do not let seethrew and metal bank cards lure you into this scam.Tried to complain but no one cares and I get passed on to other people. Done wasting my phonecreditnand time on this easy of space. I will take this to the relevant financial conduct authoritys.

name: Rao
title: I opened and closed
content: I could open it but within the first week, I got a mail that they can not continue free service and impose 1,5% charge on cash withdrawal more than 100 Euro/month and 1,5% charge on incoming transfers more than 100 Euro/month. That means if you receive only 100 Euro and cash transaction only 100 Euro, then it is free. More than that 1.5% charges. Hence I cancelled.If the service is improved, please let me know, I want to open again.

name: Sadiq
title: AVOID MOST OF THESE MOBILE BANKS!!!
content: I had an account with them and everything was smooth at first. This all turned horrible when the closed my account with a balance of ¬£6000+ and a pending incoming transfer of ¬£3000+ and held on to the funds with no response. I have sent several messages and requested a final response letter to the closure which have all been ignored. What they are using the funds for i have no idea. But i have reported it to the ombudsman and will now also seek other avenues like the FCA in order to claim back my funds. AVOID BY ANY MEANS IF YOU DO NOT WANT TO HAVE THE SAME ISSUE HAPPEN TO YOU!!!

content: Easy to setup, card comes quick(within central europe) and app is all the bank you ever need to visit. And all free. For me is N26 the best. Thank you

name: Rao
title: I opened and closed
content: I could open it but within the first week, I got a mail that they can not continue free service and impose 1,5% charge on cash withdrawal more than 100 Euro/month and 1,5% charge on incoming transfers more than 100 Euro/month. That means if you receive only 100 Euro and cash transaction only 100 Euro, then it is free. More than that 1.5% charges. Hence I cancelled.If the service is improved, please let me know, I want to open again.

name: Sadiq
title: AVOID MOST OF THESE MOBILE BANKS!!!
content: I had an account with them and everything was smooth at first. This all turned horrible when the closed my account with a balance of ¬£6000+ and a pending incoming transfer of ¬£3000+ and held on to the funds with no response. I have sent several messages and requested a final response letter to the closure which have all been ignored. What they are using the funds for i have no idea. But i have reported it to the ombudsman and will now also seek other avenues like the FCA in order to claim back my funds. AVOID BY ANY MEANS IF YOU DO NOT WANT TO HAVE THE SAME ISSUE HAPPEN TO YOU!!!

name: –£–º–Ω–∞—è –õ–∏—Å–∞
title: Very good service
content: Damn, this bank rocks

name: Kenrick Williamson
title: Easy to get in information and to be‚Ä¶
content: Easy to get in information and to be helpful and not rude, i would recommend the bank to all my friends

name: Rosie Riley
title: Dreadful bank please stay away
content: Dreadful bank please stay away! Issue now with the FCA. They have had over 7 weeks to return just short of ¬£300 to my account that was transferred to another account using the wrong sort code  in error ( this was my fault admittedly  but I told both banks immediately)  and they can‚Äôt even do it! I‚Äôm not updated as to what is happening with the complaint and I honestly don‚Äôt think I will see my money again! If they could just tell me when I will see my money again then that would be acceptable. It was my mistake but I‚Äôm always told that it‚Äôs the other banks fault and to be patient it will be sorted ‚Äúsoon‚ÄùUpsetting experience

name: J B
title: Customer service representative was‚Ä¶
content: Customer service representative was disconnected so many times I had to keep repeating myself about the issue I experienced. Apart from that I like metal etc

name: Yoav Ben Tal
title: Does exactly what it says on the label
content: Have been using for 4 years and overall it's been fantastic. Very simple, app and website are maybe little too basic. Customer support in English is probably the best you will find for a German bank.

name: Kostas Tsiakalos
title: It is a fantastic
content: It is a fantastic, easy and pretty fast way to manage your financial worldwide

name: Marina Psichogiou
title: Great experience overall
content: I am able to use my card all over the world without issues and without ridiculous charges, this is making my life easy.A few issues when trying to move money outside of the EU, hopefully it will be solved.

name: Calin
title: Works perfect for me !
content: Works perfect for me !

name: Scott Gillies
title: This is one of the worse company's I‚Ä¶
content: This is one of the worse company's I have ever dealt with. I have as abusive staff members calling me stupid over the phone for not having headphones to be able to talk to them with. I have been verified with a valid UK passport 3 times and been severities 2 times. I have spend over 100 euros trying to call between I'd now and n26 which are two separate company's. There is zero communication between these company's and there is extreme holes within the security of this company as all you have to do is keep calling until you accepted. My application is a legitamet application but if I was trying to commit fraud I could of easily got threw the process as or representative says my passport isn't valid another says it is. I am out of pocket because of this company and I'm still waiting to see if they will return the 90 euros that was entered to my account and no magically disappeared with no trace. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY THERE ARE DATA SALES SCAMMERS. Use TransferWise, Monese, PayPal, revolut or any of provider do not let seethrew and metal bank cards lure you into this scam.Tried to complain but no one cares and I get passed on to other people. Done wasting my phonecreditnand time on this easy of space. I will take this to the relevant financial conduct authoritys.

They have had over 7 weeks to return just short of ¬£300 to my account that was transferred to another account using the wrong sort code  in error ( this was my fault admittedly  but I told both banks immediately)  and they can‚Äôt even do it! I‚Äôm not updated as to what is happening with the complaint and I honestly don‚Äôt think I will see my money again! If they could just tell me when I will see my money again then that would be acceptable. It was my mistake but I‚Äôm always told that it‚Äôs the other banks fault and to be patient it will be sorted ‚Äúsoon‚ÄùUpsetting experience

title: Customer service representative was‚Ä¶

name: Yoav Ben Tal
title: Does exactly what it says on the label
content: Have been using for 4 years and overall it's been fantastic. Very simple, app and website are maybe little too basic. Customer support in English is probably the best you will find for a German bank.

name: Kostas Tsiakalos
title: It is a fantastic
content: It is a fantastic, easy and pretty fast way to manage your financial worldwide

name: Marina Psichogiou
title: Great experience overall
content: I am able to use my card all over the world without issues and without ridiculous charges, this is making my life easy.A few issues when trying to move money outside of the EU, hopefully it will be solved.

name: Calin
title: Works perfect for me !
content: Works perfect for me !

name: Scott Gillies
title: This is one of the worse company's I‚Ä¶
content: This is one of the worse company's I have ever dealt with. I have as abusive staff members calling me stupid over the phone for not having headphones to be able to talk to them with. I have been verified with a valid UK passport 3 times and been severities 2 times. I have spend over 100 euros trying to call between I'd now and n26 which are two separate company's. There is zero communication between these company's and there is extreme holes within the security of this company as all you have to do is keep calling until you accepted. My application is a legitamet application but if I was trying to commit fraud I could of easily got threw the process as or representative says my passport isn't valid another says it is. I am out of pocket because of this company and I'm still waiting to see if they will return the 90 euros that was entered to my account and no magically disappeared with no trace. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY THERE ARE DATA SALES SCAMMERS. Use TransferWise, Monese, PayPal, revolut or any of provider do not let seethrew and metal bank cards lure you into this scam.Tried to complain but no one cares and I get passed on to other people. Done wasting my phonecreditnand time on this easy of space. I will take this to the relevant financial conduct authoritys.

name: Rao
title: I opened and closed
content: I could open it but within the first week, I got a mail that they can not continue free service and impose 1,5% charge on cash withdrawal more than 100 Euro/month and 1,5% charge on incoming transfers more than 100 Euro/month. That means if you receive only 100 Euro and cash transaction only 100 Euro, then it is free. More than that 1.5% charges. Hence I cancelled.If the service is improved, please let me know, I want to open again.

name: Sadiq
title: AVOID MOST OF THESE MOBILE BANKS!!!
content: I had an account with them and everything was smooth at first. This all turned horrible when the closed my account with a balance of ¬£6000+ and a pending incoming transfer of ¬£3000+ and held on to the funds with no response. I have sent several messages and requested a final response letter to the closure which have all been ignored. What they are using the funds for i have no idea. But i have reported it to the ombudsman and will now also seek other avenues like the FCA in order to claim back my funds. AVOID BY ANY MEANS IF YOU DO NOT WANT TO HAVE THE SAME ISSUE HAPPEN TO YOU!!!
